
-----title
洛阳 (出生地)

/><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=681&endYear=688')">681-688年</a>　在国子监诸学读书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=689&endYear=689')">689年10月</a>　约在国子监读书本年十月,参加词标文苑科试,有文。作品：《永昌元年詞標文苑科策三道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=690&endYear=690')">690年2月</a>　约在国子监读书本年二月,武后策贡士于洛城殿,以近古以来未有甲科,乃屈为二等登科则天命写说策本于尚书省，颁示朝集及蕃客等，以光大国得贤之美，授官太子校书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=690&endYear=690')">690年</a>　约在国子监读书与吏部侍郎魏克己（时官太子中允）唱和，有文姑系于此。作品：《虚室赋》<span id='poem_title_1364705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364705'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364705'>范阳张说谨上凤阁舍人公足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364705_comment'></div>窃闻高义远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364705_comment'></div>愿托下风久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364705_comment'></div>自非气以同求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364705_comment'></div>音为赏奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364705_comment'></div>降此巳往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364705_comment'></div>复何云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364705_comment'></div>昔有飞英子处于深林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364705_comment'></div>俘转沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364705_comment'></div>适遇灵风子出于大块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364705_comment'></div>将猎云霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364705_comment'></div>飞英子思欲游焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364705_comment'></div>扬袂大呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364705_comment'></div>请俱载矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364705_comment'></div>灵风子不知其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364705_comment'></div>怒气视叱而还之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364705_comment'></div>飞英子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364705_comment'></div>吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364705_comment'></div>子非至公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364705_comment'></div>夫至公也者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364705_comment'></div>以义而求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364705_comment'></div>以仁而与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364705_comment'></div>况乃假有馀之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364705_comment'></div>济无阶之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364705_comment'></div>施不费之惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364705_comment'></div>振将坠之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364705_comment'></div>子不滥吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364705_comment'></div>我无苟进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364705_comment'></div>此种德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364705_comment'></div>夫何拒焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364705_comment'></div>灵风子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364705_comment'></div>请受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364705_comment'></div>遂相与翻飞而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364705_comment'></div>抟扶而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364705_comment'></div>经乎绮阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364705_comment'></div>集乎瑶台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364705_comment'></div>簸芳万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364705_comment'></div>腾景千仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364705_comment'></div>既而灵风子卒无德色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364705_comment'></div>飞英子亦无私心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364705_comment'></div>今明公据清风之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364705_comment'></div>令贤者获飞英之托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364705_comment'></div>此至公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364705_comment'></div>得无嫌扬袂之谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364705_comment'></div>怀怒气之疑乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364705_comment'></div>且夫论美声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364705_comment'></div>不于清𣸹之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364705_comment'></div>议绝足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364705_comment'></div>不于王良之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364705_comment'></div>今束蕴知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364705_comment'></div>弹冠且众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364705_comment'></div>若公固让而不然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364705_comment'></div>彼亦将倚辀于远方□于天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364705_comment'></div>轻重十倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364705_comment'></div>去留一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364705_comment'></div>惟君处之。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=697&endYear=697')">697年</a>　冬时在武攸宜幕。作品：《为建安王让羽林卫大将军兼检校司宾卿表》<div id='poem_1364656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364656'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364656'>臣某言。伏承月日敕书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364656_comment'></div>除臣右羽林卫大将军兼检校司宾卿。朝荣对及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364656_comment'></div>恩露洪垂。罄仰惊抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364656_comment'></div>环揆惭失。臣某顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364656_comment'></div>臣席庆皇枝。辱司天卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364656_comment'></div>素官成责。久盈人口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364656_comment'></div>顷属山戎自擅。王师震加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364656_comment'></div>谬当推毂之礼。竟空汗马之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364656_comment'></div>实赖睿谟幽赞。灵兵潜讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364656_comment'></div>灭犬羊于辽海。卷旌麾于燕蓟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364656_comment'></div>臣得归功北阙。待罪东藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364656_comment'></div>沐泳休贶。生死荣幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364656_comment'></div>安敢卖要塞而告劳。贪天功以为己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364656_comment'></div>又况羽林清禁。上则星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364656_comment'></div>主客命卿。下法河海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364656_comment'></div>盖文武具美。方议望佥归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364656_comment'></div>岂臣弊劣。所堪尸忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364656_comment'></div>伏乞特回眷鉴。更择能贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364656_comment'></div>俾朝兴薪槱之歌。臣免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1364656", 1364656, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>伐檀</span>之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364656_comment'></div>非敢饰让。实披诚请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364656_comment'></div>无任悚戴之至。谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=697&endYear=697')">697年9月</a>　时在武攸宜幕。作品：《论神兵军大总管功状》<div id='poem_1364688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1364688_comment'></div>营州失守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364688_comment'></div>前军丧律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364688_comment'></div>榆关不开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364688_comment'></div>幽平鸟栖于重堑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364688_comment'></div>戎羯虎食于四野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364688_comment'></div>燕南诸城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364688_comment'></div>十仅存一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364688_comment'></div>河朔之地。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1364688_comment'></div>力犹不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364688_comment'></div>况土人弄兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364688_comment'></div>转相攻拔。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1364688_comment'></div>摧岸塞河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364688_comment'></div>韩白见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364688_comment'></div>知其难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364688_comment'></div>王权以料敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364688_comment'></div>静而镇下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364688_comment'></div>宣国恩以抚宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364688_comment'></div>晓愚俗以逆顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364688_comment'></div>督将吏以忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364688_comment'></div>示士伍以严肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364688_comment'></div>深筹秘于六奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364688_comment'></div>潜檄通于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364688_comment'></div>沧瀛贝博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364688_comment'></div>响援增气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364688_comment'></div>幽易恒定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364688_comment'></div>声威有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364688_comment'></div>而又分兵井陉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364688_comment'></div>杜其西望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364688_comment'></div>引军河漕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364688_comment'></div>阻此上流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364688_comment'></div>张虚旗于赵城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364688_comment'></div>设奇兵于襄国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364688_comment'></div>亦犹吴人潜军于巢县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364688_comment'></div>而见舟豫章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364688_comment'></div>汉将捷径于武关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364688_comment'></div>而声出崤渑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364688_comment'></div>盖广援以安众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364688_comment'></div>多方以误敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364688_comment'></div>故能举无遗策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364688_comment'></div>兵不踰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364688_comment'></div>涤昴宿于妖氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364688_comment'></div>拔冀方于涂炭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364688_comment'></div>俾皇灵溥畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364688_comment'></div>黔首昭苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364688_comment'></div>朝廷释东顾之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364688_comment'></div>漳滏息南侵之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364688_comment'></div>然后归剽掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364688_comment'></div>返流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364688_comment'></div>业穷乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364688_comment'></div>赈痍伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364688_comment'></div>僵暴皆掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364688_comment'></div>死丧复怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364688_comment'></div>赏不失劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364688_comment'></div>亦无滥受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364688_comment'></div>罚不漏罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364688_comment'></div>亦无冤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364688_comment'></div>则王有大勋于是役也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364688_comment'></div>而又诚以奉上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364688_comment'></div>义以利人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364688_comment'></div>至忠之状有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364688_comment'></div>为善之迹有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364688_comment'></div>所谓忠者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364688_comment'></div>一曰思致命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364688_comment'></div>初戎寇方殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364688_comment'></div>王乘驿赴救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364688_comment'></div>众才数骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364688_comment'></div>捍敌群丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364688_comment'></div>山东父老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364688_comment'></div>如恃山河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364688_comment'></div>既而王躬擐甲冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364688_comment'></div>吐诚师旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364688_comment'></div>誓在尽敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364688_comment'></div>以报前雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364688_comment'></div>故得感激来战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364688_comment'></div>决命争胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364688_comment'></div>二曰能果断也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364688_comment'></div>凶党狂狡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364688_comment'></div>飞转妖书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364688_comment'></div>吠尧谤舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364688_comment'></div>閒诱愚惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364688_comment'></div>事斯蔓结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364688_comment'></div>摇我人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364688_comment'></div>王阴察州闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364688_comment'></div>掩求魁蠹。<div id='poem_sentence_133_1364688_comment'></div>三曰询善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364688_comment'></div>国之彝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364688_comment'></div>成诵在心。<div id='poem_sentence_138_1364688_comment'></div>四曰嫉恶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364688_comment'></div>每戮一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364688_comment'></div>亲数其罪。<div id='poem_sentence_148_1364688_comment'></div>兢兢然若不己有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364688_comment'></div>惟圣人神武制命。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364688_comment'></div>今者显号年纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364688_comment'></div>腾辉国籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364688_comment'></div>方谓垂范云台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364688_comment'></div>勒功彝器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364688_comment'></div>而杕杜遣宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364688_comment'></div>甫率于旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364688_comment'></div>茅土增封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364688_comment'></div>殊末于宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364688_comment'></div>此壮夫义士所以窃议而长叹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364688_comment'></div>虽树下不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364688_comment'></div>用归功于明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364688_comment'></div>然策勋有典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364688_comment'></div>具如别状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_176_1364688_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=705&endYear=705')">705年12月</a>　为朝廷众官代笔上书。作品：《百官请不从灵驾表》<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f3145f086653481f87a744217e780b27_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=707&endYear=707')">707年</a>　在洛阳家中丁忧，时说聚族而居，向成百口，吉凶衣食，待说以办家贫，佣文以取给此文即是应妓人伏十娘之请代撰。作品：《为伎人祭元十郎文》<div id='poem_1364846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为伎人祭元十郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（707年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364846")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364846'>维神龙三年月朔日。故伎人伏十善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364846_comment'></div>谨以清酌少牢之奠。致祭于元十郎之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364846_comment'></div>渌流茂树。萍罗是依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364846_comment'></div>山崩川竭。鱼鸟何归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364846_comment'></div>恭惟主君。高才达节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364846_comment'></div>赏心乐事。风流不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364846_comment'></div>歌艳露华。舞回春雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364846_comment'></div>幸持此技。承君馀悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364846_comment'></div>绮罗脂粉娇上春。自言终代保情亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364846_comment'></div>宁知一旦君恩断。繁弦清管为何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364846_comment'></div>怀主君之异顾。愿徇命于九泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364846_comment'></div>迫夫人之严旨。遂投足于他门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364846_comment'></div>生有十年之爱。没无一日之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364846_comment'></div>虽强容饰于新奉。心摧绝而不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364846_comment'></div>君子广德。仁心必遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364846_comment'></div>畴昔与君。琴樽欢宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364846_comment'></div>永怀蕙叹。俯怜荼苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364846_comment'></div>锡以时珍。申哀故宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364846_comment'></div>廞车既展。祖奠斯开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364846_comment'></div>悲歌助挽。长袖承杯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364846_comment'></div>平居好此。魂来不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364846_comment'></div>心思往而莫遂。足欲返而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1364846", 1364846, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>迟回</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364846_comment'></div>终天地于此诀。毒烦冤而难裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364846_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1364846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=707&endYear=707')">707年</a>　苏颋为合宫令，离职，县人在龙门寺西龛为其造等身像祈福，而请说为此菩萨像撰颂。作品：《龙门西龛苏合宫等身观世音菩萨像颂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》25页。）</span><div id='poem_1364633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙门西龛苏合宫等身观世音菩萨像颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（707年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364633")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364633'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364633'>我闻上古有圣人。心入群有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364633_comment'></div>身包大空。普观察一切音声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364633_comment'></div>其名曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1364633", 1364633, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>观音</span>菩萨。日月有尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364633_comment'></div>光明无际。天地有终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364633_comment'></div>神通不灭。礼其形像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364633_comment'></div>随缘而成功。称其名号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364633_comment'></div>因时而获果。龙门西龛等身像者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364633_comment'></div>此都人士思贤令苏君之所造也。天下之大都有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364633_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1364633", 1364633, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>河洛</span>总其中。皇居之赤县有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364633_comment'></div>而合宫是其一。四隩辐凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364633_comment'></div>万商庬㺒。政颇财黠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364633_comment'></div>刑放宠怙。所由然旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364633_comment'></div>故强毅临之。则攫敛猋扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364633_comment'></div>暴虐不辜。以抶扑睚眄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364633_comment'></div>是称辩吏。宽厚处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364633_comment'></div>则乾没淫诡。相诈莫御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364633_comment'></div>以息偃怠。谓之风流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364633_comment'></div>其伤弊一也。武功苏君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364633_comment'></div>名颋。字廷硕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364633_comment'></div>隋右仆射邳国公之元孙。今吏部尚书怀远公之元子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364633_comment'></div>相门华列。儒庭善训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364633_comment'></div>雍容文雅。当代知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364633_comment'></div>通才博艺。于何不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364633_comment'></div>御史天宪也。抗执之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364633_comment'></div>郎官星象也。高握兰之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364633_comment'></div>帝车西幸。皇眷东遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364633_comment'></div>四方之极。一台归妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364633_comment'></div>苏君于是乎始为政于京邑。籍田户以衍赋彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364633_comment'></div>考资畜以程力任。董逋逃以业浮廋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364633_comment'></div>诘奸慝以豫茕嫠。制事典以示好恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364633_comment'></div>敦术学以兴礼义。省法罪狱吏无作威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364633_comment'></div>煦邮驿圉人不败产。加以躬亲足以励勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364633_comment'></div>谋始足以作则。端庄足以易暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364633_comment'></div>清俭足以息贪。夫如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364633_comment'></div>往而事行。正身而人慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364633_comment'></div>轻薄束修而归厚。流亡襁负而来复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364633_comment'></div>曾未期月。迁给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364633_comment'></div>既而人吏父老。聚而谋曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364633_comment'></div>咨休哉。明府之惠人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364633_comment'></div>春风畅之。时雨霂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364633_comment'></div>心乎爱矣。何以祝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364633_comment'></div>朝廷岂不念下民之郁陶乎。奚其为夺我君而不省留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364633_comment'></div>诗曰。恺悌君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364633_comment'></div>神所爱矣。庶几乎三珍依凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364633_comment'></div>百祥臻降云尔。乃购奇匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364633_comment'></div>欣灵峰。追琢镜光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364633_comment'></div>镵凿电烻。倚高壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364633_comment'></div>临悬关。蹈石菂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364633_comment'></div>戴珉鬘。缥缈云耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364633_comment'></div>婵娟玉立。模宰官之形仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364633_comment'></div>现轮王之相好。谛视瞻仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364633_comment'></div>将莞尔而微笑。摄心倾听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364633_comment'></div>疑僁然而有声。其左右则福地园林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364633_comment'></div>香城基址。前佛后佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364633_comment'></div>大身小身。亘岑岭而相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364633_comment'></div>遍虚空而无数。此身不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364633_comment'></div>观大地之众生。彼佛何来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364633_comment'></div>见河沙之世界。尔其北对宫观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364633_comment'></div>南驰荆越。阙路开豁而中断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364633_comment'></div>伊水逶迤而长注。修途交会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364633_comment'></div>车马川流。帝城风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364633_comment'></div>是焉游览。如镇南之岘山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364633_comment'></div>似关西之灞岸。暮春桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364633_comment'></div>上巳清明。汎法池之绿波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364633_comment'></div>凭静域之丹槛。扬袂阴景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364633_comment'></div>躧步震山。花散四天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364633_comment'></div>香闻八国。以不居之岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364633_comment'></div>阅无穷之人代。知妙容之常在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364633_comment'></div>睹永劫之因缘。盛德相传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364633_comment'></div>与此山而终始。不其伟欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364633_comment'></div>昔孔子化中都以摄鲁相。卓茂理干密以致汉治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364633_comment'></div>夫树善有基。建功无小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364633_comment'></div>苏君春秋鼎盛。德业日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364633_comment'></div>方欲骧首天池。整翮云汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364633_comment'></div>致大君于尧舜。绍层构于韦平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364633_comment'></div>是宰也。故以五路之椎轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364633_comment'></div>九域之覆篑巳。重宣此义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364633_comment'></div>而说偈曰。大哉元圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364633_comment'></div>心如明镜。深入禅定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364633_comment'></div>龙飞清净。观我佛性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364633_comment'></div>灵相珍饰。精穷妙极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364633_comment'></div>于嵓之侧。因空见色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364633_comment'></div>登我愿力。不竞不絿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364633_comment'></div>不刚不柔。敷政优优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364633_comment'></div>百禄是遒。侑我苏侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364633_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_85_1364633_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=707&endYear=707')">707年</a>　居家丁忧，为人作神道碑。作品：《河州刺史冉府君神道碑》<div id='poem_1364778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河州刺史冉府君神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（707年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364778")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364778'>昔者尧舜既没。文武将坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364778_comment'></div>天纵孔圣。诞敷皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364778_comment'></div>于是乎恢六艺而正王道。举十哲而阐微言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364778_comment'></div>雍也为德行之目。求也为政事之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364778_comment'></div>吾见乎龙翰凤雏。百代而共贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364778_comment'></div>虎符犀节。重世而增华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364778_comment'></div>明德之后。知其必大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364778_comment'></div>公讳实。字茂实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364778_comment'></div>其先鲁国邹人也。古天子有相氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364778_comment'></div>宅于相土。实曰冉姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364778_comment'></div>盖氏族之兴旧矣。不常厥所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364778_comment'></div>今为河南人焉。五代祖睢阳公讳道周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364778_comment'></div>尚齐南康公主。位平南将军散骑常侍荆州刺史信州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364778_comment'></div>高祖讳轸。仕梁太子左内率荆州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364778_comment'></div>齐梁之閒。荆巫重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364778_comment'></div>世善其职。江汉宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364778_comment'></div>曾大父义城公讳黎。在梁云麾将军湖州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364778_comment'></div>入周拜骠骑开府仪同。至隋开皇中为旭州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364778_comment'></div>大父黄国庄公讳安昌。隋启平城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364778_comment'></div>祚之谷壁。唐分蜀国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364778_comment'></div>瑞以桓圭。其后改封于黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364778_comment'></div>授信州刺史。历潭州总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364778_comment'></div>赠夔州都督。烈考天水郡果公讳仁才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364778_comment'></div>秩金紫光禄大夫。婚皇室汉南县主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364778_comment'></div>泾浦澧袁江永凡六州刺史。伟矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364778_comment'></div>承家善庆。历代名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364778_comment'></div>风流载于史官。勋业藏于王府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364778_comment'></div>公即果公季子。天王自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364778_comment'></div>内禀胎教混成之姿。外被门风式瞻之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364778_comment'></div>从容合度。造次皆法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364778_comment'></div>生而知之孝弟也。学而知之礼乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364778_comment'></div>德义如山。文章如泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364778_comment'></div>缙绅之士。仰焉宗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364778_comment'></div>弱冠太学生。进士擢第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364778_comment'></div>遭家不造。府君捐馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364778_comment'></div>五日绝浆。三年泣血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364778_comment'></div>虽麻葛就礼。而栾棘加人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364778_comment'></div>服阕。调并州大都督府参军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364778_comment'></div>丁太夫人忧。过哀终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364778_comment'></div>有如前制。应八科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364778_comment'></div>策问高第。授绵州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364778_comment'></div>转扬州大都督府仓曹参军。又举四科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364778_comment'></div>敷言帝。除益州导江县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364778_comment'></div>鸿渐二镇。翰飞三蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364778_comment'></div>府中之孙子荆。郡内之岑公孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364778_comment'></div>用能据淮距海。我庾如坻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364778_comment'></div>岷山导江。入境先叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364778_comment'></div>加朝散大夫。除鄜州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364778_comment'></div>仍加关内道支度使。去青城之洞府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364778_comment'></div>来白帝之鄜祠。命服有辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364778_comment'></div>使车何重。除婺州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364778_comment'></div>入谢于武成殿。主上以边庭有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364778_comment'></div>喜问陈汤。宣室清言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364778_comment'></div>思逢贾谊。公召对蕴藉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364778_comment'></div>谋虑深长。眷甚前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364778_comment'></div>恩加后命。因改恒州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364778_comment'></div>于时四镇未复。二蕃犹梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364778_comment'></div>屯田绕塞。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1364778", 1364778, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>戎马生郊</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364778_comment'></div>代郡藏符。临冀北而诚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364778_comment'></div>汉家张掖。比西河而还轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364778_comment'></div>乃徙拜凉州都督府长史。仍知赤水军兵马河西诸军支度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364778_comment'></div>地壮伏龙。城雄飞鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364778_comment'></div>位居半刺。总管三边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364778_comment'></div>公乃利沟洫。懋藨蓘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364778_comment'></div>庤茭稿。积糗粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364778_comment'></div>均转输。程力役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364778_comment'></div>宽御悦使。授方任能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364778_comment'></div>人胥忘其久劳。兵不远其长道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364778_comment'></div>虽金方气。风雨不交之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364778_comment'></div>碛路沙霾。草木不植之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364778_comment'></div>莫不丰滞穗于坰牧。厌甘瓜于戍时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364778_comment'></div>朝廷赖之。迁使持节河州诸军事河州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364778_comment'></div>仍知营田使。崆峒连五郡之壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364778_comment'></div>积石控九河之源。公夙奉皇华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364778_comment'></div>政闻行露。高车未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364778_comment'></div>阖境相欢。既见君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364778_comment'></div>温其如玉。率性仁爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364778_comment'></div>由衷易。推是心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364778_comment'></div>物感斯应。睹恭肃而无竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364778_comment'></div>见礼义而兴行。不言而庶事熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364778_comment'></div>非教而群下顺。故得大田多稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364778_comment'></div>人和岁丰。饟军廪师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364778_comment'></div>处勤馀裕。计偕入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364778_comment'></div>侍宴于长寿殿。上谓公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364778_comment'></div>河州军镇要冲。屯田最多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364778_comment'></div>卿以足食为心。朕无西顾之忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364778_comment'></div>侑以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1364778", 1364778, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>彩币</span>。锡以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1364778", 1364778, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>文衮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364778_comment'></div>及公还州也。玺书劳勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364778_comment'></div>王人相继。国家径流沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364778_comment'></div>梁弱水。收西域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364778_comment'></div>护南庭。连百万之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364778_comment'></div>以济事于外。不一日而乏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364778_comment'></div>则公之力也。无骇入极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364778_comment'></div>可谓费庈父胜之。杜预平吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364778_comment'></div>盖知羊叔子功尔。宜登元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364778_comment'></div>作贰天朝。止于边服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364778_comment'></div>寔孤人望。享年七十有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364778_comment'></div>證圣元年二月十日。寝疾终于官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364778_comment'></div>天子悼焉。凶费丧归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364778_comment'></div>悉命官给。是日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364778_comment'></div>河湟耆老。山谷羌夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364778_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1364778", 1364778, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>反首</span>剺面。号奔州邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364778_comment'></div>虽国亡子产。吏哭祭遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364778_comment'></div>岂云过也。恺悌之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364778_comment'></div>人之父母。及其没也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364778_comment'></div>哀亦如之。信矣夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364778_comment'></div>夫人金城郡君陇西李氏。江夏王道宗之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364778_comment'></div>宜此象服。烂其盈门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364778_comment'></div>嗣先姑之徽音。立庶姬之范则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364778_comment'></div>蕣华前落。稿瘗城隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364778_comment'></div>以證圣二年正月。合葬于河南之定鼎原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364778_comment'></div>礼也。天使马悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364778_comment'></div>启滕公之室。人看鹤舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364778_comment'></div>闭王女之坟。松柏接于邙山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364778_comment'></div>邱陵对于伊阙。石麟将斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364778_comment'></div>华表何年。有子曰祖雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364778_comment'></div>景龙初擢给事中兼侍御史内供奉。追惟皇考孝于事亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364778_comment'></div>忠于事君。恭于立身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364778_comment'></div>惠于临人。总是四行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364778_comment'></div>旁通具美。贻厥孙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364778_comment'></div>以燕翼子。故老之口既绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364778_comment'></div>竹帛之文又灭。扬名兮柰何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364778_comment'></div>刊石兮来裔。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364778_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_123_1364778'>倬哉冉氏。世有仲弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364778_comment'></div>铁冠绣服。给事于中。<div id='poem_sentence_130_1364778_comment'></div>官以勤积。业因时峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364778_comment'></div>宰号神明。掾称亲信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364778_comment'></div>王姬祔葬。礼之终也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364778_comment'></div>水合蛟龙。坟同石马。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364647?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让起复黄门侍郎<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（708年3月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364647_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364647'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364647'>草土臣说言。臣在疚承荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364647_comment'></div>布哀陈款。精诚无感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364647_comment'></div>天眷未回。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1364647", 1364647, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>假喘</span>残生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364647_comment'></div>悲惧转集。臣说诚惶诚恐顿首顿首死罪死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364647_comment'></div>臣闻苦者不觉声哀。穷者贵其言达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364647_comment'></div>情有至切。辞无敢隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364647_comment'></div>臣为少子。慈爱所钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364647_comment'></div>每一离别。辄加忧悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364647_comment'></div>况臣生年多故。违隔私庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364647_comment'></div>终堂之日。身限公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364647_comment'></div>存既数违左右。没复不毕几筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364647_comment'></div>痛心自伤。特殊人类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364647_comment'></div>臣今望延数月。企及再期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364647_comment'></div>乞恩无多。报国非晚。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364648' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364648?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让起复黄门侍郎<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>第三表</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1364648'>草土臣说言。臣荒喘穷情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364648_comment'></div>再渎旒扆。恳诚不到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364648_comment'></div>未感天心。誓将冒死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364648_comment'></div>祈恩分外。中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364648_comment'></div>臣本书生。门非代禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364648_comment'></div>数叶单绪。族无亲房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364648_comment'></div>臣父遭忧。曾祖未葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364648_comment'></div>臣有两兄一妹。甥侄九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364648_comment'></div>又有中表相依。向成百口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364648_comment'></div>吉凶衣食。待臣以办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364648_comment'></div>臣今拜职黄阁。侍奉丹墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364648_comment'></div>厚禄清班。一朝改官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364648_comment'></div>举族荣赖。为幸过甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364648_comment'></div>人情所欲。岂合稽恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364648_comment'></div>正以茕茕苦心。有所未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364648_comment'></div>臣亡母在日。朝夕诫臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364648_comment'></div>以臣独立无徒。好直多忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364648_comment'></div>知子者母。果验所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364648_comment'></div>往罹大狱。窜命炎海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364648_comment'></div>晨出晚归。贻虑非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364648_comment'></div>况涉危难。伤心几途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364648_comment'></div>追忆生平。倍增摧慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364648_comment'></div>侍养日少。违离日多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364648_comment'></div>即臣母忧臣以终身。臣其忍服缞以从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364648_comment'></div>情既不同常例。望在特降殊恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364648_comment'></div>臣先患风缓。近加虚痹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364648_comment'></div>陛下倘从臣数月。容过再期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364648_comment'></div>非但宽其哀疚。固亦全其生理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364648_comment'></div>亡身报国。庶竭后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364648_comment'></div>木植有性。枉之则折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364648_comment'></div>人愿在心。违之则苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364648_comment'></div>虽强为用。将何以堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364648_comment'></div>衔泣仰天。冀蒙哀允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364648_comment'></div>无任恳迫之至。谨诣朝堂路左奉表陈乞以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364648_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1364648_comment'></div></div></div><br class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364772_comment'></div>乘递入幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364772_comment'></div>获虏数百。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364772_comment'></div>将德是以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364772_comment'></div>讨叛惟武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364772_comment'></div>携远在宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364772_comment'></div>搏牛之䖟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364772_comment'></div>不可破虱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364772_comment'></div>未擒伏念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364772_comment'></div>何逞累囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364772_comment'></div>乃止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364772_comment'></div>师归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364772_comment'></div>策勋上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364772_comment'></div>改温县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364772_comment'></div>永淳阻饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364772_comment'></div>广提中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364772_comment'></div>绝甘分少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364772_comment'></div>约己周人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364772_comment'></div>既丧好逑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364772_comment'></div>室无嬖御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364772_comment'></div>夫人张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364772_comment'></div>詹事丞师寂之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364772_comment'></div>敬事皇姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364772_comment'></div>能佐君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364772_comment'></div>娠有胎教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364772_comment'></div>宗如乐谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364772_comment'></div>前志之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364772_comment'></div>多所阙载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364772_comment'></div>绛郡夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364772_comment'></div>则天圣后姑之女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364772_comment'></div>而夫人之母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364772_comment'></div>尝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364772_comment'></div>妇则女训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364772_comment'></div>吾女有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364772_comment'></div>享年不永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364772_comment'></div>元发殂落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364772_comment'></div>先时君之伯姊归宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364772_comment'></div>夫人推居廨寝事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364772_comment'></div>而躬处下室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364772_comment'></div>及亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364772_comment'></div>设几筵于正寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364772_comment'></div>惟明灵以女公之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364772_comment'></div>凭巫通梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364772_comment'></div>屡寝为辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364772_comment'></div>举家恳启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364772_comment'></div>久而后定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364772_comment'></div>噫。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364772_comment'></div>温秩满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364772_comment'></div>转洛阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364772_comment'></div>当周之兴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364772_comment'></div>版都社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364772_comment'></div>泽郊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364772_comment'></div>粹纷岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364772_comment'></div>僎明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364772_comment'></div>京毂回回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364772_comment'></div>日不暇给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364772_comment'></div>又敕君专总徒匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364772_comment'></div>凡三百有馀旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364772_comment'></div>蕴劳成疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364772_comment'></div>聃忧损寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364772_comment'></div>永昌元年孟夏辛卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364772_comment'></div>卒官。<div id='poem_sentence_131_1364772_comment'></div>赠朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364772_comment'></div>旌淑纪庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364772_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364772_comment'></div>植其仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364772_comment'></div>众俘赖全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364772_comment'></div>将不为暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364772_comment'></div>重屋之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364772_comment'></div>厎其勤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364772_comment'></div>没而益荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364772_comment'></div>朝不弃力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364772_comment'></div>且不恋本达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364772_comment'></div>不合葬古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364772_comment'></div>神尚休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364703_comment'></div>亡亲愁惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364703_comment'></div>痼疾增加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364703_comment'></div>比蒙生还。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364703_comment'></div>身徒入京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364703_comment'></div>及丁凶苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364703_comment'></div>不获侍侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364703_comment'></div>不蒙矜遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364703_comment'></div>当是文墨不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364703_comment'></div>苦心投之执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364703_comment'></div>乞为一言闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364703_comment'></div>不敢守礼抗请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364703_comment'></div>直是私情乞恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364703_comment'></div>若以此情可矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364703_comment'></div>犹冀圣人万一哀悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364703_comment'></div>若将谴越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364703_comment'></div>甘心待罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364703_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1364703_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年10月</a>　在洛阳。十月葬亡姊张德，自撰其墓志。作品：《李氏张夫人墓志铭》<div id='poem_1364818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李氏张夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（709年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364818")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364818'>临淄李伯鱼妻者。范阳张氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364818_comment'></div>讳德性。孝悌柔婉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364818_comment'></div>能日诵数千言。习礼明诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364818_comment'></div>达音妙缋。德言容工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364818_comment'></div>盖出人也。伯鱼天下善为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364818_comment'></div>擢校书郎。出为青州司功而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364818_comment'></div>夫人寡居无子。以归宗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364818_comment'></div>长安二年。四十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364818_comment'></div>倾逝于康俗里。殡于永通门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364818_comment'></div>景龙三年。家疚居贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364818_comment'></div>季弟说鬻词取给。冬十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364818_comment'></div>安厝伯姊于万安山阳。苍梧不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364818_comment'></div>古之制也。北望先陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364818_comment'></div>西接妹邱。明灵其嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364818_comment'></div>永安此室。衔哀叙志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364818_comment'></div>呜呼孔怀。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364818_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364818'>送我伯姊。万安之坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364818_comment'></div>精灵何处。为雨为云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364818_comment'></div>彼临淄兮千里。望倏忽兮夫君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364818_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1364818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年</a>　十月，葬亡妹张琰，自撰其墓志。作品：《张氏女墓志铭》<div id='poem_1364823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364823' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_3_1364823_comment'></div>未成人而夭。命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364823_comment'></div>圣历中。随仲昆之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364823_comment'></div>殒折于庆州。归殡于蓝田别业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364823_comment'></div>景龙年属家艰。季兄说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364823_comment'></div>徽黄门侍郎。哀请不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364823_comment'></div>诏许终服。家贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364823_comment'></div>投笔气索。词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364823_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364823'>陟彼京兮。痛同生兮。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1364823_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1364823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年10月16日</a>　十月十六日，葬亡故曾祖父张弋，自撰其墓志。作品：《周故通道馆学士张府君墓志》<div id='poem_1364804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364804' class='poemTitle href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年10月26日</a>　十月二十六日，葬故祖父张恪，自撰其墓志。作品：《唐处士张府君墓志》<div id='poem_1364805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐处士张府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（709年10月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364805")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364805'>府君讳恪。其先晋人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364805_comment'></div>晋有张老。韩有开地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364805_comment'></div>汉有留侯。侯八代孙皓为司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364805_comment'></div>司空子宇为北平太守。遭汉乱离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364805_comment'></div>家于范阳。至元孙华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364805_comment'></div>复为晋司空。遇难子孙南渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364805_comment'></div>其处者或寓于蒲坂。周齐閒有归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364805_comment'></div>因从焉。君晋司空十一代孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364805_comment'></div>曾祖徵君讳子犯。祖河东郡从事讳俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364805_comment'></div>父通道馆学士讳弋。德音遗范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364805_comment'></div>详诸家牒。君孤绍单门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364805_comment'></div>傍无兄弟。苗而不秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364805_comment'></div>未仕而卒。道未融于邦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364805_comment'></div>位未扬于王庭。故老之口浸远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364805_comment'></div>好事之书又阙。是后生不得预闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364805_comment'></div>哀哉。嗣子晋州洪洞丞骘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364805_comment'></div>襁褓缞麻。育于舅氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364805_comment'></div>夫人陇西董氏。常州长史雄之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364805_comment'></div>早年守义。唯鞠一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364805_comment'></div>严而有检。勤而善训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364805_comment'></div>成先人之丕烈。贻后嗣之积善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364805_comment'></div>微太夫人德。则张氏几将坠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364805_comment'></div>开耀元年十二月二十七日。终于鄜城县世妇冯氏之别业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364805_comment'></div>春秋七十有二。先君之违世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364805_comment'></div>太夫人在堂。大门在殡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364805_comment'></div>日月逾迈。有志未从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364805_comment'></div>是诸孙疾焉。若履渊谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364805_comment'></div>以景龙三年岁次已酉冬十月二十六日。克葬王父王母于蒲坂东司空之村。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364805_comment'></div>幼而植德。人莫知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364805_comment'></div>烈烈王母。克明克类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364805_comment'></div>教我鬻子。光我族嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364805_comment'></div>中条之北。大河之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364805_comment'></div>邱陵桑梓。郁郁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1364805", 1364805, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>崇崇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364805_comment'></div>千年启室。百岁来同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364805_comment'></div>永惟先志。钦成厥终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364805_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1364805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年</a>　十一月服终，起复工部侍郎。十二月前后，迁兵部侍郎兼修文馆学士。十二月庚子，中宗幸韦嗣立庄舍并赋诗，李乂、沈佺期、武平一、赵彦昭、徐彦伯、刘宪、崔湜、张说、苏颋等皆有和作。作品：《扈从幸韦嗣立山庄应制二首并序》<div id='poem_24071' id='poem_title_1364754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>素盘盂铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（712年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1364754_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364754'>国子祭酒韦公。好游山水。器珍雅素。因适汤泉。见楩梓枌榆。良材满谷。乃命山工。作为盘盂盎罂樽觯。呈其文理。素而不饰。还都分遗好事者。说受赖盘盂二事。以铭之云尔。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364754'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364754'>幽山之木，无心世路。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=712&endYear=712')">712年10月25日</a>　应杨氏之请为其代撰碑文，应撰于先天元年十月二十五日前后。作品：《赠华（应作“太”）州刺史杨君碑》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=712&endYear=712')">712年</a>　太极殿众君子分司洛城，自春涉秋，日有游讨既而韦公出守，兹乐便废玄宗即位后公宴，众人再次在一起宴饮唱和。作品：《酬崔光禄冬日述怀赠答并序》<div id='poem_24080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬崔光禄冬日述怀赠答</a><span class='authorDate'>（712年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24080")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24080_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_24080'>太极殿众君子，分司洛城。自春涉秋，日有游讨。既而韦公出守，兹乐便废。顷因公宴，方接咏言。崔光禄述志论文，首贻雅唱。诸公嘉德叙事，咸有报章。若夫盛时、荣位、华景、胜会，此四者古难一遇，而我辈比实兼之。至于精言探道，妙识发义，戏谑而逢规戒，指讽而见师表。益过三友，岂易得乎？谓膏泽傍润，芝兰久袭，韦公近之矣。以文会友，以友辅仁，崔公近之矣。其馀寻声响答，望形影赴。故亦浚碧池之涟漪，增瑶林之沃若。是用缀集，勒成一卷，永存几阁之玩，无忘欢好之时焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_24080_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_24080'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(196, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年3月27日</a>　本年三月二十七日，玄宗在丽正书院设宴招待两相及礼官丽正学士，席间，拈韵赋诗，张说探得“开”字，有诗。作品：《春晚宴两相及礼官丽正学士探得开字》（圣政惟稽古）<div id='poem_24058' class='_poem'><div "poem_sentence_5_24058")'>柏梁</span>杯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24058'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_24058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>　本年夏前后，诏侯行果等侍讲《周易》、《庄》、《老》，“频赐酒馔”此日恩制赐食于丽正书院，席间，拈韵赋诗，张说探得“林”字，有诗。作品：《恩制赐食于丽正书院宴（赋得）林字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系开元十三年（725），当移系开元十一年（723））</span><div id='poem_23993' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23993' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23993?labeling=true' target='_blank'>恩制赐食于丽正殿书院宴赋得林字</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_23993")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_23993_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_23993'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2867, "poem_allusion_23993")'>西园</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_23993_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23993'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23993'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_23993", 23993, "poem_sentence_0_23993")'>西园</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作垣）</span>翰墨林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23993'>诵诗闻国政，讲易见天心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23993'>位窃和羹重，恩叨醉酒深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23993'>缓<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作载）</span>歌春兴曲，情竭为知音。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23993'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_23993'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(23993)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年8月</a>　本年八月，以封禅之故，诏中书令张说、右散骑常侍徐坚等，与礼官于集贤书院刋撰仪注张说执奏，当在此时。作品：《请定郊祀燔柴先后奏》<div id='poem_1364684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364684' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364684?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郊祀燔柴先后奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364684")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364684'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364684'>徐坚等所议燔柴先后。议有不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364684_comment'></div>据祭义及贞观显庆巳后既先燔。若欲正失礼求祭义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364684_comment'></div>请从贞观礼。如且因循不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364684_comment'></div>更请从显庆礼。凡祭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364684_comment'></div>本以心为主。心至则通于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364684_comment'></div>达于神明。既有先燔后燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364684_comment'></div>自可断于圣意所至。则通于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364684_comment'></div>燔之先后。臣等不敢裁定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364684_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1364684_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年8月</a>　张说奏此议，当在本年八月参上《请定郊祀燔柴先后奏》考证。作品：《祭天不得以妇人升坛议》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1364695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364695' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364695?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭天不得以妇人升坛议</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364695")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364695_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364695'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364695'>乾封旧仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364695_comment'></div>禅社首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364695_comment'></div>享地祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364695_comment'></div>以先后配飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364695_comment'></div>文德皇后配地祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364695_comment'></div>天后为亚献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364695_comment'></div>越国太为终献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364695_comment'></div>以宫闱接神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364695_comment'></div>有乖旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364695_comment'></div>上元不祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364695_comment'></div>遂有天授易姓之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364695_comment'></div>宗社中圮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364695_comment'></div>公族诛灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364695_comment'></div>皆由此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364695_comment'></div>景龙之季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364695_comment'></div>有事圜丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364695_comment'></div>韦庶人为亚献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364695_comment'></div>皆以妇人升坛执笾豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364695_comment'></div>渫渎穹苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364695_comment'></div>享礼不洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364695_comment'></div>未及踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364695_comment'></div>国有大难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364695_comment'></div>亚献终献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364695_comment'></div>终受其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364695_comment'></div>平座斋郎及女人执祭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364695_comment'></div>多亦夭卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364695_comment'></div>今主上尊天敬神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364695_comment'></div>必须革正斯礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364695_comment'></div>请以睿宗大圣真皇帝配皇地祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364695_comment'></div>侑神作三献礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364695_comment'></div>上初献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364695_comment'></div>邠王守礼亚献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364695_comment'></div>宋王成器终献。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1364695_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年9月13日</a>　本年九月十三日，潞州献瑞应图张说奉敕写诗。作品：《皇帝在潞州祥瑞颂十九首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系开元十一年，非。）</span><div id='poem_1102520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102520?labeling=true' class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102523_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102523_0'>① 皇帝景龙二年二月二十有八日，巡属县至潞河，有鹿奔走渡河，水深三丈，帝驰鞭逐鹿，水不及马鞯，应时获鹿。司户参军崔弼随帝而涉，才入数步，马溺焉。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102523'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102527'>玉膏滴沥，石巷幽奥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102527_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102527'>天将祐之，阴灵启道。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102527_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102527'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102527_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102528' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102528' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102528?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>大王山垒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102528_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102528_0'>① 上党记禹治水而登此山，因名焉。魏书云：望气者，言其山有天子气，故太武垒石为三，欲以厌之。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102528'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102528'>昔望兹山，当出天子。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102528'>太武心忌，压以军垒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102528'>地气虽废，河清有俟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102528'>三百馀年，圣人方起。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102528'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102528_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102529?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>疑山凿断<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102529_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102529_0'>① 上党记后魏太和末，孝文帝自代幸洛，见此山有伏龙，疑而不进。遂断山东麓以厌之。其断处犹存，因名疑山。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102529'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102529'>王命必有，厌胜多无。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102529'>不徵缘错，虚役丹徒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102529'>旧山伏气，今圣灵符。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102529'>魏虽穿凿，能违天乎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102529_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102529'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102529_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102530?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span>赤鲤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102530_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102530_0'>① 皇帝景龙三年三月，巡属县至襄垣南漳水上，有赤鲤鱼腾跃，颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102530'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102530'>龙或鱼服，鲤同国姓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102530'>跃泉将飞，告我天命。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102530'>鳞昭武德，翼赞兴庆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102530'>昔去随仙，今我迓圣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102530_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102530'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102530_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102531?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十二 </span>黄龙再见<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102531_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102531_0'>① 皇帝临潞州，景龙三年六月十五日，黄龙再见于伏牛山，颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102531'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102531'>蜿蜿黄龙，既见将跃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102531'>气动云绕，精流电烁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102531'>文明刚健，妩媚纤弱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102531'>万物睹焉，圣人其作。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102531_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102531'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102531_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102532?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十三 </span>紫云<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102532_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102532_0'>① 皇帝临潞州，景龙三年九月九日，与群官壶口山界坐。其时东北有紫云，翩翩而来，光彩照日。明日，上党县丞王敬宾等白刺史刘怀，一并启皇帝，请上状奉教，不许。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102532'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102532'>天临壶口，露座山眉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102532'>紫云来覆，如盖如帷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102532'>毕景不灭，含风自持。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102532'>一人有庆，兆民赖之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102532'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102532_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102533?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十四 </span>李树<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102533_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102533_0'>① 皇帝临潞州延唐寺，有李树连理。皇帝亲自验见之，御书额焉。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102533'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102533'>李兴帝族，寺榜延唐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102533'>异枝同干，双名合祥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102533'>花转瑶萼，子缀珠光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102533'>本支百代，永永蕃昌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102533'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102533_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102534' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102534' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102534?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十五 </span>神蓍<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102534_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102534_0'>① 皇帝临潞州，景龙三年九月十有五日，召百姓韩拟礼蓍筮。卦未成，而一蓍翘立，拟礼曰：此天人之瑞，洎帝践阼，授拟礼游击将军长上折冲，颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102534'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102534'>纤纤灵蓍，下有伏龟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102534_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102534'>天生神物，以决狐疑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102534_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102534'>一蓍特起，自天立之。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102534_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102534'>无卦之卦，告帝之期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102534_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102534'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102534_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102535?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十六 </span>金桥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102535_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102535_0'>① 金桥在潞南二里，常有童谣云：“圣人执节度金桥”。皇帝景龙三年十月二十有五日，由此桥朝京师，颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102535'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102535'>出郡二里，横路金桥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102535'>圣人南度，驷马西朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102535'>运及诛吕，时当换尧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102535'>却寻后事，一合童谣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102535'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102535_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102536?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十七 </span>紫气<sup class='reference
