class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102536_0'>① 皇帝临潞州，景龙三年十月二十有五日，还京后，州内所居寝堂有紫气七日不散。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102536'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102536'>王往京国，倾城恋惋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102536_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102536'>紫气浮宫，七日不散。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102536_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102536'>斐亹窗户，轮囷台观。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102536_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102536'>都人系心，瞻仰云汉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102536_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102536'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102536_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102537?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十八 </span>大人迹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102537_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102537_0'>① 皇帝从临潞州还京后，其宅内及州街，并有大人迹，长二尺五寸，自东而西，布武相继。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102537'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102537'>百神从王，一举西适。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102537'>众观空廨，联步云迹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102537'>蹑似郊媒，痕同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1102537", 1102537, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>雷泽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102537'>旷古奇事，存乎帝籍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102537_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102537'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102537_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1102538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1102538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1102538?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十九 </span>神人传庆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（725年9月13日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1102538_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1102538_0'>① 皇帝唐隆元年六月二十日夜，除妖孽后，其明日，州佐吏索崇嗣于州南门外闻空中有人云：“临淄王诛韦氏，相王得天下。”其崇嗣告长史裴思，裴思以妖惑罪之，禁锢累日。逢其月二十一日，赦到获免，案牍犹存。颂曰</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1102538'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1102538'>天帝下席，承韦干命。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1102538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1102538'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1102538", 1102538, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>王赫</span>斯兴，拨乱反正。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1102538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1102538'>击凶尊主，一麾大定。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1102538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1102538'>神人相欢，肸响传庆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1102538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1102538'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1102538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>　本年诏燕国公张说改定乐章，玄宗自定声度，说有诗。作品：《唐封泰山乐章九首》<div id='poem_24162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐封泰山乐章<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>豫和六首</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24162")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24162_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_24162_0'>① 《唐书·乐志》曰：“开元十三年明皇封泰山祀天乐，降神用《豫和》，六变。迎送皇帝用《太和》。登歌、奠玉帛用《肃和》。迎俎用《雍和》。酌献、饮福并用《寿和》。送文舞出、迎武舞入用《舒和》。终献、亚献用《凯安》。送神用《豫和》。”</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24162'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24162'>相百辟，贡八荒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24162'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_24162", 24162, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>九歌</span>叙，万舞翔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24162'>肃振振，铿皇皇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24162'>帝欣欣，福穰穰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24162_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24162'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_24162_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年10月</a>　本年十月，新造铜仪成，张说有表以进，诏置新造铜仪于景运门内，以示百官表称：“使知告成之功”，显然是在东封“告成”前夕。作品：《进浑仪表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系开元十四年（726））</span><div id='poem_1364660' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364660' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364660?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进浑仪表</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364660")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364660_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364660'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364660'>臣说言。臣闻迎日授时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364660_comment'></div>莫先于历象。先天成务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364660_comment'></div>必归于制作。伏惟开元神武皇帝陛下建中立极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364660_comment'></div>纬武经文。至德难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364660_comment'></div>神功莫测。于是定历成岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364660_comment'></div>立象考天。绍唐尧钦若之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364660_comment'></div>遵虞舜在璿之义。上皇能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364660_comment'></div>于斯备矣。臣书院先奉敕造游仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364660_comment'></div>以测七曜盈缩。去年六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364660_comment'></div>造毕进奏。又奉恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364660_comment'></div>更立浑仪。臣等准敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364660_comment'></div>令左卫率府长史梁令瓒检校创造。于是博考传记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364660_comment'></div>旧有张衡陆绩王蕃钱乐之等。并造斯器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364660_comment'></div>虽浑体有象。而不能运行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364660_comment'></div>事非经久。旋亦毁废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364660_comment'></div>臣今按据典故。铸铜为仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364660_comment'></div>圆以象天。使得俯察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364660_comment'></div>上具列宿赤道。周天度数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364660_comment'></div>注水激轮。令其自运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364660_comment'></div>一日一夜。天转一周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364660_comment'></div>又别立二周轮。络在天外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364660_comment'></div>缀以日月。令得运行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364660_comment'></div>每天转一匝。日行一度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364660_comment'></div>月行十三度十九分度之七。凡二十九转有馀而日月会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364660_comment'></div>三百六十五转而行匝。仍置水匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364660_comment'></div>以为地平令仪。半在地上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364660_comment'></div>半在地下。晦朔弦望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364660_comment'></div>不差毫发。又立二木人于地平之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364660_comment'></div>前置钟鼓。以辰刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364660_comment'></div>每一刻则自然击鼓。每一辰则自然撞钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364660_comment'></div>皆于匮中各施轮轴。钩键交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364660_comment'></div>关锁相持。转运虽同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364660_comment'></div>而迟速各异。周而复始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364660_comment'></div>循环不息。阴阳不能逃其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364660_comment'></div>分至不能隐其时。究天地之斡运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364660_comment'></div>极乾坤之变化。斯皆上禀圣谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364660_comment'></div>傍获神助。臣等愚思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364660_comment'></div>非所能及。望录付史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364660_comment'></div>宣示百僚。使知告成之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364660_comment'></div>迥越前古。无任勤恳之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364660_comment'></div>谨随表上进以闻。臣说诚惶诚惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364660_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1364660_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年10月</a>　本年十月辛酉，玄宗封岱，出发前三数日有应制诗。作品：《奉和喜雪应制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系开元十二年（724））</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='96a1339f9cd0409389984dffe7fe4494_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("96a1339f9cd0409389984dffe7fe4494");'><span id='96a1339f9cd0409389984dffe7fe4494_link' id='poem_sentence_3_1364698_comment'></div>望与学士等更讨论古今。删改行用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364698_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1364698_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年5月10日</a>　张说代集贤院上谢状。作品：《集贤院谢示道经状》<div id='poem_1364692' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364692' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1364692_comment'></div>以为惠文太子三七追福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364692_comment'></div>天毫发彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364692_comment'></div>宸翰腾辉。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1364692_comment'></div>伏望宣付史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364692_comment'></div>以光典策。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年7月</a>　本年七月十四日，和丽妃薨于春华殿，二十六日窆于邙山之阳。张说奉敕撰和丽妃碑铭。作品：《和丽妃碑铭》<div id='poem_1364798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364798' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1364798_comment'></div>次星具黄龙之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364798_comment'></div>郊媒神祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364798_comment'></div>次成元鸟之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364798_comment'></div>非圣也莫能法天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364798_comment'></div>非天也莫能感圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364798_comment'></div>则有相乎坤而母乎震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364798_comment'></div>齐乎古而合乎天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364798_comment'></div>迹虽秘绝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364798_comment'></div>天水人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364798_comment'></div>丽者以华美为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364798_comment'></div>者以配合为尊。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年8月</a>　有人奏请行用魏征所注《类礼》，玄宗遂令元行冲集学者撰义疏。本年八月，勒成五十卷，奏上之时为尚书左丞相的话张说遂上奏驳之。作品：《驳行用元行冲等撰类礼义疏立学官表》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年</a>　本年秋，十五州言旱及霜，五十州言水，河南、河北尤甚张说送工部尚书弟张嘉贞赴定州，正是“河朔愆岁”，阴阳失序致灾之年。作品：《送工部尚书弟赴定州诗序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系开元十三年（725）正月。）</span><div id='poem_1364717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364717?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1364717_comment'></div>借威六官。导俗千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364717_comment'></div>俾乎列城迁仰止之化。邻境蒙波及之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364717_comment'></div>不然者。岂一小郡而劳大贤哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364717_comment'></div>尚书河东侯。朝廷之旧宰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364717_comment'></div>操法度于掌握。运陶钧于方寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364717_comment'></div>是将敷皇惠。寒谷挟纩而知暄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364717_comment'></div>亢宗殿国。亦望于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364717_comment'></div>于时春带馀寒。野衔残雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364717_comment'></div>太官重味。御酒百壶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364717_comment'></div>供帐临岐。假丝竹以留宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364717_comment'></div>倾城<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1364717", 1364717, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>出饯</span>。会文章以宠行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364717_comment'></div>三台厚常寮之意。八座深联事之瞩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364717_comment'></div>既而离人遽起。班马争嘶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364717_comment'></div>纠合蛟龙。附藏群玉之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364717_comment'></div>置之怀袖。以慰遐心云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364808_comment'></div>十四年冬十一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364808_comment'></div>葬于邺西之先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364808_comment'></div>公讳伯玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364808_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364808_comment'></div>河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364808_comment'></div><span id='poem_sentence_67_1364808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年10月25日</a>　宫中时育五色鹦鹉，能言，左右试牵御衣，鸟輙瞋目叱咤岐王文学能延京因献《鹦鹉篇》赞其事，玄宗以鸟及延京诗示百寮，张说献诗称贺。作品：《时乐鸟篇并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_24118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>时乐鸟篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（726年10月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24118")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24118_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_24118'>伏见天恩以灵异鹦鹉及能延京所述篇，出示朝列。臣按《南海异物志》，有时乐鸟，鸣云太平，天下有道则见。验其图，丹首红臆，朱冠绿翼，莺领文背，糅以五色。今此鸟本南海贡来，与鹦鹉状同，而毛尾全异。其心聪性辨，护主报恩，固非凡禽，实《瑞经》所谓时乐鸟。延京虽叙其事，未正其名。望编国史，以彰圣瑞，臣窃同延京献诗一首。</div><div id='poem_preface_24118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24118'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24118'>旧传南海出灵禽，时乐名闻不可寻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24118'>形貌乍同鹦鹉类，精神别禀凤皇心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364809_comment'></div>勒铭沈础。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364809_comment'></div>万古何言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1364809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年</a>　玄宗令中书令张说访问道士王希夷，希夷与刘玄博同栖说与玄博交，并寄舄与之，或在此时。作品：《寄刘道士舄》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_23904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23904?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄刘道士舄</a><span class='authorDate'>（726年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_23904")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_23904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23904'>真人降紫气，邀我丹田宫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23904'>远寄双飞舄，飞飞不碍空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23904'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_23904_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=726&endYear=726')">726年</a>　十二月二十日玄宗东封泰山回东都，张说奉敕有文。作品：《大唐开元十三年陇右监牧颂德碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系开元十三年（725）十一月。）</span><div id='poem_1364757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大唐开元十三年陇右监牧颂德碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（726年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364757")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364757'>周礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364757_comment'></div>校人掌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>王马</span>之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364757_comment'></div>天子十二闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364757_comment'></div>马六种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364757_comment'></div>闲为一厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364757_comment'></div>马二百一十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364757_comment'></div>应乾之策也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364757_comment'></div>六厩成校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364757_comment'></div>五良一驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364757_comment'></div>是之谓小备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364757_comment'></div>校有左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364757_comment'></div>闲成十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364757_comment'></div>合月之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364757_comment'></div>驽马三良马之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364757_comment'></div>凡三千四百五十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364757_comment'></div>是之谓大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364757_comment'></div>秦并一海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364757_comment'></div>六万骑之国马尽归之帝家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364757_comment'></div>则周制陋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364757_comment'></div>汉孝武当文景俭约之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364757_comment'></div>雄卫霍张皇之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364757_comment'></div>勒兵塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364757_comment'></div>厩马有四十万匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364757_comment'></div>及东汉魏晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364757_comment'></div>国马陵夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364757_comment'></div>不可复逮武帝时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364757_comment'></div>后魏以胡马入洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364757_comment'></div>蹴蹋千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364757_comment'></div>军阵之容虽壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364757_comment'></div>和銮之仪亦阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364757_comment'></div>大唐接周隋乱离之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364757_comment'></div>承天下征战之弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364757_comment'></div>鸠括残烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364757_comment'></div>仅得牝牡三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364757_comment'></div>从赤岸泽徙之陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364757_comment'></div>始命太仆张万岁葺其政焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364757_comment'></div>而奕代载德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364757_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>纂修</span>其绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364757_comment'></div>肇自贞观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364757_comment'></div>成于麟德四十年閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364757_comment'></div>马至七十万六千匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364757_comment'></div>置八使以董之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364757_comment'></div>设四十八监以掌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364757_comment'></div>跨陇西金城平凉天水四郡之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364757_comment'></div>幅员千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364757_comment'></div>犹为隘狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364757_comment'></div>更析八监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364757_comment'></div>布于河曲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>丰旷</span>之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364757_comment'></div>乃能容之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364757_comment'></div>于斯之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364757_comment'></div>天下以一缣易一马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364757_comment'></div>秦汉之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364757_comment'></div>未始闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364757_comment'></div>张氏中废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364757_comment'></div>马官乱职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364757_comment'></div>或夷狄外攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364757_comment'></div>或师圉内寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364757_comment'></div>垂拱之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364757_comment'></div>二十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364757_comment'></div>潜耗大半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364757_comment'></div>所存盖寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364757_comment'></div>开元神武皇帝登大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364757_comment'></div>受灵符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364757_comment'></div>水瑞感而河龙出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364757_comment'></div>星精应而天驷下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364757_comment'></div>二年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364757_comment'></div>帝乃心腑善畜之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364757_comment'></div>卜福祐宜生之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364757_comment'></div>俾领内外闲厩使焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364757_comment'></div>即开府霍国公其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364757_comment'></div>公名毛仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364757_comment'></div>姓王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364757_comment'></div>开元佐命之元勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364757_comment'></div>东国亡王之后裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364757_comment'></div>四伯辅禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364757_comment'></div>与治水之谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364757_comment'></div>四七兴汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364757_comment'></div>在经星之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364757_comment'></div>清明虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364757_comment'></div>察含冰鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364757_comment'></div>筹谋先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364757_comment'></div>虑出蓍龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364757_comment'></div>竭无私之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364757_comment'></div>而善归天造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364757_comment'></div>输不懈之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364757_comment'></div>而元同日用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364757_comment'></div>故得腾跃风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364757_comment'></div>攀附日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364757_comment'></div>策功第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364757_comment'></div>承恩莫二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364757_comment'></div>庭罗魏绛之钟鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364757_comment'></div>第赏堂邑之山林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364757_comment'></div>文马蕃锡于晋侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364757_comment'></div>御衣亟分于韩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364757_comment'></div>庶姜如玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364757_comment'></div>则降荣彤管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364757_comment'></div>众子垂髫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364757_comment'></div>则抱拜朱茀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364757_comment'></div>圣人之见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364757_comment'></div>必犹尔为之四顾而满志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364757_comment'></div>圣人之不见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364757_comment'></div>乃恤然若无与乐其天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364757_comment'></div>仲尼所谓是必才全而德不形者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364757_comment'></div>夫其处身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364757_comment'></div>则立无跂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364757_comment'></div>正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364757_comment'></div>视无还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364757_comment'></div>端也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364757_comment'></div>听无耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364757_comment'></div>诚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364757_comment'></div>言无远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364757_comment'></div>慎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364757_comment'></div>国有忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364757_comment'></div>未尝不戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364757_comment'></div>国有庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364757_comment'></div>未尝不怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364757_comment'></div>其御下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364757_comment'></div>则明利害之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364757_comment'></div>阜财求之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364757_comment'></div>使之趋善而避恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364757_comment'></div>怀德而畏威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364757_comment'></div>身不离于阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364757_comment'></div>令远行于坰牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364757_comment'></div>亦有不学而暗合于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364757_comment'></div>未更而悬辨其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364757_comment'></div>然其从政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364757_comment'></div>必问于遗训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364757_comment'></div>而资于故实者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364757_comment'></div>若夫春祭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_128_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>马祖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364757_comment'></div>夏祭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_129_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>先牧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364757_comment'></div>秋祭马社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364757_comment'></div>冬祭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>马步</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364757_comment'></div>敬其本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364757_comment'></div>日中而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364757_comment'></div>日中而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364757_comment'></div>禁原燎牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364757_comment'></div>除蓐衅厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364757_comment'></div>时其事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364757_comment'></div>洁泉美荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364757_comment'></div>庌凉栈湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364757_comment'></div>翘足而陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364757_comment'></div>交颈相靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364757_comment'></div>宣其性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364757_comment'></div>攻驹教駣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364757_comment'></div>讲驭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_144_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>臧仆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364757_comment'></div>刻之剔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364757_comment'></div>羁之策之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364757_comment'></div>就其才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364757_comment'></div>不反其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364757_comment'></div>故亲人乐艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364757_comment'></div>节乐如舞之心自生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364757_comment'></div>不穷其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364757_comment'></div>故闉扼鸷曼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364757_comment'></div>窃辔诡衔之态不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364757_comment'></div>尔乃举其神异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364757_comment'></div>则有騊駼騕袅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364757_comment'></div>乘黄兹白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364757_comment'></div>来仪外厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364757_comment'></div>呈伎内枥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364757_comment'></div>朝刷阆风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364757_comment'></div>夕洗天泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364757_comment'></div>圣皇一驭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364757_comment'></div>长寿万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364757_comment'></div>别其种类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364757_comment'></div>则有妍蹄繁鬣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364757_comment'></div>小领远志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364757_comment'></div>曰龙曰騋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364757_comment'></div>曰戎曰骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364757_comment'></div>差其毛物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364757_comment'></div>则有苍白骊黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364757_comment'></div>骍紫驈皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364757_comment'></div>骓駓驒骆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364757_comment'></div>骃騢骝雒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364757_comment'></div>駂駮驓駩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364757_comment'></div>騧骐騽騝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364757_comment'></div>豪骭●8B6B足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364757_comment'></div>狼尾鱼目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1364757_comment'></div>宗庙齐豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1364757_comment'></div>戎事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_178_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/178/Comments/0")'>齐力</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364757_comment'></div>田猎齐足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1364757_comment'></div>罔不毕有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1364757_comment'></div>元年牧马二十四万匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1364757_comment'></div>十三年乃四十三万匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1364757_comment'></div>初有牛三万五千头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1364757_comment'></div>是年亦五万头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1364757_comment'></div>初有羊十一万二千口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1364757_comment'></div>是年乃亦二十八万六千口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1364757_comment'></div>皇帝东巡狩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1364757_comment'></div>封岱岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1364757_comment'></div>辇辂既陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1364757_comment'></div>羽卫咸备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1364757_comment'></div>大驾百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364757_comment'></div>烟尘一色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364757_comment'></div>其外又有闲人万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364757_comment'></div>散马千队。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364757_comment'></div>骨必殊貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364757_comment'></div>毛不离群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364757_comment'></div>行如动地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364757_comment'></div>止若屯云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364757_comment'></div>百蛮震耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364757_comment'></div>四方抃跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364757_comment'></div>威怀纷纭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364757_comment'></div>壮观挥霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1364757_comment'></div>回衡饮至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1364757_comment'></div>朝廷宴乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364757_comment'></div>上顾谓太仆少卿兼秦州都督监牧都副使张景顺曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364757_comment'></div>吾马几何其蕃育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364757_comment'></div>卿之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364757_comment'></div>对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364757_comment'></div>帝之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1364757_comment'></div>仲之令也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1364757_comment'></div>臣何力之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1364757_comment'></div>因具上其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364757_comment'></div>帝用嘉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364757_comment'></div>霍公口无伐辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364757_comment'></div>貌无德色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364757_comment'></div>朝髦庠齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1364757_comment'></div>歆以多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1364757_comment'></div>于是明威将军行右卫郎将南使梁守忠忠武将军行左羽林中郎将西使冯嘉泰右千牛长史北使张知古左骁卫中郎将兼盐州刺史盐州监牧使张景遵陇州别驾修武县男东宫监牧韦衡都使判官果毅齐琛总监韦绩及五使长户三万一千人佥曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1364757_comment'></div>自开府庇我十三年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1364757_comment'></div>畜有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_220_1364757", 1364757, "Clauses/220/Comments/0")'>娩息</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1364757_comment'></div>人无乏匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364757_comment'></div>克厌帝心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364690_comment'></div>应时摧败。元恶渠魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364690_comment'></div>乘势俘戮。只轮匹马。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年6月16日</a>　玄宗诏张说在家修史，有表。作品：《谢修史表》<div id='poem_1364678' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364678' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年6月</a>　杨执一正月薨，十五年六月与夫人独孤氏合葬于咸阳之洪渎川。说撰执一碑，约在家修史间。作品：《赠户部尚书河东公杨君神道碑》<div id='poem_1364779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364779' id='poem_sentence_1_1364779_comment'></div>事因感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364779_comment'></div>气概生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364779_comment'></div>时逢<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_5_1364779_comment'></div>桃李灼灼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364779_comment'></div>不自言于蹊径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364779_comment'></div>松柏青青。<div 西安（长安）

id='poem_sentence_11_1364750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=693&endYear=693')">693年3月</a>　约本年前后，迁京兆府旧领十八县某县任丞尉之类吏职。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='520b34b33a8b431d884d649d34a07824_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("520b34b33a8b431d884d649d34a07824");'><span id='520b34b33a8b431d884d649d34a07824_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=696&endYear=696')">696年7月</a>　约本年七、八月间迁新职，似应为京兆府（谱作同州）六曹参军之类职务七月，为西京留守武某（似为攸宜、懿宗或攸望）草以下五表。作品：《为留守奏庆山醴泉表》<div id='poem_1364640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为留守奏庆山醴泉表</a><span class='authorDate'>（696年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364640")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364640'>臣某言。臣闻至德洞微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364640_comment'></div>天鉴不远。休徵秘景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364640_comment'></div>时和则见。是知绵代旷历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364640_comment'></div>庆牒祥经。帝王有必感之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364640_comment'></div>神灵无虚应之瑞。伏惟天册金轮圣神皇帝陛下金镜御天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364640_comment'></div>璿衡考政。钦若元象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364640_comment'></div>宏济苍氓。茂功将大造混成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364640_comment'></div>纯化与阳和俱扇。朝百神之乐职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364640_comment'></div>宅万国之欢心。嘉气内充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364640_comment'></div>淫雨外息。岂止摇风纪月之草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364640_comment'></div>列莳于阶除。仪箫衔箓之禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364640_comment'></div>相鸣于户阁而已。固有发祯厚载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364640_comment'></div>抽贶泉源。表元德之潜通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364640_comment'></div>显黄祇之昭报。臣于六月二十五日得所部万年县令郑国忠状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364640_comment'></div>称去六月十四日。县界霸陵乡有庆山见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364640_comment'></div>醴泉出。臣谨差户曹参军孙履直对山中百姓检问得状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364640_comment'></div>其山平地涌拔。周回数里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364640_comment'></div>列置三峰。齐高百仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364640_comment'></div>山见之日。天青无云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364640_comment'></div>异雷雨之迁徙。非崖岸之骞震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364640_comment'></div>歘尔隆崇。巍然蓊郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364640_comment'></div>阡陌如旧。草树不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364640_comment'></div>验益地之祥图。知太乙之灵化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364640_comment'></div>山南又有醴泉三道。引注三池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364640_comment'></div>分流接润。连山对浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364640_comment'></div>各深丈馀。广数百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364640_comment'></div>味色甘洁。特异常泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364640_comment'></div>比仙浆于轩后。均愈疾于汉代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364640_comment'></div>臣按孙氏瑞应图曰。庆山者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364640_comment'></div>德茂则生。臣又按白武通曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364640_comment'></div>醴泉者。义泉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364640_comment'></div>可以养老。常出京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364640_comment'></div>礼斗威仪曰。人君乘土而王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364640_comment'></div>其政太平。则醴泉涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364640_comment'></div>潜潭巴曰。君臣和德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364640_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1364640", 1364640, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>道度</span>协中。则醴泉出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364640_comment'></div>臣窃以五行推之。六月土王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364640_comment'></div>神在未母之象也。土为宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364640_comment'></div>君之义也。水为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364640_comment'></div>土为信。水伏于土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364640_comment'></div>臣之道也。水相于金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364640_comment'></div>子之佐也。今土以月王而高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364640_comment'></div>水从土制而静。天意若曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364640_comment'></div>母王君尊。良臣善相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364640_comment'></div>仁化致理。德茂时平之应也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364640_comment'></div>臣又以山为镇国。水实利人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364640_comment'></div>县有万年之名。山得三仙之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364640_comment'></div>此盖金舆景福。宝祚昌图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364640_comment'></div>邦固不移之基。君永无疆之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364640_comment'></div>自永昌之后。迄于兹辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364640_comment'></div>地宝屡升。神山再耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364640_comment'></div>未若连岩结庆。并泌疏甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364640_comment'></div>群瑞同区。二美齐举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364640_comment'></div>高视古今。曾无拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364640_comment'></div>信可以纪元立号。荐庙登郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364640_comment'></div>彰贲亿龄。愉衍万宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364640_comment'></div>臣辱司京尹。忝寄留台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364640_comment'></div>牧西夏之疲人。荷东蕃之馀宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364640_comment'></div>游泳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1364640", 1364640, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>鸿露</span>。震悚明神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364640_comment'></div>禧祉有归。光启兹部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364640_comment'></div>喜睹殊观。实百恒流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364640_comment'></div>踊跃一隅。驰诚双阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364640_comment'></div>伏请宣付史馆。颁示朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364640_comment'></div>无任凫藻之至。谨遣某官绘图奉进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364640_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1364640_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=696&endYear=696')">696年7月</a>　本年七月在京兆府，为西京留守武某（应为攸宜或攸望）草此表。作品：《为留守奏瑞禾杏表》《为留守作贺崛山表》《为留守奏羊乳獐表》《为留守奏嘉禾表》<div id='poem_1364641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364641?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为留守奏瑞禾杏表</a><span class='authorDate'>（696年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364641")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364641_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364641'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364641'>臣闻天微地杳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364641_comment'></div>惟圣能通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364641_comment'></div>物宝灵禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364641_comment'></div>在德斯感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364641_comment'></div>伏惟天册金轮圣神皇帝陛下覆翼万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364641_comment'></div>植生群类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364641_comment'></div>化行至道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364641_comment'></div>风流太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364641_comment'></div>白耀青光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364641_comment'></div>目日月之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364641_comment'></div>赤文元甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364641_comment'></div>手河洛之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364641_comment'></div>既庆溢于山泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364641_comment'></div>又嘉贲于草木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364641_comment'></div>臣今月三日得所部万年县令郑国忠状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364641_comment'></div>言县界内霸陵乡新出庆山南之醴泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364641_comment'></div>北岸有瑞杏三树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364641_comment'></div>再叶重花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364641_comment'></div>嘉禾三本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364641_comment'></div>同茎合穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364641_comment'></div>臣谨差司兵参军郑味元检覆皆实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364641_comment'></div>臣谨按孙柔之瑞应图曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364641_comment'></div>嘉禾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364641_comment'></div>五谷之长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364641_comment'></div>王者德茂则生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364641_comment'></div>昔炎帝教洽人心而嘉禾秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364641_comment'></div>周公理合天道而嘉禾丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364641_comment'></div>臣又以事可理推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364641_comment'></div>物有类验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364641_comment'></div>蜀桑异叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364641_comment'></div>李定知其有祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364641_comment'></div>汉木奇枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364641_comment'></div>终军以为无外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364641_comment'></div>今植物摇落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364641_comment'></div>而瑞杏繁滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364641_comment'></div>所谓仁育之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364641_comment'></div>行于肃杀之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364641_comment'></div>此盖圣道隆渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364641_comment'></div>灵祚宏多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364641_comment'></div>朱萼素花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364641_comment'></div>彰孝理于诗传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364641_comment'></div>一茎九颖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364641_comment'></div>合德耀于祥经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364641_comment'></div>旷代殊珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364641_comment'></div>崇朝累集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364641_comment'></div>方俟山流石髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364641_comment'></div>杏茂仙林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364641_comment'></div>醴挹轩浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364641_comment'></div>禾登尧膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364641_comment'></div>受天介福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364641_comment'></div>锡帝长龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364641_comment'></div>觐王母于昆台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364641_comment'></div>朝神人于谷口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364641_comment'></div>今绿苗尚䓲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364641_comment'></div>黄粒未成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364641_comment'></div>当须晚秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364641_comment'></div>不获早献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364641_comment'></div>臣忝尹兹部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364641_comment'></div>频瞩洪休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364641_comment'></div>抃跃之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364641_comment'></div>倍万常品。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1364641_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1364642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364642?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364642'>臣闻山川变见。如来有得道之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364642_comment'></div>国土远移。至人任不思之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364642_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下宏惠福深。勤人愿满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364642_comment'></div>莲花授记。应上圣之降生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364642_comment'></div>贝叶开图。握大雄之宝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364642_comment'></div>司户参军孙履直伏承臣奏所部万年县新出庆山醴泉。乃有天竺真僧于春首献状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364642_comment'></div>若以梵音所记。此是祇阇山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364642_comment'></div>恒河沙佛。必经林下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364642_comment'></div>虚空众圣。常处岩閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364642_comment'></div>隐见外方。涌秀中土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364642_comment'></div>岑泉可识。体类宛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364642_comment'></div>感应十号之尊。示见千轮之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364642_comment'></div>此实天威无碍。地宝有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364642_comment'></div>化焜耀于裁成。理窈冥于言说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364642_comment'></div>但瞻三山丹壁。奄灵鹫而飞来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364642_comment'></div>三泉渌池。逐神龙而吐沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364642_comment'></div>峰高八百。协周室之隆基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364642_comment'></div>地得万年。祈皇灵之资始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364642_comment'></div>儒书分载。望偈希闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364642_comment'></div>加以坚固开林。吉祥被草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364642_comment'></div>重花瑞杏。藻岫红源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364642_comment'></div>九颖嘉禾。葱峦黛壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364642_comment'></div>原临白鹿。识鹿苑之仙游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364642_comment'></div>路迩朱城。悟王城之钟听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364642_comment'></div>方俟回舆雪岭。厌香积于群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364642_comment'></div>沈璧天池。荫灵枝于下国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364642_comment'></div>吹法螺而朝玉帛。乘瑞象而会天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364642_comment'></div>溢宇流观。殊邻浃庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364642_comment'></div>臣守符京郡。奉神岳于郊畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364642_comment'></div>系叶皇柯。仰慈云于油露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364642_comment'></div>喜抃之极。倍百恒诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364642_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1364642_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1364643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364643?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为留守奏羊乳獐表</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1364643'>臣某言。臣闻灵感无方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364643_comment'></div>每先时以见象。神鉴不昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364643_comment'></div>必凭物以示人。有德著而休归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364643_comment'></div>或祥来而事应。伏惟天册金轮圣神皇帝陛下端冕驭天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364643_comment'></div>舞干柔远。南越瑞贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364643_comment'></div>久通驿而归仁。西域奇山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364643_comment'></div>近随方而应圣。臣今日得所部万年县令郑国忠状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364643_comment'></div>送新出庆山下羖牝羊乳獐麑一头。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1364643", 1364643, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>狎扰</span>因依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364643_comment'></div>动息随恋。如从所产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364643_comment'></div>若素同群。理有可嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364643_comment'></div>事无前例。窃以异类相育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364643_comment'></div>外方慕化之徵。野畜自驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364643_comment'></div>荒服来王之兆。必有远夷解辫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364643_comment'></div>欢心百兽之庭。犷俗怀音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364643_comment'></div>稽颡三朝之会。臣言可验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364643_comment'></div>翘足是期。昔马或生羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364643_comment'></div>易占得人安之体。犬时养彘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364643_comment'></div>天镜显代康之文。援此比踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364643_comment'></div>实为同贯。况复晨饮醴浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364643_comment'></div>夕下灵山。翳仙杏之奇花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364643_comment'></div>拾嘉禾之馀穗。羊祯甚玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364643_comment'></div>獐庆如银。晦朔未移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364643_comment'></div>祥符累集。福应之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364643_comment'></div>前古未闻。臣忝尹京都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364643_comment'></div>屡荐嘉瑞。抃跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364643_comment'></div>兼倍恒流。谨差某官奉表随进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364643_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1364643_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1364644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364644?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为留守奏嘉禾表</a><span class='authorDate'>（696年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364644")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364644'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364644'>臣某言。臣闻天听自人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364644_comment'></div>神和在德。代非乏瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364644_comment'></div>䍐遇开泰之期。福不虚徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364644_comment'></div>必俟休明之主。伏惟天册金轮圣神皇帝陛下仁覆万灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364644_comment'></div>孝理四海。功莫高于尊祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364644_comment'></div>道莫大于配天。严备郊禋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364644_comment'></div>崇肃宗祀。秩百王之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364644_comment'></div>兼六代之乐。恩溢胶庠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364644_comment'></div>训优更老。政每光于帝籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364644_comment'></div>役不紊于农时。嘉气横游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364644_comment'></div>祥风纷洒。腾文炜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364644_comment'></div>九光连合于贞明。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1364644", 1364644, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>逸辈殊伦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364644_comment'></div>百宝骈滋于动植。臣今月日奉进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364644_comment'></div>告望凤台庆山醴泉之瑞。其日于山陵东柏城内得嘉禾一本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364644_comment'></div>臣初见众苗亘垄。香颖垂秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364644_comment'></div>嘉玩繁滋。欲观稃粒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364644_comment'></div>左右无识。折以呈臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364644_comment'></div>异其绿叶绶舒。葱芒璧秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364644_comment'></div>熟视奇状。乃知嘉祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364644_comment'></div>下则异亩合茎。上又同连双穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364644_comment'></div>昔雍熙之代。政理之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364644_comment'></div>虽导出应时。而生不择地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364644_comment'></div>未有托根神域。彰孝德之能深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364644_comment'></div>吐秀寿宫。助粢盛之丰洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364644_comment'></div>此盖睿诚通感。灵佑降祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364644_comment'></div>中古以来。未睹斯美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364644_comment'></div>臣籍庆宗枝。久沐星潢之润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364644_comment'></div>躬持瑞颖。预奉天保之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364644_comment'></div>抃悦之诚。倍兼恒品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364644_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1364644_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=696&endYear=696')">696年10月</a>　迁新职，与老朋友谷倚等在京兆府留守司聚会时作。作品：《会友序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此序作年，周睿《张说研究》系开元十四年（726），大误。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='3badda0aebf04dfba923a49f42799897_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3badda0aebf04dfba923a49f42799897");'><span id='3badda0aebf04dfba923a49f42799897_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=698&endYear=701')">698-701年</a>，32-35岁</div><div id='3badda0aebf04dfba923a49f42799897' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=698&endYear=698')">698年6月</a>　本年在京任右补阙说与杨令一家族关系甚密。作品：《大周故宣威将军杨君碑》<div id='poem_1364761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大周故宣威将军杨君碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（698年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364761")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364761_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364761'>公讳令一。字令一。太州仙掌人也。隋司徒观王之元孙。周孝明高后之归孙。今司卫卿之元子。维有隋接三统。建万国。我高祖以同姓为王。维皇周敦九族。叙百官。我诸杨以外戚而贵。公体元黄之纯粹。承河山之丕绪。孝乎内炳。忠焉外均。性与天和。道合仁爱。收恤孤老。分产疏属。泰于周施。约于妻子。加以乐善而好学。降尊而容众。能辩乐和。思柔酒德。容止可度。温温如也。文章可观。彬彬如也。泉英皎穆。当世硕士。与之游焉。而曰君子。若夫汉魏舅族。有恩泽之封。公卿门子。有良家之侍。公浮云世禄。匪石儒风。究乎王道之纪纲。明乎人事之终始。年十九。举进士高第。授潞州参军。转干牛冑曹。迁洛阳尉。从班次也。居无何。拜朝散大夫。行通事舍人。俄而加太中大夫检校天官员外郎。夫行人之在周礼。方国是接。公修其政令。帝曰余嘉。郎官之著汉仪。列宿是应。公司其典故。时称邦则。国家左贤右戚。一武一文。以公地望羽仪。寄深虎旅。除宣威将军行右卫翊府郎将。僶俛从事。非其好也。初公时为郎也。辽戎悖虐。作患幽冀。皇上燠休下人。故我有神兵之役。选达权靡盬之吏。佐猛毅维城之师。乃下制以公为兵曹焉。实有密赞军政。独飞长策。岂云卒乘辑睦。戎机式序。若此而巳哉。俾雷霆飙动。剿慝殿邦。威元菟。怀黄龙。马未汗而狄尽。人未疲而兵戢者。公与有力也。及班师振旅。册勋踰时。帝用咨有司之违古。念有功之未禄。将迂德命霈多勤有日矣。方当翼大化增三光之明。熙天秩垂九德之声。昊天不惠。厉气流行。如何斯人。胡不眉寿。年四十一。圣历元年夏六月辛丑。遘疾而卒。呜呼哀哉。梁木未施。予道不究。呱呱稚嗣。仰号苍穹。哀哀严亲。惴临泉谷。遐迩寮旧。暨乎钦风未识之徒。罔不尽朋悲而辈欷矣。天子悯焉。吊之以玉册。赠之以锦衾。群公伤焉。诔德于素旆。图休于青史。粤乙卯。假葬于合宫县平乐乡之北阜郭门十里邙山西。冈峦万古之阡。都邑九原之地。隧寄新陇。魂怀故域。藐是诸孤。未遑归葬。平生志事。孰巳焉哉。厥弟五人。比才连誉。曰践一献一循一惟一尚一等。因心则友。世称万石之闺门。死丧之戚。吾见伯淮之兄弟。佥曰我图后事。日月除乎哉。龟云此地。陵谷居乎哉。乃布哀友生。记词怀旧。迹德表墓。示之来昆。其铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364761'>洪河南注。少华西峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364761_comment'></div>氤氲灵会。生此君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364761_comment'></div>生此君子。维国之纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364761_comment'></div>宣慈惠和。礼乐文史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364761_comment'></div>敦锡宗类。汲扬美否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364761_comment'></div>勤然济物。若不由已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364761_comment'></div>克明从训。诞敷厥美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364761_comment'></div>修词北阙。润色东里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364761_comment'></div>挥翰文昌。列星顺晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364761_comment'></div>交戟禁卫。为王爪士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364761_comment'></div>允文允武。翁归是比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364761_comment'></div>畴曰御寇。谂军北鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364761_comment'></div>攘狄黄龙。济师苍兕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364761_comment'></div>将王元默。繄公是恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364761_comment'></div>帝懿乃勋。将图膴仕。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364761_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1364761_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=699&endYear=699')">699年4月</a>　本年在京任右补阙有送毛某诗序。作品：《送毛明府诗序》<div id='poem_1364722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364722'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364722'>昔之谓良宰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364722_comment'></div>讲道议行。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364722_comment'></div>远送邯郸之陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364722_comment'></div>爱而不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364722_comment'></div>同夫树萱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1364722_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=699&endYear=699')">699年</a>　约本年，在京与李峤、阎朝隠、徐彦伯、薛曜、李尚隐、魏知古、于季子、王无竞、沈佺期、王适、徐坚、尹元凯、马吉甫、元希声、李处正、乔（原作高）备、刘知几、房元阳、宋之问、崔湜、常元旦、杨齐哲、富嘉谟、蒋凤等二十六学士于内殿修《三教珠英》作品：《唐故凉州长史元君石柱铭》<div id='poem_1364827' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364827' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364827?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故凉州长史元君石柱铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（699年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364827")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1364827_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364827'>公讳仁惠。字某。河南洛阳人也。昔帝轩命子。爰宅幽都。天神降祚。遂荒北岳。其后日月运行。云雷经始。坛场邺洛。据天地之图。带砺山河。建王侯之国。公即魏昭成皇帝之十代孙。中书令濮阳王顺之曾孙也。大父雄。魏濮阳王。后改封武陵王。昆吾伯嗣。越在濮阳之墟。琅琊王子。别封武陵之郡。宇文朝降为武陵公太府卿秦州总管。微子去国。不替旧章。薛侯来朝。于焉降等。父冑。隋濠豫二州刺史右卫大将军。袭封武陵公。翼亮隋室。宏济王基。有佐命之元勋。承异朝之延赏。文武藉甚。贻燕深长。公受金行之正性。承冠代之隆烈。幼见岐嶷。夙闻声器。灵台云秀。绳墨之宰无施。雅韵天成。金石之师何力。属隋纲弛紊。神弃不歆。卿族衣冠。日失其序。独寐寤宿。永怀盘涧之人。藏器待时。未射高墉之隼。唐祖龙飞天宇。鹤版岩林。授公右千牛录事。黉闬之恩旧也。高皇邑子。既与卢绾同衣。光武学徒。则有严陵共宿。久之。以公事免为巂州法曹。又历循州河源滑州灵昌二县令。克已为政。蛮貊化忠信之言。直道与人。仕巳无喜愠之色。永徽在历。硕真搆难。群凶既剪。江界萧条。帝念疲氓。畴兹俾乂。乃授公睦州雉山县令。乘驲而往。下车作则。江逋海盗。革面来威。然后网鸠人。峻策羁吏。闲田尽辟。鳏寡委犬彘之馀。绝涧无游。豪猾屏蚕渔之气。我有礼乐。达于山川鬼神。物应休祯。孚于鸟兽草木。朝廷异之。拜朝散大夫。行隆州阆中令。未至。改授雍州渭南令。观人设教。异邑同风。迁隆州司马。寻加朝散大夫。守凉州都督府长史。分乘两蕃。人康颂作。化澄巴濮。无侵橘柚之园。教溢河湟。不饮蒲萄之酒。离歌就●(89D6)。岁梦临辰。命踬修途。荣惭厚德。总章二年。终于官舍。春秋七十有三。夫人安定梁氏。文伯之妻。君子以为知礼。孟轲之母。良史称其能贤。齐德茂于昭涂。合祔期于幽隧。有子怀贞。斧藻诗礼。佩践义方。承家有馥。芝兰如也。历官右司员外郎太子舍人。而罹事徙居。复归旧土。履霜露于三纪。无改素冠之行。违桑梓于十载。还守青门之田。勤孝在乎追远。丰感思乎备物。武陵公之茔域。今顺陵柏城之内也。山园有禁。奉瞻靡及。粤以圣历二年岁次月朔。别卜宅于咸阳县肺浮原合葬焉。公孝友纯深。风标峻起。门无杂客。家有严君。而佐郡为邦。宏风迈德。执法不挠。去邪勿疑。仲由之政事。叔向之遗直。岂称论之典有阙。范则之容将坠。仰惟代姻。恭承哀托。郭有道之故事。无愧蔡邕。赵文子之将游。永怀随会。寓词楹石。式题贤垄。其铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364827'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364827'>大哉乾元，我族资始。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364827'>有国伊魏，曰天之子。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364827'>皇羲姓风，帝姬氏水。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364827'>创业垂统，郁乎旧史。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364827'>崇德象贤，允也重轨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364827'>贞涵玉性，润结璇源。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364827'>武公之子，平王之孙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364827'>川流长直，光气熊浑。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364827'>孝深柏颡，义重荆璠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364827'>白圭比节，黄金敌言。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364827'>行实刚简，游无谄黩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364827'>学妙神教，书能鬼哭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364827'>避彼屯运，盘桓空谷。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=699&endYear=699')">699年</a>　说与郭元振关系极密，宰相宗楚客令人诬告凉州都督郭元振有异图，说与狄仁杰等25人，以身死籍没保其无异图。作品：《送郭大[夫]元振再使吐蕃》<div id='poem_24152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24152' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=700&endYear=700')">700年7月3日</a>　本年在年在京修《三教珠英》修书期间，与沈佺期、徐坚、尹元凯、魏知古、马吉甫、元希声、乔备、宋之问、崔湜等交密。作品：《谏幸三阳宫表》<div id='poem_1364685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏避暑三阳宫疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（700年7月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364685'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364685'>右补阙臣说言。臣闻明主不恶切谏以博览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364685_comment'></div>忠臣不敢隐忠以曲辞。伏愿陛下特加裁察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364685_comment'></div>臣说诚惶诚恐顿首顿首死罪死罪。陛下屯万乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364685_comment'></div>幸离宫。暑退凉归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364685_comment'></div>未降还旨。愚臣固陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364685_comment'></div>恐非长策。请为陛下陈其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364685_comment'></div>三阳宫去洛城一百六十里。有伊水之隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364685_comment'></div>崿坂之峻。过夏涉秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364685_comment'></div>水潦方积。道坏山险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364685_comment'></div>不通转运。河广无梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364685_comment'></div>咫尺千里。扈从兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364685_comment'></div>日费资给。连雨弥旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364685_comment'></div>即难周济。陛下太仓武库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364685_comment'></div>并在都邑。红粟利器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364685_comment'></div>蕴若山邱。奈何去宗庙之上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364685_comment'></div>安山谷之僻处。是犹倒持剑戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364685_comment'></div>示人鐏柄。臣窃为陛下不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364685_comment'></div>夫祸变之生。在人所忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364685_comment'></div>故曰安乐必戒。无行所悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364685_comment'></div>此不可止之理一也。告成褊小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364685_comment'></div>万方辐辏。填城溢郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364685_comment'></div>并插无所。排斥居人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364685_comment'></div>蓬宿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1364685", 1364685, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>草次</span>。风雨暴至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364685_comment'></div>不知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1364685", 1364685, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>庇托</span>。孤茕老疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364685_comment'></div>流转衢巷。陛下作人父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364685_comment'></div>将若之何。此不可止之理二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364685_comment'></div>造设奇巧。诱掖上心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364685_comment'></div>凿山疏观。竭流涨海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364685_comment'></div>俯穷地脉。仰出云端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364685_comment'></div>易山川之气。夺农桑之土。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=700&endYear=700')">700年</a>　为老朋友郭元振撰行状。作品：《兵部尚书代国公赠少保郭公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（状又见谱“开元十年”下，此处重且误，当删。）</span><div id='poem_1364828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部尚书代国公赠少保郭公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（700年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364828")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364828'>公名震。字元振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364828_comment'></div>本太原阳曲人也。大父任相州汤阴令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364828_comment'></div>因居于魏。公少倜傥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364828_comment'></div>廓落有大志。仪观雄杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364828_comment'></div>身长七尺。美须髯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364828_comment'></div>十六入太学。与薛稷赵彦昭同业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364828_comment'></div>时有家仆至。寄钱四百千以为学粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364828_comment'></div>忽有一人。缞服叩门云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364828_comment'></div>五世未葬。棺柩各在一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364828_comment'></div>今欲齐举大事。苦乏资用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364828_comment'></div>闻君家信至。颇能相济否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364828_comment'></div>不问姓名。以车载去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364828_comment'></div>一无所留。深为赵薛所诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364828_comment'></div>公怡然曰。济彼大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364828_comment'></div>亦何诮焉。十八擢进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364828_comment'></div>其年判入高等。时辈皆以校书正字为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364828_comment'></div>公独请外官。授梓州通泉尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364828_comment'></div>至县。落拓不拘小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364828_comment'></div>尝铸钱。掠良人财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364828_comment'></div>以济四方。海内同声合气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364828_comment'></div>有至千万者。则天闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364828_comment'></div>驿徵引见。语至夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364828_comment'></div>甚奇之。问蜀川之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364828_comment'></div>对而不隐。令录旧文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364828_comment'></div>乃上古剑歌。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364828_comment'></div>君不见。昆吾铁冶飞炎烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364828_comment'></div>红光紫气俱赫然。良工煅炼凡几日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364828_comment'></div>铸得宝剑名龙泉。龙泉颜色如霜雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364828_comment'></div>良工咨嗟叹奇绝。琉璃玉匣吐莲花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364828_comment'></div>错镂金环生明月。正逢天下无风尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364828_comment'></div>幸且用防君子身。精光黯黯青蛇色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364828_comment'></div>文章片片绿龟鳞。非直结交游侠子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364828_comment'></div>亦曾亲近英雄人。那知中路遭弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364828_comment'></div>零落漂沦古狱边。虽则沈埋无所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364828_comment'></div>犹能夜夜气冲天。则天览而佳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364828_comment'></div>令写数十本。遍赐学士李峤阎朝隐等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364828_comment'></div>遂授右武卫冑曹右控鹤内供奉。寻迁奉宸监丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364828_comment'></div>属吐蕃请和亲。令报命至境上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364828_comment'></div>与赞普相见。宣国威命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364828_comment'></div>责其翻覆。长揖不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364828_comment'></div>瞋目视之。赞普曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364828_comment'></div>汉使多矣。无如公之诚信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364828_comment'></div>远近疆界。立谈悉定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364828_comment'></div>因遗金数十斤而还。公悉以进上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364828_comment'></div>奏言。揣彼上下之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364828_comment'></div>人倦其隶役久矣。咸愿早和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364828_comment'></div>大将论钦陵不争四镇。独不欲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364828_comment'></div>但国家每岁不绝其使。而钦陵常不禀命自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364828_comment'></div>彼蕃之人。怨钦陵日深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364828_comment'></div>望国恩日甚。设欲广举兵徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364828_comment'></div>难矣。斯乃反閒之微旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364828_comment'></div>必可使其上下俱怀猜阻矣。则天甚然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364828_comment'></div>无何。吐蕃君臣果相疑贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364828_comment'></div>遂诛钦陵。弟赞婆及其兄子莽布支并来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364828_comment'></div>公声名籍甚。授御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364828_comment'></div>加朝散大夫。迁主客郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364828_comment'></div>吐蕃与突厥连和。大入西河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364828_comment'></div>破数十城。围逼凉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364828_comment'></div>节度出城战没。蹂禾稼斗米万钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364828_comment'></div>则天方御洛城门酺宴。凉州使至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364828_comment'></div>因辍乐。拜公为凉州都督兼陇右诸军大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364828_comment'></div>调秦中五万人。号二十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364828_comment'></div>以赴河西。公至凉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364828_comment'></div>吐蕃素闻威名。相谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364828_comment'></div>我赞普犹惧。吾辈何可敌乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364828_comment'></div>相率而去。公收合馀众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364828_comment'></div>缮修城壁。施法令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364828_comment'></div>屯田一年而复。公之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364828_comment'></div>公以凉州西拒吐蕃。北有突厥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364828_comment'></div>久示其弱。未扬天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364828_comment'></div>因徵陇右兵马一百二十万。号二百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364828_comment'></div>集于湟州。营幕千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364828_comment'></div>举烽号令。时宗楚客为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364828_comment'></div>素与公不协。令人告变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364828_comment'></div>则天惶惧。计无所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364828_comment'></div>狄仁杰魏元忠韦安石李峤宋璟姚崇赵彦昭韦嗣立张说二十五人抗表请保。如公有异图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364828_comment'></div>并请身死籍没。则天由是稍安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364828_comment'></div>兵既大集。人又知教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364828_comment'></div>分兵十道齐进。过青海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364828_comment'></div>几至赞普牙帐。赞普屈膝请和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364828_comment'></div>献马三千匹。金三万斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364828_comment'></div>牛羊不可胜数。公大张军威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364828_comment'></div>受其蕃礼而还。既伏西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364828_comment'></div>震威北狄。突厥献马二千匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364828_comment'></div>所获凉州人士。皆放归塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364828_comment'></div>从此方镇肃清。蕃落畏慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364828_comment'></div>令行禁止。道不拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364828_comment'></div>凡所规模制作。率为后法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364828_comment'></div>河西陇右十馀处。置生祠堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364828_comment'></div>立碑颂德。阎立均等为其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364828_comment'></div>寻有诏许入朝。公素无第宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364828_comment'></div>寄居友人之舍。候鼓入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364828_comment'></div>忽有人马前送状。开缄前人巳去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364828_comment'></div>状中惟有物数。而无姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364828_comment'></div>便于树下获骡马二十馀匹。帛三千匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364828_comment'></div>公曰。岂非太学请葬之士乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364828_comment'></div>因以买宅居止。薛稷赵彦昭闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364828_comment'></div>皆嗟叹良久。景龙年中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364828_comment'></div>宗楚客韦处讷等潜结朋党。憎功害能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364828_comment'></div>授公骁骑大将军兼安西大都护四镇经略使金山道大总管。时乌质勒久恃众倨傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364828_comment'></div>不屈朝廷。纵兵远掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364828_comment'></div>道路不通。公以众寡不敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364828_comment'></div>难以力制。因率麾下数十骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364828_comment'></div>径入部落。乌质勒大出兵卫出迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364828_comment'></div>望见公威容端毅。风鬣若神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364828_comment'></div>不觉屈膝。因而下拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364828_comment'></div>公宣国威命。抗声与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364828_comment'></div>自朝至暮。雪深尺馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364828_comment'></div>竟不移足。质勒频拜伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364828_comment'></div>语毕归帐。相去二十馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364828_comment'></div>质勒久立雪中。仓卒疾发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364828_comment'></div>是夜暴卒。其嗣子娑葛集诸将曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364828_comment'></div>汉使杀我君父。今须复雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364828_comment'></div>大举兵众将追杀。公闻质勒死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364828_comment'></div>迟明。素服来吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364828_comment'></div>道路相逢。兵围数匝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364828_comment'></div>娑葛见公忽来。未之敢逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364828_comment'></div>但言卫护汉使。公至其帐下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364828_comment'></div>大哭流涕。因抚定其嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364828_comment'></div>蕃人大喜。留数十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364828_comment'></div>助其葬事。娑葛献马三千匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364828_comment'></div>牛羊十馀万。移居千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364828_comment'></div>西域无事。道路肃清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364828_comment'></div>诸蕃闻之。遣使归降者十馀国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364828_comment'></div>时人语之曰。郭元振诡杀乌质勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364828_comment'></div>知娑葛与阙啜有衅。奏请移于瓜州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364828_comment'></div>制从之。会中书令宗楚客受金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364828_comment'></div>遂寝其事。公具以状闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364828_comment'></div>楚客恃势嘱请。召公将陷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364828_comment'></div>公不从。又奏请斩楚客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364828_comment'></div>清蕃落。时韦庶人窃弄国权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364828_comment'></div>中宗竟不之省也。初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364828_comment'></div>安西南有毒河源。远在葱岭西北河岸百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364828_comment'></div>人畜踏之者辄死。公威振西域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364828_comment'></div>所向无不从者。因验图经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364828_comment'></div>知其源。率兵三万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364828_comment'></div>历于阗康居大食等十馀国。所过之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364828_comment'></div>令供资粮。仍署其国王为左右总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364828_comment'></div>率兵前进。北至葱岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364828_comment'></div>牙帐前十二国王兵百馀万。其河源上有大树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364828_comment'></div>高千馀尺。垂阴数顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364828_comment'></div>大军至日。有黄龙绕树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364828_comment'></div>以口吐毒气而拒官军。三军悉睹焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364828_comment'></div>公手书操檄文。令左拾遗张宣抗声读之毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364828_comment'></div>黄龙解树而下。公率诸军诛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364828_comment'></div>数日方倒。聚而焚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364828_comment'></div>河源且绝。数十里内悉为良田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364828_comment'></div>在安西十馀年。四镇宁静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364828_comment'></div>韦庶人知政。屡徵不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364828_comment'></div>因下伪诏。令侍御史吕守素中丞冯家宾相继巡边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364828_comment'></div>欲将害之。未及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364828_comment'></div>皆为娑葛等诸蕃劫杀之。睿宗即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364828_comment'></div>徵拜太仆卿。敕至之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364828_comment'></div>举家进发。安西士庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364828_comment'></div>诸蕃酋长。号哭数百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364828_comment'></div>或剺面截耳。抗表请留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364828_comment'></div>因绐之而后即路。其至玉门关也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364828_comment'></div>去凉州八百里。河西诸州百姓蕃部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364828_comment'></div>闻公之至。贫者携壶浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364828_comment'></div>富者设供帐。联绵七百里不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364828_comment'></div>公旌节下玉门关。百姓望之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364828_comment'></div>宛转叫呼。声动岩谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364828_comment'></div>自朝至暮。传呼至凉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364828_comment'></div>凉州城中男女在衢路。并歌舞出城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364828_comment'></div>咸言我父至矣。通夜城门不受禁制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364828_comment'></div>都督司马逸客闻之。谓公近矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364828_comment'></div>陈兵出迎。会候骑至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364828_comment'></div>云始入玉门关。都督嗟叹良久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364828_comment'></div>且状闻。至京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364828_comment'></div>同中书门下三品。加银青光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364828_comment'></div>迁兵部尚书。封馆陶县男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364828_comment'></div>依旧知政事。寻转吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364828_comment'></div>知选举。嘱请不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364828_comment'></div>大收草泽。睿宗屡下诏褒美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364828_comment'></div>后默啜大寇边。拜刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364828_comment'></div>充朔方道行军大总管。筑丰安定远等城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364828_comment'></div>以拒贼路。寻加金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364828_comment'></div>睿宗犹豫不决。诸相皆阿谀顺旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1364828_comment'></div>惟公廷争不受诏。及举兵诛窦怀贞等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364828_comment'></div>干戈作衅。太上皇帝既命朕除讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364828_comment'></div>元振又驰奉宸极。始则赉予为弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364828_comment'></div>永誓山河。可进封代国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364828_comment'></div>赐实封四百户。物一千段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364828_comment'></div>子五品官。寻兼御史大夫天下行军大元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364828_comment'></div>是岁。大徵兵众。<div class='inline'
