id='poem_sentence_218_1364828_comment'></div>颇失军容。责情放逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1364828_comment'></div>将收后效。可饶州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1364828_comment'></div>未至。卒于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364828_comment'></div>时年五十八。有集二十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1364828_comment'></div>文章有逸气。为世所重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1364828_comment'></div>公少负气纵横。遣意磊落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1364828_comment'></div>作尉巴蜀。不修名检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1364828_comment'></div>及登朝受任。屡使遐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1364828_comment'></div>霜明烈心。玉立贞节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1364828_comment'></div>言行忠正。居取俭约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1364828_comment'></div>饬体杂于皇王。致君期于尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1364828_comment'></div>公务之暇。手不释卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1364828_comment'></div>虽子弟家人。未尝见其喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1364828_comment'></div>前后上事切谏得失十数道。俱焚其稿草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1364828_comment'></div>不以语人。故朝廷莫知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1364828_comment'></div>睿宗尝曰。元振正直齐于宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1364828_comment'></div>政理逾于姚崇。其英谋宏亮过之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1364828_comment'></div>旧于宣阳里居二十馀年。不至诸院马厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1364828_comment'></div>每朝回。对二亲言笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1364828_comment'></div>归室俨如也。不问家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1364828_comment'></div>与狄仁杰朱敬则魏元忠李峤韦安石赵彦昭韦嗣立薛稷张说等为忘言之友。事父母以孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1364828_comment'></div>父爱。授济州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1364828_comment'></div>后以为相。奏请解职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1364828_comment'></div>授银青光禄大夫济州刺史致仕。公殁后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1364828_comment'></div>二亲犹在。自我唐受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1364828_comment'></div>宰臣有二亲者。惟公而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1364828_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_245_1364828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=700&endYear=700')">700年10月</a>　与徐彦伯、刘知几等同修《三教珠英》时麟台监张昌宗及成均祭酒李峤总领其事，广引文词之士，日夕谈论，赋诗聚会”时修书者历年未能下笔，说与徐坚共同构意，方得成书。作品：《和张监观赦》<div id='poem_24121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_4_24121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=701&endYear=701')">701年</a>　本年春在年在京修《三教珠英》为陆氏撰墓志。作品：《文昌左丞陆公墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系本年二月，熊飞《张说集校注》系五月前。）</span><div id='poem_1364811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文昌左丞陆公墓志</a><span class='authorDate'>（701年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364811")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364811'>公讳元方。字希仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364811_comment'></div>苏州吴县人也。帝典惟二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364811_comment'></div>虞尽美于南风。强国有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364811_comment'></div>齐莫大于东海。元侯制食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364811_comment'></div>因而为宗。丞相册勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364811_comment'></div>开吴佐命。盛德之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364811_comment'></div>瑶琨代袭。故丹青弈世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364811_comment'></div>三君之望并高。金玉联华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364811_comment'></div>五常之目齐重。公即陈给事黄门侍郎琛之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364811_comment'></div>唐荆州当阳县丞山仁之孙。司仪郎柬之之侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364811_comment'></div>豫章尉元之之子。体元黄之纯粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364811_comment'></div>峻清白之隆名。鹏翼载轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364811_comment'></div>骐鸣自远。始以司成明经业优擢第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364811_comment'></div>补三水扶风渭南三县尉。授里行监察殿中三御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364811_comment'></div>迁凤阁舍人兼太子中舍。又判凤阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364811_comment'></div>又守秋官。行鸾台三守侍郎同凤阁鸾台平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364811_comment'></div>坐公事降为绥州刺史。居无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364811_comment'></div>检校春官。又试天官二侍郎兼司尉卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364811_comment'></div>复除鸾台侍郎同凤阁鸾台平章事。转右庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364811_comment'></div>转文昌左丞。前后掌选及知考各二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364811_comment'></div>九流铨总。代天理物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364811_comment'></div>公执其衡镜。而野无遗贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364811_comment'></div>三载考绩。惟王旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364811_comment'></div>公秩其幽明。而庶官咸事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364811_comment'></div>斯并宪章台阁。籍甚人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364811_comment'></div>至于经济大道。弥纶庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364811_comment'></div>嘉猷削于隐德。宏益晦于推美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364811_comment'></div>盖不得而闻也。古人有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364811_comment'></div>进退在命。忠信在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364811_comment'></div>一出持州。再入莅政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364811_comment'></div>汲长孺之方直。时守外台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364811_comment'></div>胡伯始之详明。亟司中禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364811_comment'></div>抑有由焉。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364811_comment'></div>人之淑斯。宜享难老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364811_comment'></div>昊天降戾。曾不憖遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364811_comment'></div>大足元年二月七日。寝疾而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364811_comment'></div>春秋六十有三。历事两宫三十馀载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364811_comment'></div>奉上惟敬。临下惟诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364811_comment'></div>密勿两终。静而调理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364811_comment'></div>心尚坦率。不违名教之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364811_comment'></div>迹列轩裳。不杂风尘之伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364811_comment'></div>施与忘倦。乡党穆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364811_comment'></div>夷险若一。朋友义焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364811_comment'></div>所谓终温且惠。行同归于大雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364811_comment'></div>克已复礼。身不离于令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364811_comment'></div>及东首归全。西阶彻奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364811_comment'></div>无食粟之马。无衣帛之妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364811_comment'></div>知与不知。莫不嘉叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364811_comment'></div>粤三月十四日。假葬于国门之南费村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364811_comment'></div>永刊昭烈。垂之幽础。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364811_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1364811_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1364718_comment'></div>亦曰有数焉尔。岁缠奋若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364718_comment'></div>月交皋且。皇帝有天下之十二载也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364718_comment'></div>金精东上。雄汉国之兵形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364718_comment'></div>天道南来。告胡庭之运尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364718_comment'></div>帝曰亚。尔倅朔方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364718_comment'></div>文庙授钺。御闲锡马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364718_comment'></div>太卜祯辰。乘舆饯宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364718_comment'></div>临长乐而推毂。顿近郊而誓旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364718_comment'></div>班律事。功列而后动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364718_comment'></div>于时大雨洗兵。长风愤角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364718_comment'></div>铁骑连光。金鼓接气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364718_comment'></div>秉旌旗。扫朔漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364718_comment'></div>纵熊罴。猎苇泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364718_comment'></div>故将堙龙海。夷鹰关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364718_comment'></div>郡高阙。县卢山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364718_comment'></div>碣阴陵以筑观。醢单于以享士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364718_comment'></div>东震浴日。西荡弱水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364718_comment'></div>立不世之奇功。报旧年之宿耻巳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364718_comment'></div>以众有素饱之怒。将有必取之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364718_comment'></div>如田生耀武炳文。运筹入幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364719_comment'></div>张旃首路。置酒中省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364719_comment'></div>欢言少留。同列穆乎匪他。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=705&endYear=705')">705年11月20日</a>　应李普定外甥之请，为其母撰墓志铭。作品：《上邽县君李氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1364819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上邽县君李氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（705年11月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364819")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364819'>夫人太祖景皇帝之元孙。西平郡王普定之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364819_comment'></div>赋灵阴德。资性柔嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364819_comment'></div>事舅姑尽其敬。与娣姒致其睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364819_comment'></div>茂行充乎内则。懿声溢于外姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364819_comment'></div>虽幼育王家。长自傅保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364819_comment'></div>而能谦光庶类。降心细物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364819_comment'></div>手成朝祭之服。躬操酒食之品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364819_comment'></div>凡妇人之所能事。而夫人莫不备焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364819_comment'></div>府君朱绂之岁也。于是乎始受封邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364819_comment'></div>象服盈门。鱼轩在路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364819_comment'></div>姬氏王者之后。夫人帝室之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364819_comment'></div>夫贵妇荣。于斯为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364819_comment'></div>及帷堂而哭。有敬姜之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364819_comment'></div>择邻而处。有孟母之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364819_comment'></div>入闾俟信。有诸妇之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364819_comment'></div>出言成章。有众女之诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364819_comment'></div>受命不淑。以某年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364819_comment'></div>卒于同州之私第。以神龙元年十一月二十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364819_comment'></div>合葬于万年县白鹿之旧茔。有子逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364819_comment'></div>殿中侍御史。检身承家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364819_comment'></div>扬名为孝。思我母氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364819_comment'></div>感秦伯之诗。祔于府君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364819_comment'></div>取周公之礼。髣髴心迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364819_comment'></div>志之幽石。其铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364819_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1364819'>茫茫万姓。朝宗于李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364819_comment'></div>婺星分极。咸池派水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364819_comment'></div>后稷裔孙。神贻女士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364819_comment'></div>动遵法度。居观图史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364819_comment'></div>高堂奄空。霜露方始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364819_comment'></div>俭用礼节。葬非奢美。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364821'>夫人讳某。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364821_comment'></div>官至安东大都护长史。与太宗有故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364821_comment'></div>赐姓李氏。仕历澶州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364821_comment'></div>因为郡人。伟哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364821_comment'></div>孝友清白之仁基。金钩石印之灵庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364821_comment'></div>必将光大别族。繁衍淑女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364821_comment'></div>彩黛纷敷。焜耀华美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364821_comment'></div>若斯之盛也。夫人幼而韶异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364821_comment'></div>长而婉穆。金声玉泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364821_comment'></div>蕣荣兰茂。传贤庄姜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364821_comment'></div>诗美仲氏。无以尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364821_comment'></div>初汝阳公夫人元氏。生一男四女而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364821_comment'></div>继室以夫人。封诸燕郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364821_comment'></div>元生立及长孙杨氏二女。秉螽斯宜尔之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364821_comment'></div>著鸤鸠均养之仁。色无偏和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364821_comment'></div>心无殊厚。闺庭之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364821_comment'></div>邕邕如也。虽邑中五服之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364821_comment'></div>门下三千之客。莫能察其异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364821_comment'></div>永宁里先人之旧庐也。有通渠转池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364821_comment'></div>巨石嵚嵰。喷险<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1364821", 1364821, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>淙灂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364821_comment'></div>洄潭沈沈。殊声异状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364821_comment'></div>而为形胜游衍之处者十四五。前夫人之孙苏氏之妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364821_comment'></div>弱岁嬉而堕焉。举家环流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364821_comment'></div>惮莫能救。夫人投身赴水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364821_comment'></div>或沈或浮。久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364821_comment'></div>提挈仅免。其行已也实多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364821_comment'></div>府君更郎将中郎将各一。将军大将军凡四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364821_comment'></div>前后领左右羽林二军禁营。青海鸭绿二道总管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364821_comment'></div>天子元老。白首兵栏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364821_comment'></div>腹心爪牙。朝无与二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364821_comment'></div>外受雕戈文马之赏。内委金玑宝贝之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364821_comment'></div>将军既颁于部曲。夫人亦散于宗姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364821_comment'></div>可谓贵而好礼。富而能惠者巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364821_comment'></div>及君子晨歌。夫人昼哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364821_comment'></div>丧有过戚。制无越礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364821_comment'></div>其后法吏苛礼。令子远迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364821_comment'></div>施珍玩以奉佛。彻滋味以奉道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364821_comment'></div>精意入冥。明神与直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364821_comment'></div>中兴昌历。无废旧勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364821_comment'></div>先公茂乎饰终。爱子荣乎起滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364821_comment'></div>天步方泰。家屯适夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364821_comment'></div>宜享南山之寿。奄顿西泉之驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364821_comment'></div>神龙元年十二月二十二日。寝疾终于洛阳之德懋里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364821_comment'></div>春秋若干。国坠邦媛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364821_comment'></div>独孤某妻亡。还京日宜给灵舆并递。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364821_comment'></div>悼旧褒德。矜孤恤丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364821_comment'></div>撰德行。存国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364821_comment'></div>亦孝子之志。乃为铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364636_comment'></div>良将者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364636_comment'></div>必精辩天时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364636_comment'></div>审详人事。<div id='poem_sentence_4_23996_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=706&endYear=706')">706年</a>　应崔湜之请为其母撰写墓志。作品：《荥阳郡夫人郑氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1364820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荥阳夫人郑氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（706年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364820'>夫人讳某。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364820_comment'></div>荥阳开封郑氏之女也。有唐银青光禄大夫行少詹事博陵侯崔氏之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364820_comment'></div>中大夫中书舍人湜之母也。高祖述祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364820_comment'></div>北齐吏部尚书太子太保荥阳平公。曾祖武叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364820_comment'></div>北齐洛州刺史中牟公。祖道援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364820_comment'></div>隋宋城令。父世基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364820_comment'></div>故吉阳令。故左仆射安吉公杜淹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364820_comment'></div>太夫人之外王父也。夫人家世德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364820_comment'></div>母氏鼎冑。衣冠礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364820_comment'></div>耳目所徵。号之诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364820_comment'></div>实为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1364820", 1364820, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>女士</span>。先夫人以崔出泰岳之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364820_comment'></div>郑祖周王之穆。长源修麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364820_comment'></div>比浚联崇。故夫人年十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364820_comment'></div>归于我氏。尽敬爱以安舅姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364820_comment'></div>致友穆以谐娣姒。性宽恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364820_comment'></div>尚素雅。文而不奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364820_comment'></div>约而不陋。故邑号光启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364820_comment'></div>象服是宜。博陵侯更事两朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364820_comment'></div>多历官序。居必大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364820_comment'></div>去有遗爱。虽毳衣善听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364820_comment'></div>得非鸡鸣之弼乎。舍人及三弟长安尉泌蓝田尉液左千牛涤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364820_comment'></div>咸有当代之名。立无过之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364820_comment'></div>滋液德教。琢磨礼范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364820_comment'></div>虽趋庭善禀。得非䦱门之诲乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364820_comment'></div>夫乐得好逑。关雎义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364820_comment'></div>鞠成众子。鸤鸠仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364820_comment'></div>采蘋采藻。修礼度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364820_comment'></div>如山如河。有德容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364820_comment'></div>妇礼既成。内则用贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364820_comment'></div>母仪乃行。家道以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364820_comment'></div>于是春秋高矣。雅好真谛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364820_comment'></div>厌斁禅味。减彻珍华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364820_comment'></div>被服慈衣。捐斥文绣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364820_comment'></div>总斯群懿。式是六姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364820_comment'></div>故以嗣徽先姑。垂裕来史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364820_comment'></div>诗所谓邦之媛也。夫人有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364820_comment'></div>皇天难忱。不享偕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364820_comment'></div>年六十四。神龙元年十一月九日。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364820_comment'></div>青绶赤茀。鱼轩翟衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364820_comment'></div>乔梓搆基。堂堂荣晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364777_comment'></div>谓之崇高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364777_comment'></div>万物皆化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364777_comment'></div>惟名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364727_comment'></div>虽翊亮廊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364727_comment'></div>而缅怀林薮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364727_comment'></div>东山之曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364727_comment'></div>有别业焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364727_comment'></div>岚气入野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364727_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1364727", 1364727, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>榛烟</span>出俗。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364727_comment'></div>幸温泉之岁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364727_comment'></div>皇上闻而赏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364727_comment'></div>天子赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364727_comment'></div>王后帝女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364727_comment'></div>宫嫔邦媛。<div id='poem_sentence_38_1364727_comment'></div>加以中宫敦序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364727_comment'></div>谓我诸兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364727_comment'></div>引内子于重幄。<div id='poem_sentence_43_1364727_comment'></div>棠棣之诗作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364727_comment'></div>于是实其筐筥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364727_comment'></div>下以昭忠信之献。<div id='poem_sentence_53_1364727_comment'></div>纡紫绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364727_comment'></div>期赤松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364727_comment'></div>素履之辅也。<div id='poem_sentence_4_23960_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年</a>　为元希声撰墓铭。作品：《故吏部侍郎元公碑铭》<div id='poem_1364801' id='poem_sentence_2_1364801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364801'>灵气应变，直心逍遥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364801'>麟阁书仙，凤池墨妙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364801_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364801'>太常国礼，少宰邦教。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=709&endYear=709')">709年</a>　为徐坚父撰碑。作品：《唐西台舍人赠泗州刺史徐府君碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系景云元年（710））</span><div id='poem_1364763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐西台舍人赠泗州刺史徐府君碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（709年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364763")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364763'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364763'>叙曰。经天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364763_comment'></div>揭日月。文之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364763_comment'></div>掌邦籍。出王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364763_comment'></div>位之崇也。本乎言行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364763_comment'></div>君子之枢机。成乎易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364763_comment'></div>贤人之德业。则徐公其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364763_comment'></div>昔公奋明哲之姿。当高宗之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364763_comment'></div>天保大定。俊乂用彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364763_comment'></div>而光耀天台。云飞纶阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364763_comment'></div>文敏以畅机务。稽古以析嫌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364763_comment'></div>礼乐政刑。择三代之令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364763_comment'></div>典谟训诰。有唐虞之遗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364763_comment'></div>较然于庶绩者。可得而闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364763_comment'></div>其嘉猷谠言。沃心造膝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364763_comment'></div>滋液内润。精微外密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364763_comment'></div>混成于元象者。不可得而闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364763_comment'></div>公讳齐聃。字将道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364763_comment'></div>姓徐氏。东海郯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364763_comment'></div>远祖偃王。基仁义于上代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364763_comment'></div>严考孝德。济宏美于近世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364763_comment'></div>公始以宏文生通五经大义。发迹曹王府参军右千牛兵曹潞王府文学崇文馆学士兼侍皇太子讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364763_comment'></div>又芳林门修书。于时中朝硕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364763_comment'></div>下国英隽。皆忘年请交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364763_comment'></div>不远来谒。望其路者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364763_comment'></div>若晨风之赴北林。得其门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364763_comment'></div>如众山之仰东岱。公不乐趋竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364763_comment'></div>雅尚退谧。深以椒房之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364763_comment'></div>声名太甚。求为外职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364763_comment'></div>出宰桃林。未下车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364763_comment'></div>敕改沛王掾。终岁选拟司绩员外司议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364763_comment'></div>并不就。乞补云阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364763_comment'></div>到官累日。诏除司城员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364763_comment'></div>乃迁西台舍人。其为政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364763_comment'></div>如始云尔。初公幼而殊异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364763_comment'></div>八岁工文。太宗闻其聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364763_comment'></div>召试词赋。锡以佩刀金鞘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364763_comment'></div>称曰神童。及中年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364763_comment'></div>高宗嘉其道优。悉命皇子受业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364763_comment'></div>吁谟帝采。许以国钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364763_comment'></div>故公备更潞沛豫诸王侍读。上之在周邸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364763_comment'></div>公尝来诲诗焉。夫然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364763_comment'></div>集虎观之书。承龙楼之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364763_comment'></div>二宗之代。矫首辞林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364763_comment'></div>四王之门。从容经席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364763_comment'></div>非有海山之艺。温良之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364763_comment'></div>仪形以孚。柔嘉维则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364763_comment'></div>其孰能发挥圣智。启迪天人者乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364763_comment'></div>咸亨元年出为蕲州司马。二年坐事徙于钦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364763_comment'></div>夫君子大守道而小守位。污隆随时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364763_comment'></div>屈伸以义。去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1364763", 1364763, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>令尹</span>而不愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364763_comment'></div>失<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1364763", 1364763, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>司寇</span>而遂行。蕙兰败不为不芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364763_comment'></div>日月蚀不为不明。姑务忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364763_comment'></div>何陋蛮越。优游钦江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364763_comment'></div>岁馀而没。春秋四十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364763_comment'></div>惜乎不登宰衡。以平天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364763_comment'></div>天夭是瘃。命也欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364763_comment'></div>既而庆隆嗣子。返公孙之柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364763_comment'></div>德施后王。拜先师之爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364763_comment'></div>上元三年某月。归葬于少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364763_comment'></div>中兴神龙元年。赠泗州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364763_comment'></div>褒贤追远。念道尊师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364763_comment'></div>圣人之礼也。议者以公考果州府君高学才华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364763_comment'></div>香名省闼。武帝贤姊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364763_comment'></div>大帝婕妤妹也。公既高步掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364763_comment'></div>子又践修旧职。同生标藻于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1364763", 1364763, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>鸾殿</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364763_comment'></div>重世含章于凤池。自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1364763", 1364763, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>班姬</span>父兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364763_comment'></div>文雄汉室。左思女弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364763_comment'></div>词蔚晋宫。悠哉二族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364763_comment'></div>徐氏三矣。才难不其然乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364763_comment'></div>凡是好文之君。赏音之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364763_comment'></div>公之逝也。岂不慨然阅青而存淩云之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364763_comment'></div>操朱弦而想流水之属哉。厥子曰坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364763_comment'></div>景龙中加金章紫绶。行礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364763_comment'></div>得以命卿之禄。奉蠲洁之祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364763_comment'></div>无念烈考。树之家风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364763_comment'></div>乃刊石立颂。将以识往行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364763_comment'></div>摅无穷。使本支百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364763_comment'></div>不忘先人之不陨其名也。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364763_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1364763'>王言惟令。中禁是司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364763_comment'></div>帝嘉文父。曰汝宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364763_comment'></div>终温且惠。习礼明诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364763_comment'></div>长裾传道。大笔修辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364763_comment'></div>鸿业润色。元黻缉熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364763_comment'></div>昊天大戾。君子明夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364763_comment'></div>苍梧启手。涅而不缁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364763_comment'></div>中兴受命。逝者无追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364763_comment'></div>灵符泗水。崇赠先师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364763_comment'></div>髣像精魄。丕承圣期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364763_comment'></div>教近子贵。荣跻父慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364763_comment'></div>学嗣三叶。才俱一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364763_comment'></div>春秋孝享。霜露深思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364763_comment'></div>后之视昔。斯文在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364763_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1364763_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　本年六月前，在兵部侍郎任。为人撰祭文。疑为兵部尚书韦嗣立代撰。作品：《为人作祭弟文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此文作年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年1月</a>　有文祭陈姓友人。作品：《吊陈司马书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系景龙三年（709）正月。）</span><div id='poem_1364708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1364708_comment'></div>顿首顿首陈君之灵。顷伏苫盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364708_comment'></div>远辱慰疏。执对号恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364708_comment'></div>次于展泄。来使未还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364708_comment'></div>传君遇祸。尽哀寝外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364708_comment'></div>伤心痛骨。明府兄毓德南邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364708_comment'></div>飞声中夏。急人之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364708_comment'></div>忧人之忧。勇于履危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364708_comment'></div>果于从政。入使天阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364708_comment'></div>有专对之美。按俗交州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364708_comment'></div>见澄清之节。故得振衣衡管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364708_comment'></div>婞直而殒。皇天辅德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364708_comment'></div>问之何故。畴昔炎海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364708_comment'></div>契阔周旋。义则友朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364708_comment'></div>恩结兄弟。方期岁暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364708_comment'></div>韡韡相荣。元发未华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364708_comment'></div>何图零落。山涛犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364708_comment'></div>嵇绍不孤。逝者有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364708_comment'></div>当昭是意。今返防关。<div class='inline' class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系本年五月。）</span><div id='poem_1364758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐陈州龙兴寺碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364758")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364758_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364758'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364758'>观夫广大无相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364758_comment'></div>虚空也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1364758", 1364758, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>四轮</span>倚之而住。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364758_comment'></div>精微<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1364758", 1364758, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>无体</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364758_comment'></div>佛性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364758_comment'></div>万法因之以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364758_comment'></div>圣人有以见三界成坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364758_comment'></div>皆有为壳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364758_comment'></div>故剖之以戒觜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364758_comment'></div>圣人有以见六趣轮回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364758_comment'></div>是无明网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364758_comment'></div>故决之以定刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364758_comment'></div>烁宝光之慧炬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364758_comment'></div>沛善利之慈舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364758_comment'></div>返迷路率于中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364758_comment'></div>徛横流登于彼岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364758_comment'></div>以言乎真实之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364758_comment'></div>总摄一乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364758_comment'></div>以言乎天地之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364758_comment'></div>曲成万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364758_comment'></div>大矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364758_comment'></div>道心包举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364758_comment'></div>等太虚而无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1364758", 1364758, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>法教</span>流通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364758_comment'></div>弥旷劫而常在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364758_comment'></div>则有乘如来方便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364758_comment'></div>出应化门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364758_comment'></div>用大士因缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364758_comment'></div>处帝王位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364758_comment'></div>俾庶类咸若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364758_comment'></div>谓之光宅天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364758_comment'></div>令众生修善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364758_comment'></div>名为庄严佛国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364758_comment'></div>龙兴寺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364758_comment'></div>皇帝即位之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364758_comment'></div>溥天之所置也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364758_comment'></div>唐祚中微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364758_comment'></div>周德更盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364758_comment'></div>历载十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364758_comment'></div>奸臣擅命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364758_comment'></div>伯明氏有盗国之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364758_comment'></div>一阐提有害圣之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364758_comment'></div>皇上操北斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364758_comment'></div>起东朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364758_comment'></div>排阊阖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364758_comment'></div>运扶摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364758_comment'></div>张目而叱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364758_comment'></div>殷乎若震雷发地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364758_comment'></div>歘虩翕响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364758_comment'></div>以克彼二凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364758_comment'></div>赫然若太阳升天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364758_comment'></div>晞熙仰象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364758_comment'></div>以复我万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364758_comment'></div>返元后传国之玺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364758_comment'></div>受光武登坛之玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364758_comment'></div>尊祖继宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364758_comment'></div>郊天祀地之礼既洎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364758_comment'></div>修旧布新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364758_comment'></div>改物班瑞之典又备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364758_comment'></div>乃考出世之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364758_comment'></div>鼓大雄之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364758_comment'></div>入无功用之品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364758_comment'></div>住不思议之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364758_comment'></div>一光所烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364758_comment'></div>庶兆为之清凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364758_comment'></div>一音所宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364758_comment'></div>大千为之震动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364758_comment'></div>云蒸风靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364758_comment'></div>不崇朝而坏衣涌塔遍天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364758_comment'></div>陈州者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364758_comment'></div>上古太嗥之虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364758_comment'></div>近代淮阳之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364758_comment'></div>置守则列为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364758_comment'></div>封王则建为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364758_comment'></div>本其风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364758_comment'></div>豪侈靡丽旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364758_comment'></div>翿东门之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364758_comment'></div>接袂成帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364758_comment'></div>觞宛邱之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364758_comment'></div>袨服成市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364758_comment'></div>信豫州之郊一都会也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364758_comment'></div>剌史南阳韩府君名琦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364758_comment'></div>其为邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364758_comment'></div>胜残去杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364758_comment'></div>圣主之得贤臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364758_comment'></div>别驾彭城郡王名隆业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364758_comment'></div>其从政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364758_comment'></div>能肃而恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364758_comment'></div>高阳之有才子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364758_comment'></div>长史南阳张齐贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364758_comment'></div>儒林之选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364758_comment'></div>司马河南云盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364758_comment'></div>公族之良也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364758_comment'></div>士曹从事八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364758_comment'></div>录事参军于璆为称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364758_comment'></div>六属官人二十五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364758_comment'></div>宛邱县令崔修已为称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364758_comment'></div>或以艺荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364758_comment'></div>或以门进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364758_comment'></div>高车一辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364758_comment'></div>美利同人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364758_comment'></div>礼举刑清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364758_comment'></div>于是乎在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364758_comment'></div>因邦甸积稔之蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364758_comment'></div>偶日月再旦之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364758_comment'></div>钦若王言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364758_comment'></div>建立灵寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364758_comment'></div>上略其趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364758_comment'></div>下务其终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364758_comment'></div>百工不劝而亟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364758_comment'></div>庶役不徵而会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364758_comment'></div>经始如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364758_comment'></div>成之不日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364758_comment'></div>夫其带四郭五衢之陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364758_comment'></div>踞重墉阛阓之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364758_comment'></div>福地砥平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364758_comment'></div>长垣云矗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364758_comment'></div>高门有闶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364758_comment'></div>大厦斯飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364758_comment'></div>连廊曲阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364758_comment'></div>交轩对霤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364758_comment'></div>木磨而不雕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364758_comment'></div>土涂而不饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364758_comment'></div>壮无僭侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364758_comment'></div>以约费为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364758_comment'></div>俭无偪陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364758_comment'></div>以静居为宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364758_comment'></div>法王宫殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364758_comment'></div>近宝花之城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364758_comment'></div>菩萨伽蓝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364758_comment'></div>住金灯之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364758_comment'></div>亦犹是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364758_comment'></div>上座处元寺主真度维那守慎等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364758_comment'></div>戒珠如月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364758_comment'></div>独洁麒麟之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364758_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_135_1364758", 1364758, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>法宝</span>如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364758_comment'></div>普闻狮子之吼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364758_comment'></div>克谐善众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364758_comment'></div>厎定神居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364758_comment'></div>甘露饱而满盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364758_comment'></div>天香醉而围绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364758_comment'></div>于时陈项之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364758_comment'></div>褒衣而博带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364758_comment'></div>皤皤然相造而诹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364758_comment'></div>久矣吾党之惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364758_comment'></div>倥侗颛蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364758_comment'></div>情嗜横放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364758_comment'></div>恚爱我业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364758_comment'></div>聪明不开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364758_comment'></div>日有忘其生生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364758_comment'></div>月无觉其灭灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364758_comment'></div>一息之漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364758_comment'></div>可胜言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364758_comment'></div>而今举足至于道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364758_comment'></div>申臂及于净土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364758_comment'></div>昼则目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_155_1364758", 1364758, "Clauses/155/Comments/0")'>禅诵</span>之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364758_comment'></div>夜则耳钟梵之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364758_comment'></div>何悟是生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364758_comment'></div>晚臻斯乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364758_comment'></div>岂不思天子之至仁乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364758_comment'></div>恻下人之昏垫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364758_comment'></div>遹上圣之昭轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364758_comment'></div>假有相之途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364758_comment'></div>诣无生之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364758_comment'></div>洒冥泽于巳灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364758_comment'></div>蒂元根于未始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364758_comment'></div>百灵之所归依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364758_comment'></div>万宇之所欣喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364758_comment'></div>非独陈而巳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364758_comment'></div>盖神辟天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364758_comment'></div>圣开地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364758_comment'></div>代之祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364758_comment'></div>纂帝宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364758_comment'></div>基皇统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364758_comment'></div>孝之主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364758_comment'></div>殄僪狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364758_comment'></div>破魔孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1364758_comment'></div>威无外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1364758_comment'></div>广正典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364758_comment'></div>绍度门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1364758_comment'></div>德无大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1364758_comment'></div>通幽洞明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1364758_comment'></div>兼粗该精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1364758_comment'></div>滂洋而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1364758_comment'></div>混濩厥成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1364758_comment'></div>一收功而四善举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1364758_comment'></div>一推心而群愿立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1364758_comment'></div>咨如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1364758_comment'></div>则龙兴之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1364758_comment'></div>曷有量矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1364758_comment'></div>夫业可大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1364758_comment'></div>而芜没焉不贻于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364758_comment'></div>事可尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364758_comment'></div>而苞蕴焉不述于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364758_comment'></div>臣子之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364758_comment'></div>敢请图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364758_comment'></div>然言语之不到者心识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364758_comment'></div>心识之不到者真如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364758_comment'></div>二乘闻之而不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364758_comment'></div>十地见之而未了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364758_comment'></div>而我云何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364758_comment'></div>能知能说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364758_comment'></div>窃比六时之鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1364758_comment'></div>七宝之树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1364758_comment'></div>是出乎和雅音声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364758_comment'></div>是赞乎微妙功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364758_comment'></div>记其在处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364758_comment'></div>长者之金园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364758_comment'></div>铭其事因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364758_comment'></div>育王之石柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1364758_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1364758_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_211_1364758'>圣皇在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1364758_comment'></div>于昭于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364758_comment'></div>唐虽旧邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364758_comment'></div>其命维新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364758_comment'></div>龙兴返政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364758_comment'></div>灭二暴臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1364758_comment'></div>少康非儗。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年6月</a>　睿宗即位，说撰此文以颂圣德。作品：《圣德颂》<div id='poem_1364628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364628'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364628'>太古厥初。遗文阙矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364628_comment'></div>书祖二典。聿陈五教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364628_comment'></div>唐虞之训。历代宗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364628_comment'></div>孰同理而不休。奚同乱而克韪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364628_comment'></div>皇唐之兴也。道积四圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364628_comment'></div>时将百年。泽浸生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364628_comment'></div>自根流叶。孝和晏驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364628_comment'></div>嗣子幼冲。凶臣嬖女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364628_comment'></div>蹙弱王室。人甚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1364628", 1364628, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>崩角</span>之危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364628_comment'></div>朝深缀旒之叹。赖天奖忠勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364628_comment'></div>大戮鲸鲵。尊文庙而安神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364628_comment'></div>清帝宫而待圣。少主奉天命以至禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364628_comment'></div>皇上拒天命以固违。群公卿士胥进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364628_comment'></div>陛下孝弟之至。历数在躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364628_comment'></div>处储闱有让元子之德。居藩邸有辞太弟之高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364628_comment'></div>六合欣戴。三灵允协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364628_comment'></div>为天下君。其谁与让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364628_comment'></div>陟元后。延群臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364628_comment'></div>见兆人。是日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364628_comment'></div>景云至。兹岁也。<div id='poem_sentence_23_1364628_comment'></div>上方谨庶务。览众则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364628_comment'></div>履乾乾。怀翼翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364628_comment'></div>游道德之灵囿。从鸾鹭之珍群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364628_comment'></div>视天下之所不见。听天下之所不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364628_comment'></div>帝典皇纲。于斯备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364628_comment'></div>宜定郊报之礼。革封禅之则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364628_comment'></div>荅神贶。扬元德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364628_comment'></div>不然者。则二宗无类帝之坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364628_comment'></div>五岳无省方之馆矣。若夫汤颂传于考父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364628_comment'></div>文什著于周公。臣子之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364628_comment'></div>不可阙也。敢作颂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364628_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1364628'>天祚圣唐。启我明主。<div id='poem_sentence_39_1364628_comment'></div>灵坛神岳。思皇嘏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364628_comment'></div>皇哉皇哉。胡可舍旃。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年6月</a>　任工部侍郎，为上司薛稷代笔所作。作品：《为薛稷让官表》<div id='poem_1364657' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364657' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年7月</a>　崔日用与张说交密，故代为其亲撰碑。作品：《唐故河间县丞崔君神道碑》<div id='poem_1364783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364783_comment'></div>在周为崔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364783_comment'></div>齐侯之允也。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364783_comment'></div>太行之山拒于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364783_comment'></div>东观所以美其文宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364783_comment'></div>北州所以贵其清族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364783_comment'></div>魏冀州刺史公讳纂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364783_comment'></div>君之高祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364783_comment'></div>及亲而仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364783_comment'></div>盘桓利贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364783_comment'></div>解褐泽州晋城尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364783_comment'></div>降为光州安乐尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364783_comment'></div>换蕲州黄梅尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364783_comment'></div>转河閒丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364783_comment'></div>凡更三尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364783_comment'></div>佐四邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364783_comment'></div>体公绰之不欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364783_comment'></div>励伯夷之高操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364783_comment'></div>临事以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364783_comment'></div>御人以宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364783_comment'></div>虽为小政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364783_comment'></div>必有可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364783_comment'></div>故八使巡风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364783_comment'></div>再荐清白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364783_comment'></div>河上遗老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364783_comment'></div>江滨旧吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364783_comment'></div>吟咏馀声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364783_comment'></div>祖述前事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364783_comment'></div>人到于今称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364783_comment'></div>若夫碧树烟蔼于江潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364783_comment'></div>红荷藻耀于泽畔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364783_comment'></div>宝贝烱光于空浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364783_comment'></div>美玉明润于断岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364783_comment'></div>不为珍舆瑶辇之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364783_comment'></div>前殿后池之玩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364783_comment'></div>诚自得焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364783_comment'></div>必将有赏心之所叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364783_comment'></div>况乎殿邦光国之宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364783_comment'></div>樽俎柱石之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364783_comment'></div>道为帝王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364783_comment'></div>言为天下利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364783_comment'></div>巳而税远驾于穷辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364783_comment'></div>顿高才于下位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364783_comment'></div>亦无懵焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364783_comment'></div>固将有知音之所欷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364783_comment'></div>垂拱元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364783_comment'></div>奉使上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364783_comment'></div>遘疾终于时邕里之旅馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364783_comment'></div>享年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364783_comment'></div>夫人河东裴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364783_comment'></div>湖州治中怀俭之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364783_comment'></div>滁州司马昉之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364783_comment'></div>禀训华室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364783_comment'></div>作合高门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364783_comment'></div>嗣徽先姑。<div id='poem_sentence_107_1364783_comment'></div>图传䍐有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364783_comment'></div>丧亲过毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364783_comment'></div>蕣华朝落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364783_comment'></div>仪凤中卒于郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364783_comment'></div>春秋二十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364783_comment'></div>长安三年春二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364783_comment'></div>合葬于金谷乡邙山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364783_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364783_comment'></div>北据高冈连陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364783_comment'></div>南面大道禁林。<div id='poem_sentence_197_1364783_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年7月</a>　睿宗即位，张说迁中书侍郎，兼雍州长史表应上于任命为中书侍郎后数日之内。作品：《让中书侍郎表》<div id='poem_1364650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364650?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让中书侍郎表</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364650")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364650'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364650'>臣说言。伏奉制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364650_comment'></div>除臣中书侍郎。宠命俯临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364650_comment'></div>惊魂自失。臣说中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364650_comment'></div>臣闻云构郁起。非枳之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364650_comment'></div>天波暴集。宁沟浍所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364650_comment'></div>臣识无通方。文不经国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364650_comment'></div>南宫华省。巳忝前行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364650_comment'></div>西垣内阁。将陪近侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364650_comment'></div>心惭官谤。迹愧时流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364650_comment'></div>何以承掌王言。赞决机务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364650_comment'></div>当今二仪再造。百度皆新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364650_comment'></div>太平之基。惟贤是与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364650_comment'></div>浑成庶政。责在中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364650_comment'></div>岂以常才。敢膺首选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364650_comment'></div>乞寝恩命。改择时髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364650_comment'></div>惟慎庶官。以谐佥议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364650_comment'></div>无任悃款之至。谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364650_comment'></div>臣所让人。别状封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364650_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1364650_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年9月</a>　代僧普润撰表。作品：《为僧普润辞公封表》<div id='poem_1364659' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364659' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364659?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为僧普润辞公封表</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1364659'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364659'>僧普润言。伏奉甲寅制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364659_comment'></div>以普润加荣沐秩。授邑封公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364659_comment'></div>圣恩无涯。将变枯朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364659_comment'></div>佛法有教。诚愿住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364659_comment'></div>普润自剃落坏衣。五十馀载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364659_comment'></div>心不见是。口不言俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364659_comment'></div>因诫證业。凭禅悟理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364659_comment'></div>幸逢皇祚将启。大运有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364659_comment'></div>皇太子逼畏凶雠。永怀兴复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364659_comment'></div>忧虞之际。始蒙顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364659_comment'></div>贫道起广救之悲。决必成之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364659_comment'></div>奉符命之旨。赞无畏之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364659_comment'></div>今得众生乂安。群魔消伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364659_comment'></div>在于法侣。所愿为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364659_comment'></div>视身本无。何功受禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364659_comment'></div>天位有德。陛下享之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364659_comment'></div>天讨有罪。太子行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364659_comment'></div>岂贪天之功。以为己力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364659_comment'></div>卖佛之法。而求身利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364659_comment'></div>必若冒荣背律。返俗违真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364659_comment'></div>亦恐乖陛下崇信之诚。失如来付属之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364659_comment'></div>凡所称述。诸佛證明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364659_comment'></div>伏惟圣慈。亦垂开领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364659_comment'></div>乞停恩授。以幸法门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364659_comment'></div>无任护戒传道之至愿。谨诣朝堂奉疏陈情以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364659_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1364659_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　在东宫药园，张说等于此宴请将军武洛沙有诗。作品：《药园宴武洛沙将军》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此诗作年。）</span><div id='poem_24148' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2048, "poem_sentence_2_24148")'>大夫树</span>，露下将军药。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24148'>待闻出塞还，丹青上<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3282, "poem_sentence_3_24148")'>麟阁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24148_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24148'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_24148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　文当为应豆卢氏之请代撰。作品：《延州豆卢使君万泉县主薛氏神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此诗作年。）</span><div id='poem_1364784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>延州豆卢使君万泉县主薛氏神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364784")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364784'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364784'>或称达性命者。齐死生之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364784_comment'></div>违忧怯者。一修短之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364784_comment'></div>斯盖无心之伦耳。焉足与议于情哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364784_comment'></div>何则。云虹灭影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364784_comment'></div>词人于是咏谣。华秀从风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364784_comment'></div>君子为之叹息。岂不以对仙丽之景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364784_comment'></div>怀变化而遗恋。在韶蕊之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364784_comment'></div>悼零落而偏愤。吾见豆卢氏之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364784_comment'></div>于其伉俪有焉。县主讳字姓薛氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364784_comment'></div>河东汾阴人也。大父驸马都尉奉宸将军讳瓘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364784_comment'></div>尚城阳公主。考驸马都尉散骑常侍讳绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364784_comment'></div>尚镇国太平公主。其在昔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364784_comment'></div>夏有车正先封。周有薛侯争长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364784_comment'></div>其在今也。五宗姻于帝里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364784_comment'></div>重叶母于王姬。河水经天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364784_comment'></div>上积星辰之气。霍山震地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364784_comment'></div>下多珠玉之林。县主幼而敏惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364784_comment'></div>长而洵淑。贞义孝烈之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364784_comment'></div>吉凶宾祭之仪。一闻成诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364784_comment'></div>纮綖绚组之制。湆芼酝羞之品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364784_comment'></div>一见悬解。至乃鹤回清汎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364784_comment'></div>蚕聚崩云。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1364784", 1364784, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>月韵</span>玫砧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364784_comment'></div>花秾䌽树。妇人能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364784_comment'></div>咸臻妙焉。大圣天后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1364784", 1364784, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>鍊石补天</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364784_comment'></div>有王母之神器。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1364784", 1364784, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>分茅列土</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364784_comment'></div>启弄孙之美邑。封犹有礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364784_comment'></div>义引而亲。天授三年四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364784_comment'></div>内封万泉县主。天爱下流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364784_comment'></div>日亲上。乘龙之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364784_comment'></div>和凤为难。络八纮以选门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364784_comment'></div>奄千官以求俊。夫以龙图帝宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364784_comment'></div>析步摇之华源。虎戟侯门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364784_comment'></div>袭京燕之雄冑。人之信美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364784_comment'></div>帝用嘉焉。以万岁登封元年仲春既望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364784_comment'></div>归于豆卢氏。六官送行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364784_comment'></div>百僚供事。迓以銮辂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364784_comment'></div>遣以翟车。环佩冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364784_comment'></div>璆然在驭。黼藻朱黛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364784_comment'></div>烂其盈门。诏婚之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364784_comment'></div>于焉为盛。尔乃移其爱敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364784_comment'></div>以事舅姑。伸其友恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364784_comment'></div>以谐公妹。举宗洽比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364784_comment'></div>如鼓瑟琴。每至婚姻会同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364784_comment'></div>少长咸集。珩璜节步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364784_comment'></div>金翠耀首。有婉嫕之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364784_comment'></div>无骄矜之色。睎眄睐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364784_comment'></div>若迟日之映涟漪。瞻词气者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364784_comment'></div>犹光风之转蘅蕙。加以引纳怀和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364784_comment'></div>馈分周赈。疏属自附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364784_comment'></div>穷归忘窘。故兰行彰信于闺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364784_comment'></div>而蕙风满盈于邦国。谅惟琬玉之性自美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364784_comment'></div>抑亦劬劳之训致焉。中宗孝和皇帝云回南土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364784_comment'></div>龙见东京。二仪更辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364784_comment'></div>九族咸叙。望我兄兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364784_comment'></div>公主赞陶钧之力。曰吾甥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364784_comment'></div>县主开邑井之赋。神龙元年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364784_comment'></div>加实封三百户。县主既通籍门阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364784_comment'></div>奉御又尚司殿省。天子巡游宫观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364784_comment'></div>觞乐池台。我有周亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364784_comment'></div>无时不从。主家外幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364784_comment'></div>比齐后而联恩。子婿中参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364784_comment'></div>与赵王而均理。或醉饱踰度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364784_comment'></div>寒燠未平。何尝不御药在门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364784_comment'></div>王人接路。当时厚泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364784_comment'></div>莫之尚也。景龙四年二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364784_comment'></div>以奉御出为丹延二州刺史。保傅下堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364784_comment'></div>随朱轓而同去。辎軿入郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364784_comment'></div>与皂盖而齐飞。辞宫阙而岁阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364784_comment'></div>恋庭闱而日远。肥泉永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364784_comment'></div>邪气攻衷。楚祝招而不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364784_comment'></div>秦医来而不及。景云元年八月二十一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364784_comment'></div>倾逝于延州之廨舍。春秋二十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364784_comment'></div>美玉褫颜。明珠晦色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364784_comment'></div>平阳旧宇。遂无望于归宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364784_comment'></div>怀县新文。空留连于永逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364784_comment'></div>有子三人。西华南容东里等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364784_comment'></div>或龀或岐。呱呱而泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364784_comment'></div>天何以罚。神其忍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364784_comment'></div>冬十有二月五日。归葬于长安之洪渎原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364784_comment'></div>窀穸营护。有命加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364784_comment'></div>器服祖遣。率由旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364784_comment'></div>生之也荣。葬之也礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364784_comment'></div>若夫柔嘉好合。善之元也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364784_comment'></div>肃雍降贵。谦之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364784_comment'></div>山河其德。容润广也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364784_comment'></div>熊罴其祥。祚允大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364784_comment'></div>总众美于修嫭。驰落晖于小年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364784_comment'></div>此所以哀中之又哀也。昔袁亡马氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364784_comment'></div>蔡笔斯奋。郑丧曹姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364784_comment'></div>潘文亦作。矧兹内范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364784_comment'></div>事华无愧。砥望夫之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364784_comment'></div>以表崇邱。缉幼妇之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364784_comment'></div>将传终古。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364784_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_1364784'>薛之重祖。冑轩国禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364784_comment'></div>相殷侯周。氏其土宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364784_comment'></div>英英白云。郁彼河汾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364784_comment'></div>公门蕃衍。铭鼎氛氲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364784_comment'></div>则仁则义。则戚则勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364784_comment'></div>馀庆介祉。诞灵女士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364784_comment'></div>中宗之甥。镇国之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364784_comment'></div>皎如霜雪。华如桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364784_comment'></div>舜族爰序。尧封咸秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364784_comment'></div>万泉开源。三百其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364784_comment'></div>守盛以俭。居冲不溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364784_comment'></div>亦既鸣雁。宜尔家人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364784_comment'></div>谦恭下下。抚纳亲亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364784_comment'></div>倾财致客。对馌如宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364784_comment'></div>我有邸第。前临黄道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364784_comment'></div>我有池塘。却望青草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364784_comment'></div>汉辇停暮。秦箫拂早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364784_comment'></div>岁月易忘。欢愉难保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364784_comment'></div>良人出守。将命北徂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364784_comment'></div>与子偕往。饮别东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364784_comment'></div>望母肠断。辞家泪枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364784_comment'></div>露萎茎草。霜酸众雏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364784_comment'></div>魂兮何归。京兆之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364784_comment'></div>葬于何处。杜陵之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364784_comment'></div>岩岩双阙。列列行槚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364784_comment'></div>勒是徽音。以观来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364784_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_119_1364784_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　此诗似为挽宰相、大将军韦温弟韦湑者。作品：《韦谯公挽歌二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此诗作年。）</span><div id='poem_23914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韦谯公挽歌二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_23914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23914'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23914'>五瑞分王国，双珠映后家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23914'>文飞书上凤，武结笥中蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23914'>出豫荣前马，回鸾丧后车。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23914'>衮衣将锡命，泉路有光华。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23914'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23914_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_23915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23915?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_23915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23915'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23915'>国骋双骐骥，庭仪两凤皇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23915'>将星连相位，玉树伴金乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23915'>歌舞侯家艳，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_23915", 23915, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>轩裘</span>戚里光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23915'>安知杜陵下，碑版已相望。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23915'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　为朋友张希元代撰文集之序言。作品：《洛州张司马集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系此诗景龙元年（707）；又，本谱此序下原系《侍宴临渭亭（应制）》诗，与前39页重，已删。）</span><div id='poem_1364725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洛州张司马集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364725")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364725'>夫言者志之所之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364725_comment'></div>文者物之相杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364725_comment'></div>然则心不可蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364725_comment'></div>故发挥以形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364725_comment'></div>辞不可陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364725_comment'></div>故错综以润色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364725_comment'></div>万象鼓舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364725_comment'></div>入有名之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364725_comment'></div>五音繁杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364725_comment'></div>出无声之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364725_comment'></div>非穷神体妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364725_comment'></div>其孰能与于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364725_comment'></div>洛州司马张公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364725_comment'></div>名希元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364725_comment'></div>中山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364725_comment'></div>族高辰象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364725_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1364725", 1364725, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>气壮河山</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364725_comment'></div>神作铜钩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364725_comment'></div>天开金印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364725_comment'></div>孝友内植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364725_comment'></div>礼乐外滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364725_comment'></div>励行闺庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364725_comment'></div>乡人谓之曾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364725_comment'></div>飞名都邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364725_comment'></div>诸儒号曰圣童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364725_comment'></div>下帷覃思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364725_comment'></div>穿墙嗜古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364725_comment'></div>蓬山芸观之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364725_comment'></div>群玉悬金之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364725_comment'></div>鲁宫藏篆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364725_comment'></div>汲冢遗编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364725_comment'></div>无不日览万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364725_comment'></div>暗识三箧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364725_comment'></div>博学吞九流之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364725_comment'></div>处盈若虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364725_comment'></div>雄辩敌四海之锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364725_comment'></div>退藏于密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364725_comment'></div>汉王问策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364725_comment'></div>知帝者之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364725_comment'></div>楚子闻名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364725_comment'></div>实诸侯之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364725_comment'></div>故得雄飞白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364725_comment'></div>鹰扬丹笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364725_comment'></div>卷襜帷于天郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364725_comment'></div>设钩距于皇都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364725_comment'></div>若乃抗埋轮之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364725_comment'></div>执惊马之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364725_comment'></div>旌贤有通德之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364725_comment'></div>疾恶存署背之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364725_comment'></div>继轨前途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364725_comment'></div>遇物成兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364725_comment'></div>理关刑政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364725_comment'></div>咸归故事之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364725_comment'></div>义涉箴规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364725_comment'></div>尽入名臣之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364725_comment'></div>加以许与气类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364725_comment'></div>交游豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364725_comment'></div>仕遘夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364725_comment'></div>身更否泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364725_comment'></div>昔尝摄戎幽易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364725_comment'></div>谪居邛巂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364725_comment'></div>亭皋漫漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364725_comment'></div>兴去国之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364725_comment'></div>旗鼓汹汹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364725_comment'></div>助从军之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364725_comment'></div>时复江莺迁树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364725_comment'></div>陇雁出云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364725_comment'></div>梦上京之台沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364725_comment'></div>想故山之风月。<div
