class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364725_comment'></div>当代名流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364725_comment'></div>翕然崇尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364725_comment'></div>自大夫之颂成室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364725_comment'></div>太史之赋京都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364725_comment'></div>魏则十龙儒雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364725_comment'></div>晋则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1364725", 1364725, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>三阳</span>藻缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364725_comment'></div>朝分南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364725_comment'></div>运迄周隋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364725_comment'></div>文人才子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364725_comment'></div>重世閒出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364725_comment'></div>岂止楠榴体物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364725_comment'></div>陈琳得以示人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364725_comment'></div>鹪鹩寄辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364725_comment'></div>阮籍称其王佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364725_comment'></div>故以开国籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364725_comment'></div>鳞次乎史传之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364725_comment'></div>入文场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364725_comment'></div>羽仪乎天下之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364725_comment'></div>公增繁荣叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364725_comment'></div>桂林之一枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364725_comment'></div>弥广源流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364725_comment'></div>荆江之九派。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364725_comment'></div>宗门多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364725_comment'></div>斯为盛与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364725_comment'></div>且如承家旧德之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364725_comment'></div>宾王历官之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364725_comment'></div>玉琯铜浑之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364725_comment'></div>黄公元女之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364725_comment'></div>落猿殪兕之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364725_comment'></div>顾鹊回鸾之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364725_comment'></div>详诸别传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364725_comment'></div>可略言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364725_comment'></div>某室迩兰芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364725_comment'></div>族联棣萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364725_comment'></div>荷千里之嘉奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364725_comment'></div>接四友之良游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364725_comment'></div>谨撰令引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364725_comment'></div>式题前集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364725_comment'></div>七子赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364725_comment'></div>期取类于郑志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364725_comment'></div>一家垂范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364725_comment'></div>庶齐衡于孔丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364725_comment'></div>来日新文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364725_comment'></div>请诸君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364725_comment'></div>起仪凤之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364725_comment'></div>迄景龙以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364725_comment'></div>凡若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364725_comment'></div>列之如目。</div><div id='poem_sentence_126_1364725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=710&endYear=710')">710年</a>　张说与卢思道玄孙卢藏用先后同在朝为官，交密，故为藏用高祖撰碑。作品：《齐黄门侍郎卢思道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》不系此诗作年；周睿《张说研究》系景云二年（711））</span><div id='poem_1364764' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364764' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364764?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐黄门侍郎卢思道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（710年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364764")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364764_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364764'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364764'>有齐黄门侍郎范阳卢公。讳思道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364764_comment'></div>字子行。涿州人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364764_comment'></div>其先姜姓。世胙东海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364764_comment'></div>别为卢氏。家于北燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364764_comment'></div>自汉世中郎将植至侍中阳乌徵君之子。禀天灵杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364764_comment'></div>承家令轨。清明虚受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364764_comment'></div>磊落标奇。言不诡随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364764_comment'></div>行不苟合。游必英俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364764_comment'></div>门无尘杂。至于求已励学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364764_comment'></div>探道睹奥。思若泉涌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364764_comment'></div>文若春华。精微入虚无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364764_comment'></div>变化合飞动。斯固非学徒竭才<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>仰钻</span>之所逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364764_comment'></div>事齐历散骑侍郎。以文翰直中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364764_comment'></div>中废复进。至给事黄门侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364764_comment'></div>待诏文林馆。武平末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364764_comment'></div>天子总兵御寇。太子监国于晋阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364764_comment'></div>公留综宫朝。兼典<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>枢密</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364764_comment'></div>及皇舆败绩于外。而百寮荡析于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364764_comment'></div>公节义独存。侍从趣邺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364764_comment'></div>告至行赏。授<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>仪同三司</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364764_comment'></div>入周除御正上士。定省归郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364764_comment'></div>郡人祖英伯作难。公胁在其旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364764_comment'></div>幽都既平。玉石将燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364764_comment'></div>赖元帅宇文公举。以旧有令闻引谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364764_comment'></div>因命草露板立就。骇其丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364764_comment'></div>异其敏。释于齐斧之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364764_comment'></div>揖于群士之上。除掌教上士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364764_comment'></div>隋高祖为丞相也。迁武阳太守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364764_comment'></div>以母老乞解职。优诏许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364764_comment'></div>后复徵为散骑侍郎。奏内史郎事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364764_comment'></div>隋开皇六年。春秋五十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364764_comment'></div>终于长安。反葬故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364764_comment'></div>凡更臣三代。易官十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364764_comment'></div>再降一免。二去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364764_comment'></div>八平除。擢迁者四而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364764_comment'></div>公处屯安贞。赋诗颓饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364764_comment'></div>视得失蔑如也。临难无慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364764_comment'></div>在黜无愠。危不去主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364764_comment'></div>仕不违亲。休明有宾礼之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364764_comment'></div>颠覆无沦胥之祸。其大雅者欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364764_comment'></div>夫礼仪损益。公能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364764_comment'></div>故与熊安生详定齐礼。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>三坟五典</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364764_comment'></div>公能读之。故与薛道衡侍学储后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364764_comment'></div>公国华人望。光照邻邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364764_comment'></div>故所居之朝。应对宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364764_comment'></div>修词抗议。允执其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364764_comment'></div>故青琐黄缣。异代咸掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364764_comment'></div>大名之下。岂诬也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364764_comment'></div>昔仲尼之后。世载文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364764_comment'></div>鲁有游夏。楚有屈宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364764_comment'></div>汉兴有贾马王扬。后汉有班张崔蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364764_comment'></div>魏有曹王徐陈应刘。晋有潘陆张左孙郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364764_comment'></div>宋齐有颜谢江鲍。梁陈有任王何刘沈谢徐庾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364764_comment'></div>而北齐有温邢卢薛。皆应世翰林之秀者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364764_comment'></div>吟咏性情。纪述事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364764_comment'></div>润色王道。发挥圣门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364764_comment'></div>天下之人。谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>文伯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364764_comment'></div>于戏。国有校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364764_comment'></div>家有塾。禄位以劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364764_comment'></div>风雅犹存。然千数百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364764_comment'></div>群心相尚。竟称者若斯之鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364764_comment'></div>才难不其然乎。然则飞黄虚骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364764_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1364764", 1364764, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>百辔</span>遗路。鹪䳟天运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364764_comment'></div>万翼无阶。文士擅名当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364764_comment'></div>垂声后代。亦云乎才力之绝众故尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364764_comment'></div>开皇以来百三十馀载。天赞唐德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364764_comment'></div>生此多士。公之元孙曰藏用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364764_comment'></div>济美文馆。重禄黄门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364764_comment'></div>永惟衣冠子孙。邑里多改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364764_comment'></div>先人封树。岁久将平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364764_comment'></div>乃假词菲才。刊石表隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364764_comment'></div>庶乎涉齐地者。不薪柳惠之陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364764_comment'></div>过邢山者。无惑子产之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364764_comment'></div>至矣乎。卢氏之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364764_comment'></div>其用心也远矣。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364764_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1364764'>彧彧黄门。实天生德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364764_comment'></div>才盖一世。荣闻四国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364764_comment'></div>文王既没。文在人宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364764_comment'></div>公为宗匠。当朝与能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364764_comment'></div>龙跃春霁。凤鸣朝升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364764_comment'></div>或颂或变。或雅或承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364764_comment'></div>理以神合。声以妙徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364764_comment'></div>高视睢涣。与君代兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364764_comment'></div>人之云亡。十有一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364764_comment'></div>斯文未丧。施于孙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364764_comment'></div>新作丰碑。德音不巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364764_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1364764_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年1月13日</a>　迁同中书门下平章事、监修国史，有文。作品：《让平章事表》<div id='poem_1364653' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364653' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364653?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让平章事表</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年1月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364653")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364653_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364653'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364653'>臣说言。臣伏奉宣旨制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364653_comment'></div>以臣同中书门下平章事。承命战汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364653_comment'></div>拜舞失容。臣说诚惶诚恐顿首顿首死罪死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364653_comment'></div>臣本书生。器识凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364653_comment'></div>仕不望于通贵。禄只期于代耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364653_comment'></div>蒙时宠荣。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1364653", 1364653, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>越践</span>台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364653_comment'></div>局心守职。窃所庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364653_comment'></div>长算经邦。则无逮及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364653_comment'></div>伏以庙堂寄切。军国务殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364653_comment'></div>循涯审分。非臣攸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364653_comment'></div>为国者为官择人。为臣者陈力就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364653_comment'></div>若智小谋大。力微任重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364653_comment'></div>岂敢顾惜微躯。实恐上尘王政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364653_comment'></div>是以披露肝胆。不暇饰词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364653_comment'></div>乞停此授。俯遂诚请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364653_comment'></div>无任怖惧惭惶之至。谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364653_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1364653_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年3月</a>　张说首官宰执，朝廷始封其父官职，说前葬父，已撰墓志；于此又撰先府君神道碑。作品：《唐赠丹州刺史先府君碑》<div id='poem_1364773' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364773' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364773'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364773'>府君讳骘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364773_comment'></div>字成骘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364773_comment'></div>范阳方城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364773_comment'></div>张祖曰挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364773_comment'></div>帝轩之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364773_comment'></div>肇勋弦木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364773_comment'></div>锡姓上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364773_comment'></div>诗有卿士孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364773_comment'></div>史有留侯世家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364773_comment'></div>八叶至东汉司空皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364773_comment'></div>畏厥闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364773_comment'></div>宝如何其。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364773_comment'></div>谦俭孝慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364773_comment'></div>皇哉褒德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364773_comment'></div>永世有词。</div><div id='poem_sentence_170_1364773_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　四月，复为兵部侍郎，依旧平章事为同事苏颋代撰其父神道碑。作品：《故太子少傅苏公碑铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系景云元年（710）十一月。）</span><div id='poem_1364800' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364800' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364800?labeling=true' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364800'>斤斤苏公，体正含道。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364800'>禀灵淳粹，为唐元老。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364800'>忠以卫主，孝以立身。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364800'>文以经国，惠以安人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364800'>司牧九郡，九郡爰静。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364800'>平章百工，百工爰整。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364800'>千载典宪，三朝纲领。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364800'>上纂先人，五代相国。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364800'>下垂馀庆，七子令德。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364800'>帝谓庭硕，伊公是似。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364800'>接侍玉墀，序拜金戺。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364800'>联华謺润，佐我天子。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364800'>于戏彼苍，国干云亡。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1364800'>地颓五岳，天拆三光。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1364800'>备礼诏葬，群官会丧。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364800'>掌史司德，刊铭路傍。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364800_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364800'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1364800_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　时应兼太子侍读，上书以劝。作品：《上东宫劝学启》<div id='poem_1364709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上东宫请讲学启</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364709")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364709'>臣某等启。臣闻安国家定社稷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364709_comment'></div>武功也。经天地纬礼俗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364709_comment'></div>文教也。社稷定矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364709_comment'></div>固宁辑于人和。礼俗兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364709_comment'></div>在刊正于儒范。顺考古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364709_comment'></div>率由旧章。故周文王之为世子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364709_comment'></div>崇礼不倦。魏文帝之在春宫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364709_comment'></div>好古无怠。博览史籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364709_comment'></div>激扬令闻。取高前代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364709_comment'></div>垂名不朽。伏惟皇太子殿下英睿天纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364709_comment'></div>圣敬日跻。神算密发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364709_comment'></div>雄威立断。廓清氛祲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364709_comment'></div>用宁家国。兆人由是归德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364709_comment'></div>六合所以推功。主鬯青宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364709_comment'></div>固本也。分务紫极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364709_comment'></div>观政也。副群生之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364709_comment'></div>作累圣之储。殿下之于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364709_comment'></div>可谓不轻矣。监国理人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364709_comment'></div>可谓至重矣。莫不拭目而视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364709_comment'></div>清耳而听。冀闻异政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364709_comment'></div>以裨圣道。臣愚伏愿崇太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364709_comment'></div>明师。重道尊儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364709_comment'></div>以养天下之士。今礼经残缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364709_comment'></div>学校淩迟。历代经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364709_comment'></div>率多纰缪。实殿下阐扬之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364709_comment'></div>刊定之秋。伏愿博采文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364709_comment'></div>旌求硕学。表正九经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364709_comment'></div>刊考三史。则圣贤遗范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364709_comment'></div>粲然可观。况殿下至性神聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364709_comment'></div>留情国体。幸以问安之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364709_comment'></div>应务之馀。引进文儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364709_comment'></div>详观古典。商略前载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364709_comment'></div>讨论得失。降温颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364709_comment'></div>闻谠议。则政途理体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364709_comment'></div>日以增益。继业承祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364709_comment'></div>永垂德美。臣等行业素轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364709_comment'></div>艺能寡薄。顾惭多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364709_comment'></div>叨侍宫闱。日夜祗惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364709_comment'></div>无以匡辅。区区微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364709_comment'></div>愿效尘露。轻进刍鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364709_comment'></div>望垂采择。临启如失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364709_comment'></div>伏用兢惶。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364709_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1364709_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　为上官昭容撰文。作品：《昭容上官氏碑铭》<div id='poem_1364799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭容上官氏碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1364799'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364799'>天降时雨，山川出云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364799'>乃生灵媛，祚我圣君。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364799'>精微其道，焕炳其文。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364799'>三光错行，昭容纲纪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364799'>百揆繁会，昭容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1364799", 1364799, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>条理</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364799'>外图邦政，内谂天子。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364799'>忧在进贤，思求多士。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364799_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364799'>忠孝心感，天焉报之。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364799'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1364799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　上官婉儿是中宗朝文政之有力协赞者，追复上官氏为昭容后，说为撰文集序言。作品：《中宗上官昭容集序》<div id='poem_1364724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐昭容上官氏文集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364724'>臣闻七声无主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364724_comment'></div>律吕综其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364724_comment'></div>五䌽无章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364724_comment'></div>黼黻交其丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364724_comment'></div>是知气有壹郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364724_comment'></div>非巧辞莫之通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364724_comment'></div>形有万变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364724_comment'></div>非工文莫之写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364724_comment'></div>先王以是经天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364724_comment'></div>究人神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364724_comment'></div>阐寂寞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364724_comment'></div>鉴幽昧。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364724_comment'></div>明淑挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364724_comment'></div>才华绝代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364724_comment'></div>开卷海纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364724_comment'></div>宛若前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364724_comment'></div>摇笔云飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364724_comment'></div>咸同宿搆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364724_comment'></div>初沛国夫人之方娠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364724_comment'></div>梦巨人俾之大秤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364724_comment'></div>曰以是秤量天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364724_comment'></div>既而昭容生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364724_comment'></div>弥月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364724_comment'></div>夫人弄之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364724_comment'></div>秤量天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364724_comment'></div>岂在子乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364724_comment'></div>孩遂哑哑应之曰是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364724_comment'></div>生而能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364724_comment'></div>盖为灵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364724_comment'></div>喜则九围挟纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364724_comment'></div>怒则千里流血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364724_comment'></div>静则黔黎乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364724_comment'></div>动则苍氓罢弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364724_comment'></div>入耳之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364724_comment'></div>谅其难乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364724_comment'></div>贵而势大者疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364724_comment'></div>贱而礼绝者隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364724_comment'></div>近而言轻者忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364724_comment'></div>远而意忠者忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364724_comment'></div>惟窈窕柔曼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364724_comment'></div>诱掖善心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364724_comment'></div>忘味九德之衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364724_comment'></div>倾情六艺之圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364724_comment'></div>故登昆巡海之意寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364724_comment'></div>剪胡刈越之威息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364724_comment'></div>璿台珍服之态消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364724_comment'></div>从禽嗜乐之端废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364724_comment'></div>独使温柔之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364724_comment'></div>渐于生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364724_comment'></div>风雅之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364724_comment'></div>流于来叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364724_comment'></div>非夫元黄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1364724", 1364724, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>毓粹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364724_comment'></div>贞明助思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364724_comment'></div>众妙扶识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364724_comment'></div>群灵挟志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364724_comment'></div>诞异人之宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364724_comment'></div>授兴王之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364724_comment'></div>其孰能臻斯懿乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364724_comment'></div>镇国太平公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364724_comment'></div>道高帝妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364724_comment'></div>才重天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364724_comment'></div>昔尝共游东壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364724_comment'></div>同宴北渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364724_comment'></div>倏来忽往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364724_comment'></div>物在人亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364724_comment'></div>悯雕琯之残言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364724_comment'></div>悲素扇之空曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364724_comment'></div>上闻天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364724_comment'></div>求椒掖之故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364724_comment'></div>有命史臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364724_comment'></div>叙兰台之新集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364724_comment'></div>凡若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364724_comment'></div>列之如左。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1364724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年</a>　为解决中宗享庙习乐问题，上表。作品：《神龙享庙习乐议》<div id='poem_1364697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>神龙享庙习乐议</a><span class='authorDate'>（711年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364697'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364697'>吉凶异仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364697_comment'></div>降杀殊节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364697_comment'></div>以日易月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364697_comment'></div>自久行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364697_comment'></div>其在凶时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364697_comment'></div>不可言祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364697_comment'></div>既祭之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364697_comment'></div>不可存凶事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364697_comment'></div>若祭而废乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364697_comment'></div>吉不除凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364697_comment'></div>是五礼交乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364697_comment'></div>而吉凶驳杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364697_comment'></div>夫王者奉神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364697_comment'></div>承宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364697_comment'></div>二至郊祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364697_comment'></div>四时烝尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364697_comment'></div>鼓钟所以格上下之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364697_comment'></div>舞咏所以象祖先之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364697_comment'></div>于其有祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364697_comment'></div>不可阙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364697_comment'></div>今山陵已毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364697_comment'></div>清庙既祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364697_comment'></div>于礼则吉祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364697_comment'></div>于时则踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364697_comment'></div>宜遵汉礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364697_comment'></div>以复常度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364697_comment'></div>请举永徽故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364697_comment'></div>以行先朝之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364697_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1364697_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=711&endYear=711')">711年10月3日</a>　十月，太平以说不附己，罢知政事，为尚书左丞，分司东都在东都，与韦嗣立、崔日知、崔泰之、魏奉古等赋诗唱和。作品：《奉酬龙门北溪作》<br /></div><div class='label1' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年8月</a>　说知太平公主等阴怀异计，乃因使自东都献佩刀于玄宗，意欲其断割，玄宗深自嘉纳玄宗即位，迁检校中书令，封燕国公，说上表以让。作品：《让封燕国公表》<div id='poem_1364655' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364655' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364655?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让封燕国公表</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364655")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364655_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364655'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364655'>臣说言。伏奉今月七日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364655_comment'></div>封臣燕国公。食封三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364655_comment'></div>宠灵猥及。中心如惔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364655_comment'></div>臣说中谢。臣闻至道之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364655_comment'></div>重法守义。上无无功之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364655_comment'></div>下无无德之禄。故授受礼全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364655_comment'></div>而踰越不起。伏惟陛下光抚宇内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364655_comment'></div>大宁天域。百度维新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364655_comment'></div>万灵翘注。建侯疏壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364655_comment'></div>允荅元功。臣亦何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364655_comment'></div>首膺是命。自古有传道而爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364655_comment'></div>说经而封。盖以训蒙成圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364655_comment'></div>资师通学。臣之侍讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364655_comment'></div>有异前闻。何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364655_comment'></div>大明朝升。萤爝无助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364655_comment'></div>时雨夕濡。浸灌焉施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364655_comment'></div>幸得依附光景。游泳恩渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364655_comment'></div>岂敢虚承启发之恩。谬荷将就之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364655_comment'></div>且如人臣之义。二则为罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364655_comment'></div>愚智之分。一心不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364655_comment'></div>譬如犬马有不背之性。草木有不凋之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364655_comment'></div>知何德于天壤。而欲蒙造化之偏施哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364655_comment'></div>臣之无功。正与此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364655_comment'></div>叨恩过量。终惧且惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364655_comment'></div>乞回圣慈。以容介节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364655_comment'></div>无任惶悚之至。谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364655_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1364655_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年9月</a>　在长安任上有文。作品：《让中书令表》<div id='poem_1364654' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364654' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364654?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让中书令表</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364654'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364654'>臣说言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364654_comment'></div>伏奉今月十一日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364654_comment'></div>授臣中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364654_comment'></div>恩渥自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364654_comment'></div>震越无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364654_comment'></div>臣说中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364654_comment'></div>伏惟陛下至孝安亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364654_comment'></div>大功定国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364654_comment'></div>六合翘首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364654_comment'></div>庶政惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364654_comment'></div>雍熙之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364654_comment'></div>望在兹日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364654_comment'></div>中书理本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364654_comment'></div>臣叨首名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364654_comment'></div>将何以翊赞圣君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364654_comment'></div>光泽天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364654_comment'></div>自臣摄官禁掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364654_comment'></div>已涉七旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364654_comment'></div>不知贤才以举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364654_comment'></div>是不仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364654_comment'></div>不辨不肖以退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364654_comment'></div>是无勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364654_comment'></div>何足以备乎宰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364654_comment'></div>胡颜冒恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364654_comment'></div>复受真拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364654_comment'></div>臣之愚执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364654_comment'></div>正在于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364654_comment'></div>不敢繁辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364654_comment'></div>以尘圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364654_comment'></div>乞回荣授。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1364654_comment'></div>谨诣朝堂奉表陈让以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364654_comment'></div>臣所让人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364654_comment'></div>别状封进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1364654_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年9月</a>　邓国夫人，玄宗母昭成皇太后之妹窦氏，张守让妻，张去奢母张说为邓国夫人撰墓铭，应在先天二年九月玄宗下诏改封燕国前。作品：《邓国夫人墓铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》不系此文作年。）</span><div id='poem_1364822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364822?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1364686_comment'></div>孔子会齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364686_comment'></div>数倡优之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364686_comment'></div>列国如此。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1364686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年12月</a>　开元元年十二月,贬相州前数日,玄武门陪侍玄宗射箭时有诗。作品：《玄武门侍射并序》<div id='poem_24027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玄武门侍射</a><span class='authorDate'>（713年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24027")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24027_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_24027'>开元之初，季冬其望，天子始御北阙，朝羽林军礼修事。厥后二日，乃命紫微、黄门、九卿、六事，与熊罴之将、爪牙之臣合宴焉。侑以纯锦，颁以珍器。尔其射堋新成，布侯既设，槊仗林立，帷轩雾布。众官半醉，皇情载悦。卷珠箔，临玉除，唐弓在手，夏箭斯发，应弦命中（应弦屡中），属羽连飞，弧矢以来，未之有也。若夫天地合道，星辰献仪，端视和容，内正外直，自近而制远，耀威而观德，无不通神，无不极用。是射也，其惟圣人乎？于时繁云覆城，大雪飞苑，天人同泽，上下交欢。退食怀恩，赋诗颂义，凡若干篇。</div><div id='poem_preface_24027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24027'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24027'>射观通玄阙，兵栏辟御筵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24027'>雕弧月半上，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_24027", 24027, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=713&endYear=713')">713年</a>　在京撰写蓝田法池寺二法堂赞并序。作品：《蓝田法池寺二法堂赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》不系此诗作年。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='poem_sentence_0_23930_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23930'>鱼龙生意态，钩剑动<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_23930", 23930, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年</a>　应葛福顺之请，有文。作品：《元城府左果毅赠即将葛公碑》<div id='poem_1364766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元城府左果毅赠郎将葛公碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（721年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364766")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364766'>公讳威德。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364766_comment'></div>曰葛氏。京兆泾阳人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364766_comment'></div>其先嬴姓。咎繇之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364766_comment'></div>夏有葛伯。氏族兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364766_comment'></div>宁陵之傍。尚传侯国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364766_comment'></div>绥山之下。独有仙祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364766_comment'></div>婴则威伏五城。龚则绩称二县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364766_comment'></div>鸿胪秀于吴会。散骑崇于晋景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364766_comment'></div>在其子孙。是宜繁羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364766_comment'></div>公生而开朗。长而英拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364766_comment'></div>非因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1364766", 1364766, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>马郑</span>之学。动合礼经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364766_comment'></div>不待孙吴之书。暗同兵法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364766_comment'></div>有拳勇。尚气概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364766_comment'></div>顾眄棱华。风神都爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364766_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1364766", 1364766, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>五驭</span>善于东野。六射劲于西霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364766_comment'></div>少以嫖姚之才。入光供奉之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364766_comment'></div>御桥骖驾。犯清跸而不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364766_comment'></div>辇道啼乌。应鸣弓而自落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364766_comment'></div>便蕃左右。星岁重深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364766_comment'></div>赐上柱国。拜元城府左果毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364766_comment'></div>天下大定。李广之用无施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364766_comment'></div>云中荐贤。冯唐之言巳老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364766_comment'></div>春秋六十五。神功二年某月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364766_comment'></div>终于洛师。稿殡邙阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364766_comment'></div>夫人太原郡王氏。夫人郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364766_comment'></div>实生大将军福顺。一见圣主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364766_comment'></div>再纽乾纲。重位冠乎北军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364766_comment'></div>茂功藏乎南史。故象服临祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364766_comment'></div>鱼轩以朝。天子深嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364766_comment'></div>叹冯勤之母。群公列拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364766_comment'></div>贺虞潭之亲。享年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364766_comment'></div>薨于京兆之三真里。公爱敬奉亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364766_comment'></div>轨则可移于后代。义方训子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364766_comment'></div>福禄来及于先人。葬有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364766_comment'></div>乃下制曰。礼著饰终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364766_comment'></div>情惟悼往。询诸前烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364766_comment'></div>抑有旧章。前左羽林军大将军葛福顺亡父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364766_comment'></div>守其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1364766", 1364766, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>谦素</span>。宏此艺能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364766_comment'></div>未展才术。奄从凋殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364766_comment'></div>而嗣子克家。式昭勋业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364766_comment'></div>既念功以追远。亦自叶而流根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364766_comment'></div>宜申奖赠。俾慰泉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364766_comment'></div>可赠游击将军守右骁卫翊府郎将。开元九年二月九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364766_comment'></div>葬我郎将君。前夫人王氏后夫人郭氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364766_comment'></div>礼也。章芾以襚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364766_comment'></div>辂旗在列。庙食备其牲牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364766_comment'></div>法葬陈其箫鼓。孝慈之道著矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364766_comment'></div>哀荣之礼毕矣。寻彼平生之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364766_comment'></div>忽如绝光。系乎碑版之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364766_comment'></div>永存遗烈。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364766_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_1364766'>硁硁都尉。角立杰竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364766_comment'></div>神锐玉剑。气雄金鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364766_comment'></div>六艺爰设。射驭为武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364766_comment'></div>百行虽名。忠信为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364766_comment'></div>时不兼命。位不充才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364766_comment'></div>善流庆荅。身谢荣来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364766_comment'></div>太原棣棣。实惟嘉偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364766_comment'></div>羽林桓桓。克大其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_24047'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_24047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年10月</a>　应张承休之请而撰文。作品：《恒州刺史张府君墓志》<div id='poem_1364807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>恒州长史张府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（721年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364807")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364807'>君讳承休。字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364807_comment'></div>吴郡吴人也。留侯兴汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364807_comment'></div>播美西京。长沙徙吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364807_comment'></div>蔽蔓东土。曾祖冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364807_comment'></div>在陈为文帝师。入隋为汉王学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364807_comment'></div>祖后允。授经太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364807_comment'></div>尊之以祭酒。既封新野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364807_comment'></div>又赠以宗伯。考少师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364807_comment'></div>位不充量。止于朱阳宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364807_comment'></div>班固称世名忠孝。魏武谓积善之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364807_comment'></div>昌门一系。晖我诸族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364807_comment'></div>君受天戬谷。传家业艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364807_comment'></div>希言敦行。去华崇实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364807_comment'></div>非法不由。非礼不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364807_comment'></div>精于理物。敏于政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364807_comment'></div>初以南郊斋郎补兖州兵曹。丁太夫人忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364807_comment'></div>庐墓三年。加人一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364807_comment'></div>再任始州司仓。应八科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364807_comment'></div>改郑州录事参军。又举贤良方正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364807_comment'></div>迁杨州司录参军。移苏州常熟令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364807_comment'></div>历政皆有能名。加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364807_comment'></div>入为司农丞。实掌钱谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364807_comment'></div>奸僦息望。使覆囚岭南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364807_comment'></div>是司狱讼。听折惟允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364807_comment'></div>乃授济源令。风行畿甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364807_comment'></div>河润洛师。加朝议大夫上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364807_comment'></div>拜隆州司马。转恒州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364807_comment'></div>而有孚。权而中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364807_comment'></div>婴风恙去职。就医还京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364807_comment'></div>春秋六十有二。终于颁政里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364807_comment'></div>夫人成纪郡君天水秦氏。庐陵郡公行师之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364807_comment'></div>嗣公游福之女。敬事君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364807_comment'></div>诫训诸孤。当代之孟母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364807_comment'></div>年六十二。终于许州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364807_comment'></div>开元九年十月某日。合葬于武功之礼让原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364807_comment'></div>礼也。夫道大难合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364807_comment'></div>仕屯而不进。德高有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364807_comment'></div>身没而福流。君同生八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364807_comment'></div>半服银艾。祚允五子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364807_comment'></div>率为圭璋。比迹于燉煌六龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364807_comment'></div>南郑千室。德门济美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364807_comment'></div>信有徵乎。惧陵谷或迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364807_comment'></div>乃勒铭沈石。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364807_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1364807'>思文留侯。时惟皇祖。<div id='poem_sentence_45_1364807_comment'></div>嵬峨重世。通经二主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364807_comment'></div>诞灵上哲。克广斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364807_comment'></div>猗𨙻叔父。亦足有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364807_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1364807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年10月</a>　在长安上表。作品：《让兵部尚书平章事表》<div id='poem_1364649' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364649' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_18_1364649_comment'></div>犹夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364649_comment'></div>何足以举明邦政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364649_comment'></div>光缉帝猷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364767_comment'></div>罗州大首领杨历之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364767_comment'></div>骠骑大将军兼左骁骑大将军虢国公思勖之母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364767_comment'></div>陈氏家富兵甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364767_comment'></div>代奠峤外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364767_comment'></div>夫人诞灵豪右。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364767_comment'></div>九真为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364767_comment'></div>良史出乎中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364767_comment'></div>五马浮江。<div id='poem_sentence_102_1364767_comment'></div>世祖称其母德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364767_comment'></div>克轸天情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364767_comment'></div>颇为连类。<div id='poem_sentence_107_1364767_comment'></div>嗟阅水之日逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364767_comment'></div>惧藏山之夜徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364767_comment'></div>追镂碑板。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364767_comment'></div>远贻图传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364767_comment'></div>蒸蒸至意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364767_comment'></div>有足感人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364767_comment'></div>悾悾信言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364767_comment'></div>固无愧色。<div id='poem_sentence_117_1364767'>陈公舜后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364767_comment'></div>杨侯周裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364767_comment'></div>去国何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364767_comment'></div>南迁几世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364767_comment'></div>酃渌嶂表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364767_comment'></div>珠崖海际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364767_comment'></div>两族相京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364767_comment'></div>财雄兵锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364767_comment'></div>猗欤邦媛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364767_comment'></div>俪兹国士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364767_comment'></div>友若琴瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364767_comment'></div>花如桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364767_comment'></div>心契法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364767_comment'></div>容和愠喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364767_comment'></div>资敬从夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364767_comment'></div>移忠训子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364767_comment'></div>嘉此令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364767_comment'></div>南溟北归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364767_comment'></div>于天鹤唳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364767_comment'></div>拔湔鸿飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364767_comment'></div>朱宫退敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364767_comment'></div>铜柱来威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364767_comment'></div>国安家宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364767_comment'></div>鱼轩翟衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364767_comment'></div>子封虢国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364767_comment'></div>五公前宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364767_comment'></div>母邑颍川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364767_comment'></div>三君旧土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364767_comment'></div>感激荣庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364767_comment'></div>踟躇今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364767_comment'></div>高堂夜空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364767_comment'></div>吊客朝聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364767_comment'></div>龙首山前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364767_comment'></div>前临灞川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364767_comment'></div>招魂五岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364767_comment'></div>合葬三泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364767_comment'></div>山山邱墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364767_comment'></div>树树风烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364767_comment'></div>孝碑不灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364767_comment'></div>慈坟永传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_156_1364767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年</a>　玄宗亲书张说所撰之大通禅师碑额，说上此表以谢参上《玉泉寺大通禅师碑》解题。作品：《谢御书大通禅师碑额状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》并系此状神龙二年（706），大误。）</span><div id='poem_1364693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御书大通禅师碑额状</a><span class='authorDate'>（721年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364693")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364693'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364693'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364693_comment'></div>内侍尹凤翔宣示御书大通禅师碑额六字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364693_comment'></div>画起平云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364693_comment'></div>点蹲芒玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364693_comment'></div>戈矛攒倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364693_comment'></div>鸾鹤交飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364693_comment'></div>神功发于至想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364693_comment'></div>睿思成于元德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364693_comment'></div>实谓天龙捧持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364693_comment'></div>虚空称赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364693_comment'></div>逝者如在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364693_comment'></div>荐福知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364693_comment'></div>臣栖志禅门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364693_comment'></div>撰碑灵塔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364693_comment'></div>幸遇圣情崇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364693_comment'></div>御书假贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364693_comment'></div>刻星辰于嘉石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364693_comment'></div>烂日月于封邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364693_comment'></div>感极悲生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364693_comment'></div>恩深无荅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364693_comment'></div>臣无任望外殊泽之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1364693_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年</a>　在长安，为姚崇撰写碑文。作品：《故开府仪同三司上柱国赠扬州刺史大都督粱国文贞公碑》<div id='poem_1364790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故开府仪同三司上柱国赠扬州刺史大都督梁国公姚文贞公神道碑奉敕撰</a><span class='authorDate'>（722年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364790")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364790'>叙曰。八柱承天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364790_comment'></div>高明之位定。四时成岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364790_comment'></div>亭育之功存。画为九州禹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364790_comment'></div>尧享鸿名。播时百谷弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364790_comment'></div>舜称至德。由此言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364790_comment'></div>知人则哲。非贤罔乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364790_comment'></div>致君尧舜。何代无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364790_comment'></div>有唐元宰曰梁文贞公者。位为帝之四辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364790_comment'></div>才为国之六翮。言为代之轨物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364790_comment'></div>行为人之师表。盖维岳降神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364790_comment'></div>应时閒出者也。公讳崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364790_comment'></div>字元之。姚姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364790_comment'></div>有虞之后。远自吴兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364790_comment'></div>近徙于陜。今家洛阳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364790_comment'></div>烈考长沙文献公。树勋王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364790_comment'></div>建𣄣巂府。公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1364790", 1364790, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>纨绮</span>而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364790_comment'></div>克广前业。激昂成学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364790_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1364790", 1364790, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>荣问</span>日流。武库则矛戟森然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364790_comment'></div>文房则礼乐尽在。弱冠补孝敬挽郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364790_comment'></div>又制举高第。历佐濮郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364790_comment'></div>并有声华。入为司刑丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364790_comment'></div>天授之际。狱吏峻密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364790_comment'></div>公持法无颇。全活者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364790_comment'></div>进夏官员外郎郎中侍郎。朝廷曰能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364790_comment'></div>遂掌军国。迁凤阁侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364790_comment'></div>监修国史兼相王府长史。始则天人让王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364790_comment'></div>承置醴之顾。终以飞龙利见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364790_comment'></div>延参乘之恩。自时厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364790_comment'></div>恒当大任。凡三处兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364790_comment'></div>三入中书令。一为礼部尚书左庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364790_comment'></div>又肃政大夫总灵武军兵马。又司仆卿知陇右监牧使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364790_comment'></div>出典亳宋常越许申徐潞扬同十郡。景云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364790_comment'></div>以藩邸旧僚。封梁国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364790_comment'></div>食赋百室。公性仁恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364790_comment'></div>行易。虚怀汎爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364790_comment'></div>而泾渭不杂。真率径尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364790_comment'></div>而应变无穷。常推是心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364790_comment'></div>以御于物。故所莅必氓庶风偃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364790_comment'></div>骜狠化从。言不厉而教成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364790_comment'></div>政不威而事理。去思睹颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364790_comment'></div>来暮闻歌。既登邦政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364790_comment'></div>卒乘辑睦。及在宗伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364790_comment'></div>神人克谐。今之中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364790_comment'></div>是为理本。谋事兼于百揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364790_comment'></div>论道总于三台。公执国之钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364790_comment'></div>金玉王度。大浑顺序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364790_comment'></div>休徵来臻。懋德格天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364790_comment'></div>名遂身逊。拜开府仪同三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364790_comment'></div>崇其秩。逸其志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364790_comment'></div>初太夫人在堂。公授职西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364790_comment'></div>颇限扃禁。求侍晨昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364790_comment'></div>优诏既许。寻令还职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364790_comment'></div>公固请以泣。制曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364790_comment'></div>家有令弟。足慰母心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364790_comment'></div>国有栋臣。安可暂阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364790_comment'></div>其后剖符江表。敦谕起复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364790_comment'></div>衰麻外墨。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1364790", 1364790, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>栾棘</span>内毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364790_comment'></div>变礼中权。通识所贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364790_comment'></div>神龙之首。预闻兴复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364790_comment'></div>畴其井赋。累让而停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364790_comment'></div>夫以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1364790", 1364790, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>革故鼎新</span>。大来小往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364790_comment'></div>得丧而不形于色。进退而不失其正者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364790_comment'></div>鲜矣。君子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364790_comment'></div>忠不忘亲。仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364790_comment'></div>哀不违事。义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364790_comment'></div>让功辞邑。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364790_comment'></div>济代全名。智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364790_comment'></div>仁以长人。义以和下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364790_comment'></div>礼以安上。智以周身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364790_comment'></div>宜其光辅四帝。轩冕三纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364790_comment'></div>池台琴筑。优游暮齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364790_comment'></div>传爵土于祚允。保禄位于终始矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364790_comment'></div>享年七十有一。开元九年九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364790_comment'></div>寝疾薨于东都之慈惠里。皇上悼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364790_comment'></div>国人慕焉。抚床辍舂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364790_comment'></div>曾未云比。制赠扬州大都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364790_comment'></div>谥曰文贞。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364790_comment'></div>十年二月。葬于万安山之南原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364790_comment'></div>在疾也。王人赐膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364790_comment'></div>御医视药。于薨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364790_comment'></div>中使吊临。羽仪哀送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364790_comment'></div>君臣之义。厚莫重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364790_comment'></div>子异子弈。思缀遗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364790_comment'></div>以寘罔极。有诏掌文之官叙事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364790_comment'></div>盛德之老铭功。将以宠宗臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364790_comment'></div>扬英烈。帝乃洒恩仙翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364790_comment'></div>镂泽丰賨。日月临照于佳城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364790_comment'></div>烟云变态于神道。宝其文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364790_comment'></div>别为群玉之山。禁其樵苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364790_comment'></div>即表三司之墓。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364790_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1364790'>源深自虞。派别从吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364790_comment'></div>避地鲁陜。居家洛都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364790_comment'></div>神明远契。岳渎冥符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364790_comment'></div>翊圣斯偶。生贤不孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364790_comment'></div>仁将勇济。孝与忠俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364790_comment'></div>学刃攒植。文锋迅驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364790_comment'></div>才安卑位。即骋长途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364790_comment'></div>惟实惟有。若虚若无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364790_comment'></div>再三军国。一二吁谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364790_comment'></div>戎柄尤重。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1364790", 1364790, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>王纶</span>最枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364790_comment'></div>兼司任切。久政荣殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364790_comment'></div>黼藻弥焕。丹青靡渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364790_comment'></div>以宽容物。以鉴分区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364790_comment'></div>外或形放。中恒礼拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364790_comment'></div>箴虽诫口。诤亦忘躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364790_comment'></div>但睹浑璞。谁详瑾瑜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364790_comment'></div>伊皋尺寸。管乐锱铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364790_comment'></div>名正身遂。言诚愿孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364790_comment'></div>方辞汉禄。更辱齐租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364790_comment'></div>既积而散。穷欢尽娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364790_comment'></div>川归东极。日去西晡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364790_comment'></div>上恻旒扆。傍悲路衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364790_comment'></div>蓝田美玉。荔浦明珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364790_comment'></div>载广休庆。爰宏典谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364790_comment'></div>丰碑乃立。盛业其铺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364790_comment'></div>帝念频轸。仙毫特纡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364790_comment'></div>镌金刻石。凤篆龙图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364790_comment'></div>七曜光动。三泉泽濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364790_comment'></div>铨能叙事。理郁词敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364790_comment'></div>求旧铭实。惭殚恧芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364790_comment'></div>缅思云雾。尚想江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364790_comment'></div>有道之德。其何以踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364790_comment'></div>延陵之墓。空此呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364790_comment'></div>存没终始。遐哉邈乎。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年4月</a>　本年命侍中源乾曜、中书令张嘉贞、兵部尚书张说于赤帝坛祈雨，说遂奉敕代撰此文。作品：《奉敕赤帝坛祈雨文》<div id='poem_1364830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364830' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年7月</a>　七月前后，有文赠凉州都督太原郡开国公郭知运。作品：《赠凉州都督上柱国太原郡开国公郭君碑》<div id='poem_1364768' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364768' class='poemTitle </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364768")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364768_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1364768_comment'></div>五方异俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364768_comment'></div>崆峒之人武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364768_comment'></div>故陇上多豪。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1364768_comment'></div>汉祖封亭以列国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364768_comment'></div>其侯于阳曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364768_comment'></div>宅彼太原旧矣。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1364768_comment'></div>友之昆孙武威太守宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364768_comment'></div>宪之犹子散骑常侍芝。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364768_comment'></div>公奔命解围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364768_comment'></div>军声大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364768_comment'></div>加云麾将军右武卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364768_comment'></div>封介休县开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364768_comment'></div>食邑二千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364768_comment'></div>开元二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364768_comment'></div>吐蕃入陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364768_comment'></div>掠坰牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364768_comment'></div>公兵以奇胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364768_comment'></div>寇不复踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364768_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1364768", 1364768, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>积甲山齐</span>而有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364768_comment'></div>收马谷量而未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364768_comment'></div>归功庙算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364768_comment'></div>朝议多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364768_comment'></div>拜右羽林将军持节陇右诸州节度大使兼鄯州都督河源军使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364768_comment'></div>镇西陲信国之藩屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364768_comment'></div>坐北落亦王之爪牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364768_comment'></div>故入奉期门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364768_comment'></div>而出分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1364768", 1364768, id='poem_sentence_109_1364768_comment'></div>潜军一举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364768_comment'></div>大俘九曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364768_comment'></div>锁甲文剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364768_comment'></div>僰马犛牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364768_comment'></div>既献戎捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364768_comment'></div>遂颁朝赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364768_comment'></div>乃兼鸿胪卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364768_comment'></div>摄御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364768_comment'></div>改封太原郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364768_comment'></div>加前食邑三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364768_comment'></div>执宪总军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364768_comment'></div>典属乘障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364768_comment'></div>增爵益邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364768_comment'></div>遇厚恩深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364768_comment'></div>俄而六州群胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364768_comment'></div>相率大叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364768_comment'></div>命公统陇右之骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364768_comment'></div>济河曲之师。<div id='poem_sentence_128_1364768_comment'></div>玉石俱碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364768_comment'></div>拜左武卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364768_comment'></div>授一子官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1364768_comment'></div>立庙致敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1364768_comment'></div>祖考来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1364768_comment'></div>不亦孝乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1364768_comment'></div>为人臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364768_comment'></div>恢疆御侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364768_comment'></div>以劳定国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364768_comment'></div>不亦忠乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364768_comment'></div>若然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364768_comment'></div>归义方于先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364768_comment'></div>扬令名于后代可也。<div id='poem_sentence_199_1364768_comment'></div>英奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364768_comment'></div>朝散大夫前尚辇奉御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364768_comment'></div>英协。<div id='poem_sentence_204_1364768_comment'></div>朝议郎前左卫冑曹参军等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364768_comment'></div>咸善居丧而过哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364768_comment'></div>或从王事而夺礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364768_comment'></div>则知辛贤父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364768_comment'></div>继位将军。<div id='poem_sentence_211_1364768_comment'></div>去本不恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364768_comment'></div>达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364768_comment'></div>而新是谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364768_comment'></div>权也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364768_comment'></div>嘉此武功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364768_comment'></div>皇上念功以惜逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1364768_comment'></div>厚终以遇存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1364768_comment'></div>有诏词人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1364768_comment'></div>长旌武功。</div><div id='poem_sentence_262_1364768_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年</a>　张说与崔日用交密，挽词当撰于日用逝世后不久。作品：《崔尚书挽词》<div id='poem_23998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_allusion_23998'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(222, "poem_allusion_23998")'>留剑</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_23998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23998'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23998'>相宅隆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作当）</span>坤宝，承家占海封。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23998'>庭中男执雁，门外女乘龙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23998'>鸣玉游三省，摐金侍九重。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23998'>一朝宾客散，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(222, "poem_sentence_3_23998")'>留剑</span>在青松。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23998'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23998_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=722&endYear=722')">722年</a>　在朝廷追赠元振为“太子少保”后不久，说为挚友写行状。作品：《兵部尚书代国公赠少保郭公行状》<div id='poem_1364828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部尚书代国公赠少保郭公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（700年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364828")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364828'>公名震。字元振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364828_comment'></div>本太原阳曲人也。大父任相州汤阴令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364828_comment'></div>因居于魏。公少倜傥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364828_comment'></div>廓落有大志。仪观雄杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364828_comment'></div>身长七尺。美须髯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364828_comment'></div>十六入太学。与薛稷赵彦昭同业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364828_comment'></div>时有家仆至。寄钱四百千以为学粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364828_comment'></div>忽有一人。缞服叩门云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364828_comment'></div>五世未葬。棺柩各在一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364828_comment'></div>今欲齐举大事。苦乏资用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364828_comment'></div>闻君家信至。颇能相济否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364828_comment'></div>不问姓名。以车载去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364828_comment'></div>一无所留。深为赵薛所诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364828_comment'></div>公怡然曰。济彼大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364828_comment'></div>亦何诮焉。十八擢进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364828_comment'></div>其年判入高等。时辈皆以校书正字为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364828_comment'></div>公独请外官。授梓州通泉尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364828_comment'></div>至县。落拓不拘小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364828_comment'></div>尝铸钱。掠良人财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364828_comment'></div>以济四方。海内同声合气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364828_comment'></div>有至千万者。则天闻其名。<div class='inline'
