id='poem_sentence_190_1364828_comment'></div>今之王佐。出入将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364828_comment'></div>古之人杰。夙侍宸扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364828_comment'></div>畴咨庙堂。思致尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364828_comment'></div>以期管乐。朕往在储闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364828_comment'></div>洎登宝位。每观其仗义感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364828_comment'></div>愿制凶邪。立诚慷慨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364828_comment'></div>密陈宏益。尔其至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364828_comment'></div>朕实嘉之。顷者枭獍兴谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364828_comment'></div>干戈作衅。太上皇帝既命朕除讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364828_comment'></div>元振又驰奉宸极。始则赉予为弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364828_comment'></div>终则宁朕问安。可谓格于皇天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364828_comment'></div>贯于白日。元恶既剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1364828_comment'></div>庶物惟新。昌言是图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1364828_comment'></div>朕岂忘旧。宜开井邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364828_comment'></div>永誓山河。可进封代国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364828_comment'></div>赐实封四百户。物一千段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364828_comment'></div>子五品官。寻兼御史大夫天下行军大元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364828_comment'></div>是岁。大徵兵众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364828_comment'></div>阅武骊山。兵一百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1364828_comment'></div>号三百万。并奉公节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1364828_comment'></div>是日三令之后。上将亲鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1364828_comment'></div>公虑有大变。因略行礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364828_comment'></div>上大怒。引坐纛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364828_comment'></div>紫微令张说犯鳞而谏。上乃曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364828_comment'></div>元振有保护之功。宜舍军法流新州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364828_comment'></div>未至。属开元元年册尊号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1364828_comment'></div>赦曰。元振往立大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1364828_comment'></div>保护于朕。顷因阅武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1364828_comment'></div>颇失军容。责情放逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1364828_comment'></div>将收后效。可饶州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1364828_comment'></div>未至。卒于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364828_comment'></div>时年五十八。有集二十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1364828_comment'></div>文章有逸气。为世所重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1364828_comment'></div>公少负气纵横。遣意磊落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1364828_comment'></div>作尉巴蜀。不修名检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1364828_comment'></div>及登朝受任。屡使遐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1364828_comment'></div>霜明烈心。玉立贞节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1364828_comment'></div>言行忠正。居取俭约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1364828_comment'></div>饬体杂于皇王。致君期于尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1364828_comment'></div>公务之暇。手不释卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1364828_comment'></div>虽子弟家人。未尝见其喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1364828_comment'></div>前后上事切谏得失十数道。俱焚其稿草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1364828_comment'></div>不以语人。故朝廷莫知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1364828_comment'></div>睿宗尝曰。元振正直齐于宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1364828_comment'></div>政理逾于姚崇。其英谋宏亮过之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1364828_comment'></div>旧于宣阳里居二十馀年。不至诸院马厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1364828_comment'></div>每朝回。对二亲言笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1364828_comment'></div>归室俨如也。不问家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1364828_comment'></div>与狄仁杰朱敬则魏元忠李峤韦安石赵彦昭韦嗣立薛稷张说等为忘言之友。事父母以孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1364828_comment'></div>父爱。授济州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1364828_comment'></div>后以为相。奏请解职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1364828_comment'></div>授银青光禄大夫济州刺史致仕。公殁后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1364828_comment'></div>二亲犹在。自我唐受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1364828_comment'></div>宰臣有二亲者。惟公而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_1364791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑国夫人神道碑奉敕撰</a><span class='authorDate'>（722年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1364791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364791'>郑国夫人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364791_comment'></div>宏农杨氏之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364791_comment'></div>开元神武皇帝惠妃之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364791_comment'></div>曾祖讳谌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364791_comment'></div>以礼乐习文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364791_comment'></div>为越州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364791_comment'></div>祖衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364791_comment'></div>以折冲学武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364791_comment'></div>为游击将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364791_comment'></div>父宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364791_comment'></div>以门才入仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364791_comment'></div>为雍县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364791_comment'></div>而早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364791_comment'></div>初则天之代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364791_comment'></div>夫人言归武氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364791_comment'></div>曰恒安郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364791_comment'></div>生惠妃及家令忠太子仆信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364791_comment'></div>开元十年三月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364791_comment'></div>终于通化里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364791_comment'></div>其四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364791_comment'></div>卜宅于少陵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364791_comment'></div>哀子衔恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364791_comment'></div>号旻仰诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364791_comment'></div>怨报德而未待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364791_comment'></div>托思齐于永慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364791_comment'></div>皇帝悒鸾殿之内忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364791_comment'></div>怅鹤池之外惨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364791_comment'></div>扬淑声而金石刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364791_comment'></div>揭高行而天地感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364791_comment'></div>国史司文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364791_comment'></div>命为郑志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364791_comment'></div>若夫清明下济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364791_comment'></div>岳渎上升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364791_comment'></div>祥会德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364791_comment'></div>庆育邦媛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364791_comment'></div>神授孝理之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364791_comment'></div>天启聪达之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364791_comment'></div>加以润泽诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364791_comment'></div>游玩图传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364791_comment'></div>伯宗好直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364791_comment'></div>预戒将亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364791_comment'></div>重耳羁游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364791_comment'></div>先称必霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364791_comment'></div>岂直汉庭章奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364791_comment'></div>假借仲长之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364791_comment'></div>周官礼仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364791_comment'></div>咨禀宣文之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364791_comment'></div>昌言嘉论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364791_comment'></div>有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364791_comment'></div>螓首蛴领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364791_comment'></div>修眉横波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364791_comment'></div>既工嚬笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364791_comment'></div>易为容止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364791_comment'></div>肃恭而不跼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364791_comment'></div>舒和而不倨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364791_comment'></div>商周革命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364791_comment'></div>遇屯有怡怿之颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364791_comment'></div>桑霍儆子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364791_comment'></div>在贵无骄矜之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364791_comment'></div>端容一貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364791_comment'></div>有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364791_comment'></div>纮綖祭服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364791_comment'></div>阙翟朝衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364791_comment'></div>纂组入神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364791_comment'></div>剪制惊国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364791_comment'></div>雕胡之饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364791_comment'></div>露葵之羹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364791_comment'></div>五齐六清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364791_comment'></div>三臡七醢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364791_comment'></div>咸一见而洞理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364791_comment'></div>或不习而知和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364791_comment'></div>女工中馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364791_comment'></div>有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364791_comment'></div>惠载诞皇子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364791_comment'></div>在者四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364791_comment'></div>骊泉多龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364791_comment'></div>上宫络绎于闺庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364791_comment'></div>送终则威仪倾都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364791_comment'></div>车骑曀目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364791_comment'></div>自宫徂野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364791_comment'></div>中使相望于道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364791_comment'></div>哀荣之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364791_comment'></div>书记䍐闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364791_comment'></div>猗欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364791_comment'></div>所谓小君之遗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364791_comment'></div>圣善之高烈者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364791_comment'></div>如使后代考南史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364791_comment'></div>议西陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364791_comment'></div>披牍而叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364791_comment'></div>临山原而茫昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364791_comment'></div>旌贲之道。<div id='poem_sentence_144_1364791_comment'></div>武担之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364791_comment'></div>非明淑之垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364791_comment'></div>其何设焉。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年</a>　元怀景为张说岳父，怀景卒，说即为撰此碑。作品：《唐故左庶子赠幽州都督元府君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（《陈谱》、《熊谱》均误，应从《张说集校注》改系十年。）</span><div id='poem_1364825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故左庶子赠幽州都督元府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（719年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364825")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364825'>维开元十年正月己未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364825_comment'></div>左庶子武陵公河南元公薨于东京留守之内馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364825_comment'></div>公讳怀景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364825_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364825_comment'></div>魏武陵王雄之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364825_comment'></div>右卫大将军冑之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364825_comment'></div>赠麟州刺史仁惠之季子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364825_comment'></div>昔天启水行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364825_comment'></div>君临寰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364825_comment'></div>雄图长发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364825_comment'></div>本枝硕茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364825_comment'></div>济美象贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364825_comment'></div>馀庆不陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364825_comment'></div>公受兹介祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364825_comment'></div>诞膺淑灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364825_comment'></div>幼有纯至之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364825_comment'></div>长立公直之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364825_comment'></div>学综群艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364825_comment'></div>词擅精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364825_comment'></div>夫其结言以信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364825_comment'></div>导物以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364825_comment'></div>清俭足以轨俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364825_comment'></div>真厉足以矫邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364825_comment'></div>故美畅于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364825_comment'></div>名扬于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364825_comment'></div>弱冠以国子进士高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364825_comment'></div>补相王府典签。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364825_comment'></div>藩邸择贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364825_comment'></div>妙尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1364825", 1364825, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>时选</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364825_comment'></div>寻以内忧去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364825_comment'></div>重补相王府参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364825_comment'></div>及明两升储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364825_comment'></div>作贞万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364825_comment'></div>以宫臣除太子通事舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364825_comment'></div>天授中以亲累除名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364825_comment'></div>向逾一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364825_comment'></div>后除直罗温县二令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364825_comment'></div>虽大位未享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364825_comment'></div>通材必久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364825_comment'></div>初自太府主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364825_comment'></div>累入副卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364825_comment'></div>河南掾曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364825_comment'></div>克升亚尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364825_comment'></div>握兰右辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364825_comment'></div>纲纪南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364825_comment'></div>秉兹宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364825_comment'></div>肃彼专席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364825_comment'></div>再侍储华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364825_comment'></div>卒践宫相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364825_comment'></div>公执心好直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364825_comment'></div>履法断恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364825_comment'></div>触雷霆而除恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364825_comment'></div>不避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364825_comment'></div>枉丝发而干誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364825_comment'></div>不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364825_comment'></div>升降两宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364825_comment'></div>出入三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364825_comment'></div>克慎其始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364825_comment'></div>终厥有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364825_comment'></div>君子以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364825_comment'></div>允哉其难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364825_comment'></div>及启手归全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364825_comment'></div>遗言薄葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364825_comment'></div>家无长物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364825_comment'></div>士伏其清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364825_comment'></div>年过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1364825", 1364825, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>悬舆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364825_comment'></div>人伤其夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364825_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364825_comment'></div>制赠都督幽州诸军事幽州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364825_comment'></div>赙悼之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364825_comment'></div>优于恒数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364825_comment'></div>明年二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364825_comment'></div>归葬于咸阳之旧茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364825_comment'></div>夫人韦氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364825_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364825_comment'></div>夫人即逍遥公敬远之元孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364825_comment'></div>左常侍希仲之叔姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364825_comment'></div>淑行无徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364825_comment'></div>华年早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364825_comment'></div>其孤彦仲等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364825_comment'></div>克遵遗训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364825_comment'></div>靡及寘哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364825_comment'></div>说情睦外姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364825_comment'></div>怀深国士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364825_comment'></div>既阙西阶之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364825_comment'></div>远投东武之词。<div id='poem_sentence_89_1364825_comment'></div>体微知章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364825_comment'></div>在艺斯博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364825_comment'></div>于欲则少。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年6月</a>　本年六月，送王晙赴朔方军出发之时张九龄同以诗相送。作品：《奉和送王晙巡边应制》<div id='poem_24042' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24042' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24042?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制送王晙巡边应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（723年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24042")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24042_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24042'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24042'>六月歌周雅，三边遣<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作谂）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_24042", 24042, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>夏卿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24042'>欲施攻战法，先作简稽行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24042'>礼乐知谋帅，春秋识用兵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24042'>一劳堪定国，万里即长城。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24042'>策有和戎利，威传破虏名。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24042'>军前雨洒道，楼上月临营。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24042'>别藻瑶华降，同衣锦襮荣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_24042'>关山由义近，戎马<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作甲）</span>为恩轻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_24042'>丝竹路傍散，风云马上生。<div id='poem_sentence_8_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_24042'>朝廷谓吉甫，邦国望君平。<div id='poem_sentence_9_24042_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年</a>　闰五月奉命前往朔方巡边，有文。作品：《进佛像表》<div id='poem_1364661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进佛像表</a><span class='authorDate'>（723年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364661")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364661'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364661'>臣说言。去年行塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364661_comment'></div>至朔州忍辱尼寺。见有高祖太宗造金像银趺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364661_comment'></div>刻题尊号。彼州士女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364661_comment'></div>屡瞻佛光。臣恳思圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364661_comment'></div>如在咫尺。伏以皇帝事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364661_comment'></div>远存荒塞。拯溺救焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364661_comment'></div>身勤虑苦。归诚佛宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364661_comment'></div>何神不据。信知功遍区域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364661_comment'></div>泽周生人。心凭神灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364661_comment'></div>躬履危险。故皇天眷命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364661_comment'></div>奄有邦家。后嗣圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364661_comment'></div>钦承大宝。所当思由积德而兴帝系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364661_comment'></div>本艰难而成王业。先圣一心奉佛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364661_comment'></div>盖为百姓求福也。陛下为继文之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364661_comment'></div>实创业之功。再廓氛祲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364661_comment'></div>重安庙社。垂统万亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364661_comment'></div>同符祖宗。夫惟兴王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364661_comment'></div>必籍佐命。咸有一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364661_comment'></div>克享天心。书曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364661_comment'></div>非天私我有商。惟天佑于一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364661_comment'></div>非商求于下民。惟民归于一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364661_comment'></div>功臣同德。可不念哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364661_comment'></div>物有小而感深。事有微而传远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364661_comment'></div>臣谨将金像随表奉进。谨言。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364770_comment'></div>宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364770_comment'></div>松栝无幽而入殿堂之构。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364770_comment'></div>父陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364770_comment'></div>代相蕃国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364770_comment'></div>号为东赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364770_comment'></div>戎言谓宰曰论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364770_comment'></div>因而氏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364770_comment'></div>公有由余之深识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364770_comment'></div>日磾之先见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364770_comment'></div>陋偏荒之韦毳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364770_comment'></div>慕上国之衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364770_comment'></div>圣历二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364770_comment'></div>以所统<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1364770", 1364770, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>吐浑</span>七千帐归于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364770_comment'></div>是岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364770_comment'></div>吐蕃大下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364770_comment'></div>公勒兵境上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364770_comment'></div>纵谍招之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364770_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1364770", 1364770, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>吐浑</span>以论家世恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364770_comment'></div>又曰仁人东矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364770_comment'></div>从之者七千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364770_comment'></div>朝嘉大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364770_comment'></div>授左玉钤卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364770_comment'></div>封酒泉郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364770_comment'></div>食邑二千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364770_comment'></div>周语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364770_comment'></div>犬戎树敦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364770_comment'></div>守终纯固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364770_comment'></div>今其俗犷而轻死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364770_comment'></div>其法折而不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364770_comment'></div>故前代无降人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364770_comment'></div>中土无僮仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364770_comment'></div>自公拔身向化首变华风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364770_comment'></div>泽潞之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364770_comment'></div>始见戎州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364770_comment'></div>若夫河南胡苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364770_comment'></div>坰牧所利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364770_comment'></div>每岁冰合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364770_comment'></div>虏骑是虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364770_comment'></div>中军必谋于元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364770_comment'></div>亚将固选于时杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364770_comment'></div>神龙三年以为朔方军前锋游奕使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364770_comment'></div>景龙二年换右骁骑将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364770_comment'></div>开元五年兼归德州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364770_comment'></div>使皆如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364770_comment'></div>八年迁本卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364770_comment'></div>改朔方节度副大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364770_comment'></div>公之理兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364770_comment'></div>坚三革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364770_comment'></div>利五刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364770_comment'></div>偶拳勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364770_comment'></div>齐足力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364770_comment'></div>信赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364770_comment'></div>分甘苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364770_comment'></div>六辔如手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364770_comment'></div>千夫一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364770_comment'></div>接獯猃犹蚊蚋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364770_comment'></div>卧沙塞如衽席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364770_comment'></div>荐居露食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364770_comment'></div>垂二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364770_comment'></div>雨毕而成师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364770_comment'></div>冰泮而休卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364770_comment'></div>寒风入于肌骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364770_comment'></div>夜霜出于须鬓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364770_comment'></div>人不堪其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364770_comment'></div>公不改其节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364770_comment'></div>韩公之建三城也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364770_comment'></div>公洗兵诺真之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364770_comment'></div>刷马草心之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364770_comment'></div>以为外斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364770_comment'></div>而版徒安堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364770_comment'></div>郑卿之和默啜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364770_comment'></div>公授馆李陵之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364770_comment'></div>致饔光禄之塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364770_comment'></div>以为内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364770_comment'></div>而宾至如归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364770_comment'></div>九姓之乱单于也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364770_comment'></div>公四月度碛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364770_comment'></div>过白柽林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364770_comment'></div>收火拔部帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364770_comment'></div>纳多真种落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364770_comment'></div>弥川满野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364770_comment'></div>怀惠忘亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364770_comment'></div>漠南诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364770_comment'></div>韪其计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364770_comment'></div>降户之叛河曲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364770_comment'></div>公千骑奋击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364770_comment'></div>万虏奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364770_comment'></div>戡剪略定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364770_comment'></div>师旅方旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364770_comment'></div>而延陁跌复相啸聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364770_comment'></div>上军败于青刚岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364770_comment'></div>元师没于赤柳涧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364770_comment'></div>公越自新堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364770_comment'></div>奔命寇场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364770_comment'></div>赢粮之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364770_comment'></div>不满五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364770_comment'></div>凶丑四合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364770_comment'></div>众寡万倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364770_comment'></div>公杀牛为垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364770_comment'></div>啖寇为饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364770_comment'></div>决命再宿。<div id='poem_sentence_111_1364770_comment'></div>千里转战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364770_comment'></div>合薛讷于河外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364770_comment'></div>反知运于寇手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364770_comment'></div>朔方诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364770_comment'></div>壮其战矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364770_comment'></div>斫摩之奔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364770_comment'></div>邀于黑山口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364770_comment'></div>覆其精锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364770_comment'></div>布思之背也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364770_comment'></div>追至红桃帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364770_comment'></div>掩其辎重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364770_comment'></div>乳泊之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364770_comment'></div>刜兰池之狂胡。<div id='poem_sentence_131_1364770_comment'></div>三垂乂宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364770_comment'></div>声暴露于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364770_comment'></div>业光华于代载。<div id='poem_sentence_136_1364770_comment'></div>故锦衣宝玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364770_comment'></div>允荅戎功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364770_comment'></div>甲第良田。<div id='poem_sentence_141_1364770_comment'></div>未甚优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364770_comment'></div>黄头黑齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364770_comment'></div>比价齐名。<div id='poem_sentence_146_1364770_comment'></div>恩命尚药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364770_comment'></div>驰往诊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364770_comment'></div><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364770_comment'></div>十一年四月五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364770_comment'></div>薨于位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364770_comment'></div>享年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364770_comment'></div>制赠为拨川王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364770_comment'></div>称故国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364770_comment'></div>志其本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364770_comment'></div>太常议谥曰忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_24129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24129'>嗟不逢明盛，胡能照隐微。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24129'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(420, "poem_sentence_4_24129")'>柏台</span>简行李，兰殿锡朝衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24129'>别曲动秋风，恩令生春辉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24129'>使出四海安，诏下万心归。<div id='poem_sentence_8_24129'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_24129_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='bb18db492f734101a2f88f6cd0024f54_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>，58岁</div><div id='bb18db492f734101a2f88f6cd0024f54' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年闰12月6日</a>　十二月六日，文武百官吏部尚书裴漼等上书请封东岳数日后，张说等上表，恳请玄宗同意王公百官建议至泰山封禅的请求。作品：《请许王公百官封泰山表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1364670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364670?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请许王公百官封太山表</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年闰12月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364670'>臣说等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364670_comment'></div>臣闻圣人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364670_comment'></div>与天地合其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364670_comment'></div>故珍符休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364670_comment'></div>不可得而辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364670_comment'></div>鸿名盛典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364670_comment'></div>不可得而让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364670_comment'></div>陛下功格上天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364670_comment'></div>泽流厚载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364670_comment'></div>三五之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364670_comment'></div>莫能比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364670_comment'></div>登封告成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364670_comment'></div>理叶幽赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364670_comment'></div>故符瑞必臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364670_comment'></div>天意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364670_comment'></div>书轨大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364670_comment'></div>人事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364670_comment'></div>菽粟屡登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364670_comment'></div>和平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364670_comment'></div>刑罚不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364670_comment'></div>至理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364670_comment'></div>今陛下稽天意以固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364670_comment'></div>违人事以久让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364670_comment'></div>是和平而不崇昭报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364670_comment'></div>至理而阙荐祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364670_comment'></div>亿兆之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364670_comment'></div>犹知不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364670_comment'></div>况上帝临照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364670_comment'></div>祖宗顾諟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364670_comment'></div>其可止乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364670_comment'></div>愿纳王公卿士列岳缙绅之众望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364670_comment'></div>回命有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364670_comment'></div>速定大典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364670_comment'></div>臣等不胜恳祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364670_comment'></div>敢昧死再拜上言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1364670_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>　增修蒲津桥，唐史记此事相互矛盾修桥作赞为二事。作品：《蒲津桥赞》<div id='poem_1364728' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364728' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364728?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蒲津桥赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364728")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364728_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364728'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364728'>易曰利涉大川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364728_comment'></div>济乎难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364728_comment'></div>诗曰造舟为梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364728_comment'></div>通乎险也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364728_comment'></div>域中有四渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364728_comment'></div>黄河是其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364728_comment'></div>河上有三桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364728_comment'></div>蒲津是其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364728_comment'></div>隔秦称塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364728_comment'></div>临晋名关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364728_comment'></div>关西之要冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364728_comment'></div>河东之辐凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364728_comment'></div>必由是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364728_comment'></div>其旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364728_comment'></div>横絙百丈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364728_comment'></div>连舰十艘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364728_comment'></div>辫修笮以维之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364728_comment'></div>系围木以距之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364728_comment'></div>亦云固矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364728_comment'></div>然每冬冰未合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364728_comment'></div>春冱初解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364728_comment'></div>流澌峥嵘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364728_comment'></div>塞川而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364728_comment'></div>如础如臼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364728_comment'></div>如堆如阜。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1364728_comment'></div>绠断航破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364728_comment'></div>无岁不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364728_comment'></div>虽残渭南之竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364728_comment'></div>仆陇坻之松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364728_comment'></div>败辄更之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364728_comment'></div>罄不供费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364728_comment'></div>津吏成罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364728_comment'></div>县徒告劳。<div id='poem_sentence_36_1364728_comment'></div>皇帝闻之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364728_comment'></div>嘻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364728_comment'></div>我其虑哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364728_comment'></div>乃思索其极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364728_comment'></div>敷祐于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364728_comment'></div>通其变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364728_comment'></div>使人不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364728_comment'></div>相其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364728_comment'></div>授彼有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364728_comment'></div>俾铁代竹。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364728_comment'></div>受无疆惟休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364728_comment'></div>亦无疆惟恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364728_comment'></div>结而为连锁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364728_comment'></div>镕而为伏牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364728_comment'></div>偶立于两岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364728_comment'></div>永代作则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364728_comment'></div>原夫天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364728_comment'></div>仁以平心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364728_comment'></div>义以和气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364728_comment'></div>礼以成政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364728_comment'></div>智以节财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364728_comment'></div>心平则应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364728_comment'></div>谐百神矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364728_comment'></div>气和则感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364728_comment'></div>生万物矣。<div id='poem_sentence_98_1364728_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>　张说代为撰碑文。作品：《唐故高内侍碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系开元十三年（725）五月。）</span><div id='poem_1364771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故高内侍碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364771")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364771'>孝足动天。义堪变地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364771_comment'></div>河中见三州之姓。炳彼精诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364771_comment'></div>南亭闻再逢之母。彰兹奇事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364771_comment'></div>不有隐德。旷代谁邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364771_comment'></div>内侍高延福者。将军力士之慈父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364771_comment'></div>粤自西云干吕。东明衔璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364771_comment'></div>以亡王之族。处巷伯之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364771_comment'></div>而将军本系冯亭。代家南越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364771_comment'></div>未知父母。来奉宫闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364771_comment'></div>老而无子曰悲。幼而失亲曰苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364771_comment'></div>调之悲者。笙磬异器而同音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364771_comment'></div>貌之苦者。秦胡别状而共色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364771_comment'></div>从此断金合要。投漆相受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364771_comment'></div>承顺无违。日严生乎本性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364771_comment'></div>仁慈匪饰。天属由乎自我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364771_comment'></div>父子之名既定。姓氏之目因移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364771_comment'></div>大将军之家。去郑而取卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364771_comment'></div>平原侯之室。变郭而从甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364771_comment'></div>亦犹是也。既而内侍以鸿渐登朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364771_comment'></div>苒蒻朱绂。将军以龙楼得主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364771_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1364771", 1364771, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>艳耀</span>金章。其训子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364771_comment'></div>温室之树无言。车中之马数对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364771_comment'></div>其事亲也。三牲有养志之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364771_comment'></div>百行无匪疾之忧。至矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364771_comment'></div>高氏之子也。以思亲之愿而展亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364771_comment'></div>以欲报之诚而报德。神明翕而哀恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364771_comment'></div>荒裔竦而慕义。乃有旁求圣善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364771_comment'></div>提挈炎洲。二纪积离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364771_comment'></div>万里遥至。音容莫识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364771_comment'></div>涕对茫然。验七星于子心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364771_comment'></div>认双环于母臂。而后深伤顿感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364771_comment'></div>若坠谷而登天。蕴怨都除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364771_comment'></div>类愈矇而睹日。于是尽欢二媪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364771_comment'></div>兼敬三人。均养之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364771_comment'></div>咸不寐于十起。反哺之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364771_comment'></div>齐色难于一堂。群公贺虞潭之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364771_comment'></div>天子叹冯勤之母。此复然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364771_comment'></div>内侍事主四朝。历官七政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364771_comment'></div>专良恭肃。著美纶言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364771_comment'></div>冲谦俭让。得名朝列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364771_comment'></div>年六十有四。开元十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364771_comment'></div>终于来庭里。明年五月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364771_comment'></div>葬于长乐原。继子力士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364771_comment'></div>丧孺慕而加等。葬罄诚而备物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364771_comment'></div>义方之经。郁为称首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364771_comment'></div>孝德之传。今见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364771_comment'></div>永惟先恩。追缀馀烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364771_comment'></div>若夫慈羁旅之稚童。仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364771_comment'></div>约诗礼之尊教。义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364771_comment'></div>贵不居而要避权。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364771_comment'></div>生推心而死有托。信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364771_comment'></div>仁为德本。义为行先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364771_comment'></div>礼为身宅。信为意田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364771_comment'></div>故仁之报也寿。义之报也乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364771_comment'></div>礼之报也安。信之报也顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364771_comment'></div>履顺居安。乘乐享寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364771_comment'></div>此四者。生人之伟事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364771_comment'></div>自求之深致者矣。于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364771_comment'></div>颔赐冠。驰宠势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364771_comment'></div>偃蹇俗上。煜爚君旁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364771_comment'></div>岂不思景行高山。慎视前辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364771_comment'></div>如或少选亡礼。颠沛违仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364771_comment'></div>瞻言四报。咫尺千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364771_comment'></div>扬芳树淑。其不务乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364771_comment'></div>予固春秋之徒也。惩不滥而劝不僭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364771_comment'></div>义重天纲。孝崇人纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364771_comment'></div>乐谆谆之成训。善哀哀之克子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364771_comment'></div>不著倚相之书。将受邱明之耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364771_comment'></div>九原上。千月深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364771_comment'></div>览碑版。伤知音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364771_comment'></div>有以见古史之心也。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364771_comment'></div>高堂乐未散。重壤哀巳擗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364771_comment'></div>宝帐吹灵衣。金樽照尘席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364771_comment'></div>苦长夜之易泯。怨寸景之难惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364771_comment'></div>刻义声与孝心。万古千龄传此石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364771_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_75_1364771_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0a6343d7dc134dd6ab40abaebcb0821f_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年10月11日</a>　玄宗借重的著名战将王君㚟死，瓜州失守，说撰表，借巂州斗羊事以申讽喻。作品：《进巂州斗羊表》<div id='poem_1364662' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364662' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364662?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进巂州斗羊表</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年10月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364662")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364662_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364662'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364662'>臣说言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364662_comment'></div>臣闻勇士<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1364662", 1364662, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>冠鸡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364662_comment'></div>武夫戴鹖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364662_comment'></div>推情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1364662", 1364662, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>举类</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364662_comment'></div>获此斗羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364662_comment'></div>远生越巂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364662_comment'></div>蓄情刚决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364662_comment'></div>敌不避强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364662_comment'></div>战不顾死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364662_comment'></div>虽为微物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364662_comment'></div>志不可挫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364662_comment'></div>伏惟陛下选良家于六郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364662_comment'></div>求猛士于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364662_comment'></div>鸟无遁材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364662_comment'></div>兽不藏伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364662_comment'></div>如蒙效奇灵囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364662_comment'></div>角力天场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364662_comment'></div>却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1364662", 1364662, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>鼓怒</span>以作气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364662_comment'></div>前踯躅以奋击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364662_comment'></div>趹若奔云之交触。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364662_comment'></div>碎若转石之相叩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364662_comment'></div>裂骨赌胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364662_comment'></div>溅血争雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364662_comment'></div>敢毅见而冲冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364662_comment'></div>鸷狠闻而击节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364662_comment'></div>冀将少助明主市骏骨揖怒蛙之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364662_comment'></div>若使羊能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364662_comment'></div>必将曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364662_comment'></div>苦斗不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364662_comment'></div>立有死者。<div id='poem_sentence_31_1364662_comment'></div>臣缘损足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364662_comment'></div>未堪履地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364662_comment'></div>谨遣男驸马都尉垍谨诣金明门陈进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364662_comment'></div>轻冒宸严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364662_comment'></div>伏深战越。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1364662_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年</a>　玄宗赐罗绢，说上表相谢。作品：《谢赐撰郑国夫人碑罗绢状》<div id='poem_1364691' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364691' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364691?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐撰郑国夫人碑罗绢状</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364691")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364691_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364691'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364691'>右。内侍尹凤翔宣口敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364691_comment'></div>得所进斗羊表及郑国夫人碑。今赐卿䌽罗二十匹绢一千匹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364691_comment'></div>伏以斗羊薄技。恩感战士之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364691_comment'></div>雕虫陋词。愧称贤母之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364691_comment'></div>效轻赏重。戴厚惭深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364691_comment'></div>臣子之情。岂望天报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364691_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1364691_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年11月</a>　在长安，有应制诗。作品：《奉和圣制义成校猎喜雪应制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》未系年，周睿《张说研究》系开元十一年，不从。）</span><div id='poem_24126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制义成校猎喜雪应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24126")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24126'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24126'>文教资武功，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_24126", 24126, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>郊畋</span>阅邦政。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24126'>不知仁育久，徒看禽兽盛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24126'>夜霰氛埃灭，朝日山川净。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24126'>绰仗飞走繁，抨弦筋角劲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24126'>帝射参神道，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_24126", 24126, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>龙驰</span>合人性。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24126'>五豝连一发，百中皆先命。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24126'>勇爵均万夫，雄图罗七圣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_24126'>星为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_24126", 24126, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>吉符</span>老，雪作丰年庆。<div id='poem_sentence_7_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_24126'>喜听行猎诗，威神入军令。<div id='poem_sentence_8_24126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_24126'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_24126_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=727&endYear=727')">727年</a>　张说在朝撰河西节度副大使安敬忠碑铭。作品：《河西节度副大使安公碑铭并序》<div id='poem_1364793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河西节度副大使鄯州都督安公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364793")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1364793_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364793'>公讳忠敬。字某。武威人也。轩辕帝孙。降居弱水。安息王子。以国为姓。世高之违汉季。自河南而适辽东。高阳之受魏封。由阴山而宅凉土。高阳王同生尚书左仆射河涧公原晤真。河涧生建节将军西平公缬从正。西平生龙骧将军黄门侍郎广宗侯薛晤徵。累叶勋华。载于魏史。高祖何藏器。广宗之子也。周开府仪同三司宁远将军肃州刺史张掖郡公。曾祖罗方大。隋开府仪同三司。皇朝赠石州刺史贵乡公。祖兴贵。右武大将军凉州刺史。徙封荣凉归三国公。考文生不仕。凉公皇运经纶。首平李轨。大举河湟之地。远通城郭之国。宠锡蕃庶。冠绝等夷。水出渥洼之神。文马者二千乘。山得崆峒之武。朱轮者四十人。/公育荣盛之门。郁豪爽之气。孝友天至。清华玉立。幼聚童儿。必为军阵之戏。长交英俊。唯谈韬略之书。始以良家子仆射韦公待价引于帐下。安息军建奇绩。解褐授游击将军临洮府右果毅。复以善部统。御史大夫唐公休璟处之前锋。洪源谷立异效。迁右威卫翊府右郎将兼新泉军使。进本卫中郎将赤水军副使兼赤水新泉两军监牧使。改会州刺史营田使。换松州都督防御使。迁左司御率兼河西节度副大使临洮军使。转鄯州都督。使如故。其在军州。倾心下士。视人如子。无约而亲附。不言而条理。其在农牧。大田多稼。如茨如梁。思马斯才。有驈有皇。输力四朝。历官三纪。名参禁卫。身任疆场。以静总繁。以逸待寇。我无亡镞之费。敌有不战之屈。兹所谓一方之干城者也。享年六十有六。开元十四年十一月二十八日。寝疾终于位。知与不知。莫不陨涕。十五年某月。葬于乌城之南志公乡。祔先茔也。公宽以御众。卑以自牧。直而无讦。廉而无刿。朋友不闻臧否之言。家人不见喜愠之色。加以心净三业。躬勤八戒。推是而行。何往不济。初甘州有舍利沙多禅师。道场之四果也。尝云。檀越德充于内。神护于外。虽冒锋镝。永无害也。及百战之后。启手归全。西州士人。闻之激厉。有子仲璋如璋季璋金璋重璋。庭袭芝兰。丧过栾棘。敬奉窀穸。备礼仪于文武。撰述家风。刻功名于金石。词曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364793'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364793'>玉关气爽，金波秋澈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364793'>凉野萧条，寒山积雪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364793'>授灵产义，精劲才杰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364793'>孝固纯深，忠维刚烈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364793'>负羽从军，奋飞青云。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364793'>麾幢按部，惠流时雨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364793'>总军挟郡，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1364793", 1364793, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>入文出武</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364793'>三十年间，式遏戎虏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364793'>疆场务静，非公莫镇。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364793'>金鼓气雄，非公莫震。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364793'>神山与铗，龙池取骏。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364793'>霹雳陷营，冲风入阵。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364793'>勇将知时，仁兵善持。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1364793'>反耕罢战，王者之师。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1364793'>牧马如云，屯庾如坻。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364793'>西军方壮，东首长辞。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364793'>振古同嗟，没而不死。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1364793'>所谓明德，永传神理。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1364793'>钟鼎题门，珠玉名子。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1364793'>信言丰石，令问不巳。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1364793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1364793'></div><div id='poem_1364712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大衍历序</a><span class='authorDate'>（728年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364712")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364712'>特进集贤院学士修国史上柱国燕国公臣说言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364712_comment'></div>历者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364712_comment'></div>先王以明时授人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364712_comment'></div>敬天育物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364712_comment'></div>辰极恒居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364712_comment'></div>斗运不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364712_comment'></div>晦朔相推而变月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364712_comment'></div>寒暑往来而成岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364712_comment'></div>日月右进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364712_comment'></div>周天之度启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364712_comment'></div>星辰左旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364712_comment'></div>正时之气合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364712_comment'></div>积馀分而置闰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364712_comment'></div>配甲子而设蔀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364712_comment'></div>凤鸟为司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364712_comment'></div>畴人受职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364712_comment'></div>分分而加之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364712_comment'></div>百钧必过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364712_comment'></div>毫毫而减之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364712_comment'></div>千里必差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364712_comment'></div>何则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364712_comment'></div>古法存而其人异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364712_comment'></div>不有大圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364712_comment'></div>孰能起之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364712_comment'></div>伏惟开元神武皇帝陛下钦崇天道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364712_comment'></div>慎徽月令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364712_comment'></div>受命再新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364712_comment'></div>改制创历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364712_comment'></div>十有三祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364712_comment'></div>诏沙门一行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364712_comment'></div>上本轩顼夏殷周鲁五王一侯之遗式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364712_comment'></div>下集太初至于麟德二十三家之众议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364712_comment'></div>比其异同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364712_comment'></div>课其疏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364712_comment'></div>或前疑而后定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364712_comment'></div>或始会而终乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364712_comment'></div>振古未探之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364712_comment'></div>必发挥于神算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364712_comment'></div>大钧不测之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364712_comment'></div>尽覼缕于天聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364712_comment'></div>乃更审日晷之短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364712_comment'></div>度星閒之广狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364712_comment'></div>绳九道之朓朒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364712_comment'></div>纠五精之进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364712_comment'></div>参大衍天地之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364712_comment'></div>综八卦六爻之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364712_comment'></div>一辙于文王也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364712_comment'></div>覈春秋交蚀之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364712_comment'></div>研九畴五纪之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364712_comment'></div>同符于孔子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364712_comment'></div>杼轴万象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364712_comment'></div>优游四载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364712_comment'></div>奏章朝竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364712_comment'></div>一公夕落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364712_comment'></div>臣说奉诏金门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364712_comment'></div>成书册府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364712_comment'></div>先有理历陈景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364712_comment'></div>善算赵升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364712_comment'></div>首尾参元之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364712_comment'></div>接承转筹之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364712_comment'></div>因而缉合编次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364712_comment'></div>勒成一部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364712_comment'></div>名曰开元大衍历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364712_comment'></div>经七章一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364712_comment'></div>长历三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364712_comment'></div>历议十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364712_comment'></div>立成法十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364712_comment'></div>天竺九执历一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364712_comment'></div>古今历书二十四卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364712_comment'></div>略例奏章一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364712_comment'></div>凡五十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364712_comment'></div>所以贯三才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364712_comment'></div>周万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364712_comment'></div>穷数术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364712_comment'></div>先鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364712_comment'></div>称制曰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364712_comment'></div>即圣人顾访之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364712_comment'></div>标谨按者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364712_comment'></div>是历家进对之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364712_comment'></div>非轩后至圣。<div id='poem_sentence_81_1364712_comment'></div>不就归馀之经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364712_comment'></div>据其图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364712_comment'></div>七政之天心不远。<div id='poem_sentence_86_1364712_comment'></div>盖中黄之宝符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364712_comment'></div>太紫之神器者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364712_comment'></div>谨以十六年八月端五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364712_comment'></div>赤光照室之夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364712_comment'></div>皇雄成纪之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364712_comment'></div>当一元之出符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364712_comment'></div>献万寿之新历。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364712_comment'></div>颁于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1364712", 1364712, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>司历</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364712_comment'></div>制曰可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1364712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=728&endYear=728')">728年8月6日</a>　本年八月六日，特进张说代集贤进新撰《开元大衍历》，玄宗诏命有司颁行，张说上此表以贺。作品：《贺大衍历表》<div id='poem_1364667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺大衍历表</a><span class='authorDate'>（728年8月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364667")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364667'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364667'>臣说言。伏以开元大衍历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364667_comment'></div>天旨裁其纪纲。日官考其精要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364667_comment'></div>履端更始。敬授惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364667_comment'></div>加以辩五行之序。推七精之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364667_comment'></div>明徵圣期。实光土德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364667_comment'></div>臣又见梁天监中陶宏景著玉匮记云。盛德木子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364667_comment'></div>以肇来运。顷者僧一行推璿衡历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364667_comment'></div>得皇家天命。成数千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364667_comment'></div>古今祥兆。若合符契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364667_comment'></div>历数既在于圣躬。卜年又表于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1364667", 1364667, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>长历</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364667_comment'></div>莫大之庆。独冠前王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364667_comment'></div>臣忝迹儒林。预闻昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364667_comment'></div>无任抃跃之至。谨奉表陈贺以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364667_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1364667_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=728&endYear=728')">728年8月</a>　在长安有文。作品：《开元正历握乾符颂》<div id='poem_1364632' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364632'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364632'>客有嘲臣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364632_comment'></div>圣主正新历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364632_comment'></div>握乾符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364632_comment'></div>百寮赓歌以美时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364632_comment'></div>六合鼓舞以颂德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364632_comment'></div>先生独晏默书阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364632_comment'></div>含翰词林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364632_comment'></div>奚其为儓儗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364632_comment'></div>臣应之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364632_comment'></div>斗水不能评巨壑之量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364632_comment'></div>隙光未足议大明之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364632_comment'></div>何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364632_comment'></div>见褊而守隘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364632_comment'></div>握乾符者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364632_comment'></div>不谓执天命欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364632_comment'></div>执天命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364632_comment'></div>非夫广德休历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364632_comment'></div>交相表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364632_comment'></div>况命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364632_comment'></div>夫子之所䍐言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364632_comment'></div>焉可偏赞而总握符之盛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364632_comment'></div>如作者略大本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364632_comment'></div>举小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364632_comment'></div>不亦仲尼之门所听营也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364632_comment'></div>是以涸思乾虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364632_comment'></div>久难其述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364632_comment'></div>客无异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364632_comment'></div>客曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364632_comment'></div>请终馀论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364632_comment'></div>粤若我大唐庆始白云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364632_comment'></div>道升紫气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364632_comment'></div>属汉东失驭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364632_comment'></div>淮南不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364632_comment'></div>高祖举晋阳之甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364632_comment'></div>戡定关西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364632_comment'></div>太宗因傒后之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364632_comment'></div>削平天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364632_comment'></div>高宗收图海外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364632_comment'></div>检玉封中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364632_comment'></div>九域黎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364632_comment'></div>重代饮泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364632_comment'></div>虽鸣鸑改号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364632_comment'></div>神龙中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364632_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1364632", 1364632, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>周鼎</span>归唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364632_comment'></div>元圭祀夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364632_comment'></div>中宗违代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364632_comment'></div>嬖孽窥国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364632_comment'></div>于是乎圣上起藩邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364632_comment'></div>入钩陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364632_comment'></div>一麾水心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364632_comment'></div>群凶泥首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364632_comment'></div>崇复大圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364632_comment'></div>越践少阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364632_comment'></div>受禅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1364632", 1364632, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>当宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364632_comment'></div>而光大前烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364632_comment'></div>垂统拜璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364632_comment'></div>而慎宁后嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364632_comment'></div>四海有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1364632", 1364632, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>覆盂</span>之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364632_comment'></div>百代无委裘之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364632_comment'></div>是之谓圣人握符之大宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364632_comment'></div>四星入辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364632_comment'></div>五将出御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364632_comment'></div>倚礼乐为国计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364632_comment'></div>仗仁义为军势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364632_comment'></div>英贤集殿而文教成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364632_comment'></div>干戚舞阶而武功振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364632_comment'></div>敬让光于九族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364632_comment'></div>孝慈行于万宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364632_comment'></div>碛嶂西南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364632_comment'></div>渤瀚东北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364632_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1364632", 1364632, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>织皮</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1364632", 1364632, "Clauses/70/Comments/1")'>火毳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364632_comment'></div>暍炎山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364632_comment'></div>汜热海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364632_comment'></div>向风来王。<div
