id='poem_sentence_75_1364632_comment'></div>绝冰漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364632_comment'></div>连岁献款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364632_comment'></div>鸟兽无猜人之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364632_comment'></div>草木无不达之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364632_comment'></div>升中于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364632_comment'></div>比天同贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364632_comment'></div>是之谓圣人握符之大政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364632_comment'></div>历试上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364632_comment'></div>黄龙飞天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364632_comment'></div>入清中禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364632_comment'></div>白虹指日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364632_comment'></div>瘗汾脽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364632_comment'></div>宝鼎见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364632_comment'></div>柴岱宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364632_comment'></div>卿云蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364632_comment'></div>非应事而呈瑞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364632_comment'></div>虽多狎而不纪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364632_comment'></div>是之谓圣人握符之大祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364632_comment'></div>以数推气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364632_comment'></div>以气定朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364632_comment'></div>以星殷时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364632_comment'></div>以闰成岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364632_comment'></div>考星閒而革疏度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364632_comment'></div>置岁差而辨误日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364632_comment'></div>立大衍之纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364632_comment'></div>参大浑之晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364632_comment'></div>合钟律之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364632_comment'></div>极鬼神之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364632_comment'></div>是之谓圣人握符之大历也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364632_comment'></div>若夫仁圣根于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364632_comment'></div>菁华发于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364632_comment'></div>祥兆秘于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364632_comment'></div>谣谶灼于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364632_comment'></div>自然之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364632_comment'></div>彼洛下闳者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364632_comment'></div>汉太初时一巧历耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364632_comment'></div>云后八百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364632_comment'></div>当差一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364632_comment'></div>有圣人正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364632_comment'></div>斯人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364632_comment'></div>抑将露才扬术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364632_comment'></div>预證来圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364632_comment'></div>有耆旧之传记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364632_comment'></div>无史策之明文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364632_comment'></div>然至隋之开皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364632_comment'></div>及麟德圣历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364632_comment'></div>三家创法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364632_comment'></div>一引为徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364632_comment'></div>约之年代则邻近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364632_comment'></div>稽之图箓则暖昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364632_comment'></div>未有如新历之昭昭者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364632_comment'></div>在昔唐虞之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364632_comment'></div>以斗精受命者七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364632_comment'></div>得四均閒气而生者又二十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364632_comment'></div>所谓三十五际者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364632_comment'></div>禹以金德王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364632_comment'></div>故夏后之有天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364632_comment'></div>生数四百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364632_comment'></div>契以水德王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364632_comment'></div>故殷人之有天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364632_comment'></div>成数六百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364632_comment'></div>稷以木德王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364632_comment'></div>故周人之有天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364632_comment'></div>成数八百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364632_comment'></div>伯益之命中天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364632_comment'></div>而尧族以火德乘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364632_comment'></div>故汉室之有天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364632_comment'></div>生数再及二百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364632_comment'></div>其閒距王而兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364632_comment'></div>不能复大禹九州之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364632_comment'></div>及胜残百年之命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364632_comment'></div>皆五神之馀气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364632_comment'></div>咎繇降德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364632_comment'></div>皇唐复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364632_comment'></div>土精应王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364632_comment'></div>厚德载物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364632_comment'></div>生数五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364632_comment'></div>成数千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364632_comment'></div>命历有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364632_comment'></div>此其大较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364632_comment'></div>修德增祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364632_comment'></div>与天无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364632_comment'></div>转算之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364632_comment'></div>莫能究也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364632_comment'></div>纬以入元三百四岁为德运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364632_comment'></div>七百六十岁为代轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364632_comment'></div>千五百二十岁为天地出符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364632_comment'></div>四千五百六十岁为七精返初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364632_comment'></div>天人相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364632_comment'></div>合若符节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364632_comment'></div>自尧典命羲和修重黎之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364632_comment'></div>理颛顼之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364632_comment'></div>上元甲子千五百馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364632_comment'></div>得孔圣而春秋之历序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364632_comment'></div>暨开元十二年甲子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364632_comment'></div>凡三千四十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364632_comment'></div>遇圣上而大衍之历兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364632_comment'></div>是时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364632_comment'></div>土德入生数之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364632_comment'></div>天命当出符之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364632_comment'></div>信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1364632_comment'></div>伏惟圣上聪明文思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1364632_comment'></div>道德之具也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364632_comment'></div>豁达大度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1364632_comment'></div>皇帝之体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1364632_comment'></div>艺总六经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1364632_comment'></div>汉光之学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1364632_comment'></div>文通三变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1364632_comment'></div>魏祖之才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1364632_comment'></div>缘情定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1364632_comment'></div>五礼之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1364632_comment'></div>洞音度曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1364632_comment'></div>六乐之宗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1364632_comment'></div>神于弧矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1364632_comment'></div>黄轩之威也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1364632_comment'></div>圣于翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364632_comment'></div>苍颉之妙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364632_comment'></div>兄弟善友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364632_comment'></div>王季之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364632_comment'></div>子孙众多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364632_comment'></div>周文之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364632_comment'></div>大宝以定天位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364632_comment'></div>大政以布广德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364632_comment'></div>大祥以合灵符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364632_comment'></div>大历以启成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364632_comment'></div>德位兼才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364632_comment'></div>临照如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1364632_comment'></div>符命介福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1364632_comment'></div>粲章如彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364632_comment'></div>所谓广德休历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364632_comment'></div>交相表里之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364632_comment'></div>善历者必推来运以自神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364632_comment'></div>兴王者不俟往言以表圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364632_comment'></div>设徵夫洛下闳之语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1364632_comment'></div>其不有容成之事乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1364632_comment'></div>且如恃有命比于日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1364632_comment'></div>孰是夏王之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364632_comment'></div>赖卜年衰其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364632_comment'></div>岂谓周公之训也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364632_comment'></div>故曰王者执天命在于俟天符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364632_comment'></div>致天符在于顺天德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1364632_comment'></div>布天德在于保天位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1364632_comment'></div>四者备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1364632_comment'></div>然后陈其盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1364632_comment'></div>告于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1364632_comment'></div>舍此道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364632_comment'></div>胡可语正天历握乾符哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1364632_comment'></div>謏臣懵学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1364632_comment'></div>谢生元造。<div class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系本年十月。）</span><div id='poem_1364775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364775?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364775'>良玉礼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364775_comment'></div>用之西序之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364775_comment'></div>舍之南山之璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364775_comment'></div>囧然不有其珍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364775_comment'></div>君子安命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364775_comment'></div>进之干城之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364775_comment'></div>退之去国之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364775_comment'></div>隤然不失其正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364775_comment'></div>语夫杖运以行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364775_comment'></div>属辞以比德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364775_comment'></div>亦何代无其人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364775_comment'></div>公讳方翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364775_comment'></div>字仲翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364775_comment'></div>太原祁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364775_comment'></div>王周之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364775_comment'></div>王子以败狄受姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364775_comment'></div>徵君以遁世为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364775_comment'></div>司徒之济艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364775_comment'></div>义形汉室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364775_comment'></div>太尉之图举甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364775_comment'></div>心尽魏朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364775_comment'></div>闻蒋济所言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364775_comment'></div>则知尚书志力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364775_comment'></div>兄弟继美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364775_comment'></div>览周书所载。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1364775_comment'></div>臣节奋扬于百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364775_comment'></div>家声籍甚于四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364775_comment'></div>大王父司徒定公秉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364775_comment'></div>隋氏之崇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364775_comment'></div>王父驸马开府文公裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364775_comment'></div>先朝之懿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364775_comment'></div>考特进慎公仁表。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23864'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_23864_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_23865' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_23865", 23865, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>萸囊</span>系牧童。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "poem_sentence_1_23865")'>问鸿蒙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23865'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23866'>九日重阳数，三秋万实成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23866'>时来谒轩后<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作石）</span>，罢去坐蓬瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_23866_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_23867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23867?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（728年9月9日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_23867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23867'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23867'>晚节欢重九，高山上五千。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23867'>醉中知遇圣，梦里见寻仙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23867'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_23867_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=728&endYear=728')">728年10月</a>　本年十月诏葬张说奉敕撰王君㚟神道碑。作品：《右羽林大将军王公神道碑》<div id='poem_1364780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右羽林大将军王公神道碑奉敕撰</a><span class='authorDate'>（728年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364780")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364780_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364780'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364780'>维大唐开元十五年闰九月二十三日庚申。右羽林大将军持节河西陇右两道节度使营田九姓转运十副大使兼赤水大使专知节度事摄御史中丞判凉州都督上柱国晋昌伯薨于巩𥫱亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364780_comment'></div>故也。夫事君效命之谓忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364780_comment'></div>杀敌荣亲之谓勇。干星袭月之谓气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364780_comment'></div>逐日拔山之谓力。有一于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364780_comment'></div>名犹盖代。矧兼其四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364780_comment'></div>人何閒焉。是晋昌所以错落将星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364780_comment'></div>峥嵘山岳者也。公讳君㚟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364780_comment'></div>字威明。瓜州常乐人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364780_comment'></div>父寿。因公建绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364780_comment'></div>致位九卿。临难守死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364780_comment'></div>褒赠特进。审塞翁之倚伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364780_comment'></div>达蒙叟之浮休。老而益壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364780_comment'></div>没而立名者矣。公威声发于雷泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364780_comment'></div>武毅标于峒岭。小头锐上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364780_comment'></div>猿臂虬须。龙剑摧百胜之锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364780_comment'></div>蛇矛得万人之敌。拔自行阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364780_comment'></div>果有吕蒙之才。拜于坛场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364780_comment'></div>不爽韩信之用。始任镇戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364780_comment'></div>列班外府。及郎将中郎至军副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364780_comment'></div>虽骤移官守。而恒在疆场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364780_comment'></div>郭知运推毂河源。握符陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364780_comment'></div>公未登一命。事主将之旌麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364780_comment'></div>不出十年。代总戎之节钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364780_comment'></div>慷慨之士。以为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364780_comment'></div>于是自骁卫将军迁羽林大将军。既督陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364780_comment'></div>兼统河西。绾塞垣之十军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364780_comment'></div>佩节制之两印。大田多稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364780_comment'></div>而屯廪百亿。蒐乘籍马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364780_comment'></div>而铁骑数万。乃蹈赤山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364780_comment'></div>焚罽幕。猎青鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364780_comment'></div>驱犛牛。喑呜则七戎辟易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364780_comment'></div>烜赫则千里震动。亭恃其长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364780_comment'></div>庙堂赖其神将。月献戎捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364780_comment'></div>岁行军赏。王侯无种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364780_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>屠狗</span>起于将军。战伐有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364780_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>烂羊</span>超于都尉。前后翻飞幕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364780_comment'></div>奋跃行閒。跨军典郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364780_comment'></div>腰金冠玉者。数十百人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364780_comment'></div>每至入朝奏谒。升殿论边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364780_comment'></div>山川险易。立成于聚米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364780_comment'></div>攻守方略。一决于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>前筹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364780_comment'></div>遥诏置兵。先合汉光之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364780_comment'></div>新书从事。暗同魏武之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364780_comment'></div>故得延誉上腾。风云郁其气色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364780_comment'></div>恩荣下沓。日月借其光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364780_comment'></div>当斯时也。踌躇攘袂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364780_comment'></div>三垂可以气压。百蛮可以力制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364780_comment'></div>即叙者。老生之常谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364780_comment'></div>和亲者。竖儒之怯计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364780_comment'></div>安足为神武非常之主道哉。誓请先拔犬戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364780_comment'></div>次系獯鬻。尽区域于西海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364780_comment'></div>辟郡县于北荒。燀皇灵于天外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364780_comment'></div>图壮节于云阁。其事如果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364780_comment'></div>旷古未俦。惟君知臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364780_comment'></div>保斯言之可复。何神与善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364780_comment'></div>负厥志而无成。是年秋八月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364780_comment'></div>吐蕃犯边。瓜州失守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364780_comment'></div>盗憎我将。执致其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364780_comment'></div>公以为背父立威。非孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364780_comment'></div>顿兵从敌。非忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364780_comment'></div>大义逼而忘家。方寸乱而供国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364780_comment'></div>其定计也。成列而出讨贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364780_comment'></div>尽狄而退杀身。忠在孝先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364780_comment'></div>将之道也。公驰驿要谍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364780_comment'></div>而回纥内叛。以八九之从人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364780_comment'></div>当数百之强虏。然犹虓啖击射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364780_comment'></div>杀伤略半。亭孤兵尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364780_comment'></div>流矢横及。所谓仆而馀威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364780_comment'></div>折而不挠矣。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364780_comment'></div>尝胆之愤空结。啖肝之怨莫雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364780_comment'></div>天子闻之。黯然兴叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364780_comment'></div>人言以命许国。夫岂忘其言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364780_comment'></div>苟收必死之忠。焉问不虞之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364780_comment'></div>至矣。盖圣主推仁恕于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364780_comment'></div>悬大信于后人。爱欲其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364780_comment'></div>惩晋侯再克之喜。恶伤其没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364780_comment'></div>抱秦伯犹用之诚。婉独见之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364780_comment'></div>岂常情所逮。谋臣饮恩于望表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364780_comment'></div>猛将感德于事外。然后任人之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364780_comment'></div>众可知也。乃下诏追赠特进荆州大都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364780_comment'></div>礼命窀穸。加常二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364780_comment'></div>死事之经也。公之伉俪曰武威郡夫人夏氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364780_comment'></div>韩母筑城之智。孟光举臼之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364780_comment'></div>拔棘解围。三军慑其健妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364780_comment'></div>崩城恸哭。四海伤其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/169/Comments/0")'>孝妻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364780_comment'></div>此又閒代之一奇。一家之两绝者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364780_comment'></div>嗣子尚衣奉御承荣。天奖赐兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364780_comment'></div>星祥名宝。礼义形于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/175/Comments/0")'>桥梓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364780_comment'></div>哀戚过于缞麻。禀训帷堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364780_comment'></div>克持门户。特奉恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364780_comment'></div>收其二荫。饰柩玉关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364780_comment'></div>归魂上国。以十六年十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364780_comment'></div>诏葬于万年县见子之原。卤簿齐列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364780_comment'></div>方相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>双引</span>。京尹护丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364780_comment'></div>史官颂石。千乘送葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364780_comment'></div>观骠骑之威仪。十里开茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364780_comment'></div>识龙骧之邱墓。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364780_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_1364780'>合众在仁。正兵惟义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364780_comment'></div>将为天目。国命所寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364780_comment'></div>曲乃老师。轻实儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364780_comment'></div>安我封略。才难不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364780_comment'></div>赳赳将军。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/203/Comments/0")'>貔貅</span>绝群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364780_comment'></div>超腾白地。骞翥青云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364780_comment'></div>朝盛勇爵。家荣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1364780", 1364780, "Clauses/207/Comments/0")'>战勋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364780_comment'></div>众声飞誉。帝曰予闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364780_comment'></div>予闻伊何。甲兵缮肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364780_comment'></div>屯积万庾。马量百谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364780_comment'></div>甘心犬戎。指掌獯鬻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364780_comment'></div>大毕当跐。单于可掬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364780_comment'></div>壮计先达。王师未张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364780_comment'></div>城隳孤塞。寇及高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364780_comment'></div>忠先孝后。取敌而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364780_comment'></div>外仇易复。内变难防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364780_comment'></div>克日将战。呼天不假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364780_comment'></div>岑彭诈客。张飞帐下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364780_comment'></div>流镝何人。交钱去马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364780_comment'></div>苍皇反复。哀哉命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364780_comment'></div>美殓姑臧。宠归芷阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364780_comment'></div>东都门外。南登路傍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364780_comment'></div>高坟累累。列树行行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364780_comment'></div>父子同兆。何殊故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364780_comment'></div>诏刻金石。义形意气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364780_comment'></div>隐善必书。殇魂不讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364780_comment'></div>事弃忠在。生轻节贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364780_comment'></div>嗟尔明灵。衔恩永慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364780_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_125_1364780_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=728&endYear=728')">728年</a>　李泌的表兄荐泌为奇童，被朝廷召进京中，时玄宗方与张说正在观看人下棋。玄宗让张说试其能，说因以“方圆动静”为题，令泌赋诗一首。作品：《咏方圆动静示李泌》<div id='poem_24175' class='_poem'><div class='authorDate'>（728年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24175")'>张说</a></span><br class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364671_comment'></div>九龙浴圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364671_comment'></div>清明总于玉露。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364794_comment'></div>府君讳君衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364794_comment'></div>其先长乐人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364794_comment'></div>释赵归秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364794_comment'></div>本家上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364794_comment'></div>分燕徙越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364794_comment'></div>又据高良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364794_comment'></div>自远祖荣怀化侯业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364794_comment'></div>以至于大父赠荆州都督盎先考高州使君智戣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364794_comment'></div>咸以勋绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364794_comment'></div>建𣄣本郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364794_comment'></div>甲兵雄于一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364794_comment'></div>政化沓于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364794_comment'></div>君蕴含宏光大之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364794_comment'></div>守冲默安贞之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364794_comment'></div>秉难进易退之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364794_comment'></div>诣希声若讷之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364794_comment'></div>为而不有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364794_comment'></div>故物誉难得而称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364794_comment'></div>静以居常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364794_comment'></div>故世荣无由而及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364794_comment'></div>以圣历之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364794_comment'></div>终于本城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364794_comment'></div>子幼家艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364794_comment'></div>丧礼盖阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364794_comment'></div>夫人麦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364794_comment'></div>备母师之六行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364794_comment'></div>履先姑之四德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364794_comment'></div>处顺思柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364794_comment'></div>以成妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364794_comment'></div>及卫亡共伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364794_comment'></div>而鲁重敬姜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364794_comment'></div>誓以汎舟之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364794_comment'></div>遵其䦱门之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364794_comment'></div>季子今冠军大将军右监门卫大将军上柱国渤海郡开国公力士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364794_comment'></div>始自龆龀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364794_comment'></div>来仪上京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364794_comment'></div>既违徙宅之欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364794_comment'></div>爰从倍年之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364794_comment'></div>感三州之深义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364794_comment'></div>易百代之因生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364794_comment'></div>舍冯亭之本枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364794_comment'></div>从高傒之令族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364794_comment'></div>千秋仕汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364794_comment'></div>遂去田宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364794_comment'></div>随会在秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364794_comment'></div>别为刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364794_comment'></div>遇风云之感会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364794_comment'></div>承日月之光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364794_comment'></div>茅土荅其勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364794_comment'></div>貂珰宠其忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364794_comment'></div>太夫人踰越岭峤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364794_comment'></div>就养高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364794_comment'></div>孝子展白华之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364794_comment'></div>慈母欣䌽衣之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364794_comment'></div>精诚所感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364794_comment'></div>振古难俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364794_comment'></div>噫欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364794_comment'></div>资孝为忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364794_comment'></div>隐心后动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364794_comment'></div>引桑霍之深诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364794_comment'></div>慕金张之周密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364794_comment'></div>敬以卫主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364794_comment'></div>爱以安亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364794_comment'></div>而善不彰官不遂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364794_comment'></div>未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364794_comment'></div>由斯言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364794_comment'></div>则哀乐存乎心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364794_comment'></div>不以至音改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364794_comment'></div>祸福惟所召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364794_comment'></div>不以偏覆及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364794_comment'></div>诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364794_comment'></div>鲁侯燕喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364794_comment'></div>令妻寿母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364794_comment'></div>明神劳善人而寿其母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364794_comment'></div>夫人以开元十七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364794_comment'></div>享年八十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364794_comment'></div>五月十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364794_comment'></div>寿终于京兆之来庭里舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364794_comment'></div>天子悼先贤之晦德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364794_comment'></div>嘉侍臣之克孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364794_comment'></div>思赗襚之未崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364794_comment'></div>怆窀穸之将及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364794_comment'></div>于是诏赠先府君潘州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364794_comment'></div>备礼饰终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364794_comment'></div>招魂合葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364794_comment'></div>是岁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364794_comment'></div>大享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364794_comment'></div>宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364794_comment'></div>遍谒园陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364794_comment'></div>锡类之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364794_comment'></div>施于卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364794_comment'></div>重赠府君使持节都督广韶循康等一十六州诸军事广州大都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364794_comment'></div>夫人受邑旧邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364794_comment'></div>启号南海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364794_comment'></div>从夫加赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364794_comment'></div>改封越国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364794_comment'></div>哀荣备于始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364794_comment'></div>宠光洽于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364794_comment'></div>为子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364794_comment'></div>何以加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364794_comment'></div>于是与兄左卫中元琎左领军卫郎将元圭等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364794_comment'></div>惟旧业之难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364794_comment'></div>感新恩之荐及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364794_comment'></div>思建碑表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364794_comment'></div>以永芬芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364794_comment'></div>夫毓至德以庇后嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364794_comment'></div>仁之厚者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364794_comment'></div>扬令名以崇祖考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364794_comment'></div>孝之大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364794_comment'></div>仁为五常之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364794_comment'></div>孝实百行之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364794_comment'></div>贯经教而莫比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364794_comment'></div>标人伦而独出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364794_comment'></div>宜其镂美金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364794_comment'></div>式旌坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364794_comment'></div>无忘清徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364794_comment'></div>昭示来叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364794_comment'></div>何必会稽江上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364794_comment'></div>独有纪孝之碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364794_comment'></div>安陵庙前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364794_comment'></div>空传尚德之颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364794_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364794_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_128_1364794'>明珠紫贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364794_comment'></div>产于南国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364794_comment'></div>代所珍兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364794_comment'></div>允矣君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364794_comment'></div>不耀其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364794_comment'></div>克全真兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364794_comment'></div>庆流我后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364794_comment'></div>高骧迥翥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364794_comment'></div>中贵臣兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364794_comment'></div>朱轓象服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364794_comment'></div>宠及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1364794", 1364794, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>泉路</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364794_comment'></div>荣其亲兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364794_comment'></div>孝道不陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364794_comment'></div>勒铭表墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364794_comment'></div>留芳尘兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_142_1364794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=729&endYear=729')">729年</a>　张说为萧嵩父撰写神道碑文。作品：《赠吏部尚书萧公神道碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系开元十八年（730）五月。）</span><div id='poem_1364781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364781' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364781?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠吏部尚书萧公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（729年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364781")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364781_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364781'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364781'>仁以度心施物。义以由道利贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364781_comment'></div>孝以养志安亲。慈以教忠有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364781_comment'></div>举四行之尤善。成百代之馀庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364781_comment'></div>盖得之于萧府君矣。公讳灌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364781_comment'></div>字元茂。兰陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364781_comment'></div>帝高辛之苗裔也。元鸟受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364781_comment'></div>敬敷五德。白云入房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364781_comment'></div>网开三面。微子封宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364781_comment'></div>乐叔居萧。氏族之始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364781_comment'></div>相国下秦。大夫师汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364781_comment'></div>门阀之宗也。大齐以肃竹膺期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364781_comment'></div>践皇帝之位。大梁以木刃兴运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364781_comment'></div>张天地之图。传宝祚于一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364781_comment'></div>易鸿名于两汉。青盖入洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364781_comment'></div>重南国之衣冠。白马朝周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364781_comment'></div>盛西雍之宾客。公即梁宣皇帝之元孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364781_comment'></div>明皇帝之曾孙。大父南海王珣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364781_comment'></div>入隋封梁国公。纂德乾坤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364781_comment'></div>承灵睿哲。旧邦虽改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364781_comment'></div>见周鼎之时轻。新社仍封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364781_comment'></div>知晋圭之必大。考钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364781_comment'></div>中书舍人率更令宏文集贤两馆学士。学穷秘赜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364781_comment'></div>文标宗匠。广博幽深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364781_comment'></div>契神无迹。温良恭俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364781_comment'></div>与道为徒。是谓启迪后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364781_comment'></div>而焜耀前烈者也。公总山河之粹气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364781_comment'></div>注日月之末光。心根孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364781_comment'></div>器包礼乐。动蹑思后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364781_comment'></div>故口无择言。照在机前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364781_comment'></div>故身无择行。加以启蓬山之塞路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364781_comment'></div>入藏室之元关。四科得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1364781", 1364781, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>游夏</span>之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364781_comment'></div>六艺取钟王之隽。年十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364781_comment'></div>明经高第。补代王功曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364781_comment'></div>王升储。改通事舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364781_comment'></div>又换内直监。曳裾西苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364781_comment'></div>擅文士之场。束带东朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364781_comment'></div>首正人之列。寻以外艰去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364781_comment'></div>王戎死孝。时论忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364781_comment'></div>闵子免丧。哀心未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364781_comment'></div>乃不就祥缟。不撤几筵者久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364781_comment'></div>或曰。怀其宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364781_comment'></div>迷其国。行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364781_comment'></div>约其亲。可乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364781_comment'></div>公曰。吾过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364781_comment'></div>不得巳而外除。不择官而禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364781_comment'></div>拜国子监丞。以婚姻之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364781_comment'></div>出为甘州司马。徙集岚二州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364781_comment'></div>转渝州长史。其从政也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364781_comment'></div>反身以惠下。推诚以敬上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364781_comment'></div>老吾老以施教。幼吾幼以子人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364781_comment'></div>执是心也。何往不济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364781_comment'></div>故历佐之郡。必僻陋知方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364781_comment'></div>戎蜑变俗。狠戾驯轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364781_comment'></div>贪饕寡欲。迎新者望风而歌来暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364781_comment'></div>送故者计日而恋不足。诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364781_comment'></div>淑人君子。正是国人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364781_comment'></div>能长人之谓也。太夫人在堂有羸老之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364781_comment'></div>公因使入计。得扶侍还京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364781_comment'></div>下巫峡之波。上当阳之坂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364781_comment'></div>展转在侧。殷忧历时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364781_comment'></div>席不安枕。衣不解带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364781_comment'></div>及板舆长税。遂扶杖不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364781_comment'></div>子春视疾。加损徒勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364781_comment'></div>石建执丧。悲哀自绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364781_comment'></div>永淳元年八月。寓居穰县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364781_comment'></div>终于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1364781", 1364781, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>苫盖</span>。春秋五十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364781_comment'></div>先君之服也。三年有终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364781_comment'></div>公过时不释。圣善之丧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364781_comment'></div>五十不毁。公恋亲灭性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364781_comment'></div>君子曰。礼也夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364781_comment'></div>可谓至矣。夫人京兆韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364781_comment'></div>祖云起。兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364781_comment'></div>父师实。秦州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364781_comment'></div>公卿令族。兰杜齐芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364781_comment'></div>凤凰飞鸣。始正家道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364781_comment'></div>珠玉秀色。终高母仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364781_comment'></div>年五十有四。长寿元年十月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364781_comment'></div>逝于京师布政里。粤以二年二月辛卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364781_comment'></div>合葬于少陵原之先茔。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364781_comment'></div>其孤嵩。克戴圣君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364781_comment'></div>以宰天下。大福再成于身后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364781_comment'></div>湛恩广运于泉路。开元十七年仲冬癸丑诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364781_comment'></div>中书令嵩父某。毓粹冲和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364781_comment'></div>降灵神象。言入精微之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364781_comment'></div>迹登圣贤之轨。位不充量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364781_comment'></div>道足庇人。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1364781", 1364781, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>松槚</span>虽幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364781_comment'></div>音徽不昧。宜承追远之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364781_comment'></div>俾崇冢宰之荣。可赠吏部尚书。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364714_comment'></div>分曹设幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364714_comment'></div>艇送江凫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364714_comment'></div>醉湛恩以取乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364714_comment'></div>群公赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364714_comment'></div>俾仆题序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364714_comment'></div>长卿消渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364714_comment'></div>觉含毫之转迟。<div class='inline' "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>讷涩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364714_comment'></div>恐贻盛集之芜秽云尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1364714_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年4月11日</a>　裴行俭季子光庭时官侍中兼吏部尚书，为张说最亲密的同僚，故为其父代撰碑文。作品：赠太尉裴公神道碑。<div id='poem_1364776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠太尉裴公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年4月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364776")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364776'>星辰悬象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364776_comment'></div>所以殷时布气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364776_comment'></div>然而行不言之道者天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364776_comment'></div>文武用才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364776_comment'></div>所以勤官定国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364776_comment'></div>然而致无为之理者帝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364776_comment'></div>当高宗之休运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364776_comment'></div>任名世之良臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364776_comment'></div>清九流而辟四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364776_comment'></div>代天工而张帝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364776_comment'></div>历选前哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364776_comment'></div>岂多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364776_comment'></div>公讳行俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364776_comment'></div>字守约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364776_comment'></div>河东闻喜人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364776_comment'></div>其先出乎嬴姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364776_comment'></div>伯翳之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364776_comment'></div>秦则裴侯始封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364776_comment'></div>汉则侍中受职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364776_comment'></div>魏晋之代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364776_comment'></div>郁为盛门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364776_comment'></div>八裴方于八王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364776_comment'></div>声振海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364776_comment'></div>三子尊为三祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364776_comment'></div>望高士族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364776_comment'></div>自冀州刺史徽至公十二代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364776_comment'></div>中军将军双虎至公六叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364776_comment'></div>代无违德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364776_comment'></div>不陨厥问者巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364776_comment'></div>大王父伯凤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364776_comment'></div>周骠骑大将军光汾二州刺史琅邪郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364776_comment'></div>大父定高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364776_comment'></div>大将军冯翊郡守袭琅邪郡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364776_comment'></div>诸侯受封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364776_comment'></div>山河传国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364776_comment'></div>天子共理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364776_comment'></div>循良克家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364776_comment'></div>考仁基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364776_comment'></div>隋左光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364776_comment'></div>以阴图王充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364776_comment'></div>仗义旧主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364776_comment'></div>遭时不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364776_comment'></div>玉折名扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364776_comment'></div>圣唐龙兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364776_comment'></div>旌淑励节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364776_comment'></div>赠原州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364776_comment'></div>命谥曰忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364776_comment'></div>盖春秋之褒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364776_comment'></div>公清明本乎世德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364776_comment'></div>正性出乎胎教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364776_comment'></div>气润河灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364776_comment'></div>貌雄岳立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364776_comment'></div>仁孝之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364776_comment'></div>天生而知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364776_comment'></div>将相之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364776_comment'></div>与年俱长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364776_comment'></div>以高荫为宏文生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364776_comment'></div>绝事笃学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364776_comment'></div>累年不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364776_comment'></div>房仆射异而问焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364776_comment'></div>对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364776_comment'></div>隋室丧乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364776_comment'></div>家乏典籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364776_comment'></div>馆有良书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364776_comment'></div>探讨未遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364776_comment'></div>故少留耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364776_comment'></div>梁公惊曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364776_comment'></div>骥子志气淩云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364776_comment'></div>当一日千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364776_comment'></div>其早为通人之目也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364776_comment'></div>明经补左屯卫仓曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364776_comment'></div>诏举转雍州司士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364776_comment'></div>迁金部户部二员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364776_comment'></div>历都官郎中长安令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364776_comment'></div>明庆中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364776_comment'></div>与长孙太尉褚河南论及中宫废立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364776_comment'></div>国家忧患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364776_comment'></div>有公伯僚谮行于季氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364776_comment'></div>出为西州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364776_comment'></div>重译向化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364776_comment'></div>我之独贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364776_comment'></div>边之多幸。<div id='poem_sentence_103_1364776_comment'></div>虽祭公有谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364776_comment'></div>耀武之事不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364776_comment'></div>而方叔帅师。<div id='poem_sentence_115_1364776_comment'></div>岂可绝域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364776_comment'></div>更勚王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364776_comment'></div>今波斯王亡。<div id='poem_sentence_291_1364776_comment'></div>大圣天后令秘书监武承嗣就家取进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1364776_comment'></div>以为秘术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1364776_comment'></div>开元五年四月二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1364776_comment'></div>归真京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1364776_comment'></div>其年八月。<div id='poem_sentence_415_1364776_comment'></div>魂无不之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1364776_comment'></div>成遗志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1364776_comment'></div>长孙参元。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年4月13日</a>　四月十三日，诏宴于春明门外宁王李宪之园池，玄宗御花蕚楼，宁王李宪进见，玄宗邀其回骑，并让他坐下来一起喝酒陪同侍臣拈韵赋诗，张说占得“好”字韵，作应制诗。作品：《四月十三日诏宴宁王亭子（赋得）好字》<span id='poem_title_24015_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_24015_0'>① 按《唐礼·乐志》，明皇尝以马百匹，盛饰，分左右，施三重榻，舞倾杯数十曲。壮土举榻，马不动，乐工少年姿秀者十数人，衣黄衫文玉带，立左右，每千秋节，舞于勤政楼下。千秋节者，明皇以八月五日生，因以其日名节云。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_24015'><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年8月29日</a>　本年八月二十九日，陪同玄宗幸永穆公主宅时作诗，时侍臣拈韵赋诗，说占得“流”字韵。作品：《晦日诏宴永穆公主亭子赋得流字》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_24001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晦日诏宴永穆公主亭子赋得流字</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年8月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24001")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_24001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24001'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24001'>堂邑山林美，朝恩晦日游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24001'>园亭含淑气，竹树绕春流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24001'>舞席千花妓，歌船五彩楼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24001'>群欢与王泽，岁岁满皇州。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24001'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_24001_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年10月</a>　张说母姓冯，冯氏为说之舅家，沾亲带故，所以昭泰子绍正、绍烈等请张说为其父补撰神道碑。作品：《故括州刺史赠工部尚书冯公神道碑》<div id='poem_1364782' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364782' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364782?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故括州刺史赠工部尚书冯公神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364782")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364782_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364782'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364782'>金之为宝。百鍊而惟精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364782_comment'></div>玉之称德。久幽而不昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364782_comment'></div>圣人美焉。君子比焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364782_comment'></div>可铄也。不可夺其刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364782_comment'></div>可毁也。不可污其洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364782_comment'></div>伟哉冯公。秉斯操矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364782_comment'></div>公讳昭泰。字遇圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364782_comment'></div>长乐人也。说学于古史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364782_comment'></div>岂不闻舅氏之厥初乎。毕公建德于周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364782_comment'></div>毕万大名于魏。别封之裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364782_comment'></div>遂氏冯城。秦则丞相并时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364782_comment'></div>汉则将军重世。积仁钟庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364782_comment'></div>王者郁兴。閒晋南浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364782_comment'></div>因燕北号。家变成国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364782_comment'></div>为天下雄。勋业竞五伯之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364782_comment'></div>子孙齐二王之后。公即昭成皇帝之十代孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364782_comment'></div>高祖大将军随州刺史长山公谦。以寇恂之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364782_comment'></div>翊戴周武。曾祖兵部尚书左仆射魏国公世基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364782_comment'></div>以曹参之力。经济隋文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364782_comment'></div>大父尚书左丞检校御史大夫少府监扬州长史安昌公长命。以佳吏之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364782_comment'></div>勤劳王室。考仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364782_comment'></div>高亮无禄。子道不究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364782_comment'></div>故公幼而袭安昌公焉。清明激澈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364782_comment'></div>标格峻竖。夏翟耿介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364782_comment'></div>无矫饰于韦弦。寒松青冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364782_comment'></div>不受令于霜雪。专经睹奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364782_comment'></div>习法精理。起家左奉裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364782_comment'></div>改让贤府果毅。换文州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364782_comment'></div>为酷吏所陷罢官。久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364782_comment'></div>调荣州长史。属城慢法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364782_comment'></div>按而绳之。入计会府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364782_comment'></div>仇家横讼。明敕杖其愬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364782_comment'></div>迁公宋州司马。朝廷翕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364782_comment'></div>知有王法。复假右台侍御史江南道廉察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364782_comment'></div>类会高等。加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364782_comment'></div>进潞州长史。堆岸受湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364782_comment'></div>独醒见嫉。转湖州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364782_comment'></div>公束湿不回。聚蚊交讪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364782_comment'></div>贬为饶州司马。未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364782_comment'></div>降使详覆。拜鄂州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364782_comment'></div>制曰。卿志气刚劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364782_comment'></div>操履贞洁。历佐藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364782_comment'></div>咸有声称。诘奸纠缪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364782_comment'></div>不避强御。苦节清威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364782_comment'></div>若淩霜雪。顷因谗毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364782_comment'></div>遂有贬降。使者案问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364782_comment'></div>皎然明白。俾从优奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364782_comment'></div>特加宠命。其在江夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364782_comment'></div>异政风行。入为太子家令兼知内外铸钱事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364782_comment'></div>国泉是殷。盗鋊乃绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364782_comment'></div>河朔淫雨。帝思作乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364782_comment'></div>俾公检校邢州刺史。散有赒无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364782_comment'></div>人忘歉岁。帝乃玺书劳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364782_comment'></div>其旨曰。卿忠于事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364782_comment'></div>以临下。忘私徇公之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364782_comment'></div>歌谣所载。擒奸摘伏之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364782_comment'></div>吏人攸仰。虽陈朔之贬黜邪慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364782_comment'></div>王业之斥除贪残。无以加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364782_comment'></div>一郡清静。副朕意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364782_comment'></div>其后以戚累移睦州刺史。复为群小所谮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364782_comment'></div>左授泉州司马。未之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364782_comment'></div>又贬荣州司马。公砥节荒服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364782_comment'></div>天高听卑。旋除温州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364782_comment'></div>俄复旧阶。拜括州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364782_comment'></div>水国瀸洳。告疾言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364782_comment'></div>景龙三年六月十三日。终于苏州之逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364782_comment'></div>春秋六十有五。正人叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364782_comment'></div>旧莅伤感。公清白传家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364782_comment'></div>信义高世。门有奇士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364782_comment'></div>室无长物。夫其善于钩距。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364782_comment'></div>长于衿带。法严令峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364782_comment'></div>人宽吏急。当官而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364782_comment'></div>不避谗慝之口。除恶务本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364782_comment'></div>不求恺悌之誉。出入从宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364782_comment'></div>十有六职。以谤获贬者五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364782_comment'></div>洗谤特迁者四。不曰忠乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364782_comment'></div>将无悔于九死。不曰直乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364782_comment'></div>焉往而不三黜。故人谢而名益著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364782_comment'></div>迹远而风可怀也。皇上志其持法不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364782_comment'></div>赠大理卿。本其坐树无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364782_comment'></div>谥之曰节。窀穸之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364782_comment'></div>一以官供。哀荣之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364782_comment'></div>被于存没。是时天子严谒山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364782_comment'></div>训人追孝。推恩庶物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364782_comment'></div>泻泽幽泉。公长子少府监绍正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364782_comment'></div>次子给事中绍烈。并构层堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364782_comment'></div>仰延荣赠。乃赠公工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364782_comment'></div>君子曰。孝必锡类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364782_comment'></div>忠则不坠。臧孙达其有后乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364782_comment'></div>郑公业为不亡矣。夫人琅琊君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364782_comment'></div>左相邢公及善之女。垂拱二年三十六而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364782_comment'></div>后夫人彭城君。鸿胪卿善因之孙女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364782_comment'></div>景龙三年五十有五而逝。所谓齐姜昭前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364782_comment'></div>邦媛辉后。碧树先落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364782_comment'></div>悲同孙楚之妻。红兰渐苞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364782_comment'></div>贵在冯勤之母。以开元十八年十月壬寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364782_comment'></div>葬我节公于长安县高阳原。夫人王氏刘氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364782_comment'></div>礼也。长子绍正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364782_comment'></div>少府监。第四子绍忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364782_comment'></div>未仕。第五子绍烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364782_comment'></div>御史中丞。孝乎二连之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364782_comment'></div>思崇三绝之美。魏主来顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364782_comment'></div>赏幼妇之碑。秦师不侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364782_comment'></div>尊死士之垄。扬名称伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364782_comment'></div>道远乎哉。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364782_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_105_1364782'>古之志士。忠不违难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364782_comment'></div>倬哉冯公。矫此云翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364782_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1364782", 1364782, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>嚣嚣</span>群小。彼何足算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364782_comment'></div>屡困忠直。天下改观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364782_comment'></div>经用百年。穷达相半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364782_comment'></div>贻庆二子。双承天涣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364782_comment'></div>严严大理。人命是悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364782_comment'></div>圣朝表赠。王道无偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364782_comment'></div>六卿冬官。百工攸序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364782_comment'></div>韩棱虽没。龙泉可许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364782_comment'></div>邱陵鼓舞兮改谷移山。岁月奔波兮有去不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364782_comment'></div>惟德音与颂石。传不朽于人閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364782_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_117_1364782_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年10月</a>　张说母姓冯，冯氏为说之舅家，沾亲带故，所以昭泰子绍正、绍烈等请张说为其父补写挽词。作品：《赠工部尚书冯公挽诗三首》<div id='poem_24016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24016' id='poem_sentence_0_24018'>窅然长夜台，举世可哀哉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24018'>泉户一朝闭，松风四面来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24018'>石碑填駮藓，珠服聚尘埃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_24113'>云涓恋山海，禽马怀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_24113", 24113, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>燕越</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_24113_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_24113'>自非行役人，安知慕城阙。<div -----end
