id='poem_sentence_13_1364674_comment'></div>生成难谢。无任感戴之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364674_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1364674_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=697&endYear=697')">697年6月</a>　时在武攸宜幕。作品：《神兵道为申平冀州贼契丹等露布》<div id='poem_1364710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364710?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为河内郡王武懿宗平冀州贼契丹等露布</a><span class='authorDate'>（697年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364710")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364710'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364710'>大总管右金吾卫大将军兼检校洛州长史河内郡王臣某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364710_comment'></div>前军总管行左卫翊府中郎将上柱国定阳郡开国公臣杨元基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364710_comment'></div>行军长史朝奉大夫守给事中护军臣唐奉一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364710_comment'></div>行军司马通议大夫行天官郎中臣郑果等言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364710_comment'></div>臣闻氛祲薄霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364710_comment'></div>戎狄谋夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364710_comment'></div>则武库兵动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364710_comment'></div>中国有弧矢之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364710_comment'></div>文昌将飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364710_comment'></div>边城用金革之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364710_comment'></div>盖以式遏奸暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364710_comment'></div>大庇黎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364710_comment'></div>震蛮荡夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364710_comment'></div>明罚耀武者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364710_comment'></div>伏惟天册金轮圣神皇帝陛下仁覆有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364710_comment'></div>化被无外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364710_comment'></div>皇图未臣之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364710_comment'></div>帝载不庭之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364710_comment'></div>罔不衣被声教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364710_comment'></div>浸润邕熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364710_comment'></div>望云向风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364710_comment'></div>密迩遐裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364710_comment'></div>而契丹凶丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364710_comment'></div>奴隶馀苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364710_comment'></div>非冒顿之荣族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364710_comment'></div>异单于之贵种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364710_comment'></div>徒以错居远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364710_comment'></div>渐化平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364710_comment'></div>田牧混乎四氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364710_comment'></div>贸迁通于三市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364710_comment'></div>戍人解甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364710_comment'></div>边马垂辔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364710_comment'></div>禽兽饱而忘恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364710_comment'></div>蜂虿养而恣毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364710_comment'></div>敢孤亭育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364710_comment'></div>自绝生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364710_comment'></div>乃狼心干纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364710_comment'></div>鸱张窃发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364710_comment'></div>虐我边吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364710_comment'></div>覆我镇军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364710_comment'></div>大残于夷落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364710_comment'></div>孤竹沦于荒虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364710_comment'></div>陛下震赫斯之怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364710_comment'></div>授决胜之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364710_comment'></div>天地合谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364710_comment'></div>鬼神助顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364710_comment'></div>六狄举国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364710_comment'></div>百蛮整众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364710_comment'></div>运欃枪而埽除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364710_comment'></div>从列缺而焚荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364710_comment'></div>臣饮冰受斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364710_comment'></div>指日扬麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364710_comment'></div>虽谢河閒之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364710_comment'></div>窃慕任城之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364710_comment'></div>誓将首冒锋刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364710_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1364710", 1364710, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>躬先士卒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364710_comment'></div>上假神兵之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364710_comment'></div>下定鬼方之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364710_comment'></div>凶丑狂悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364710_comment'></div>素无大志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364710_comment'></div>因乘便利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364710_comment'></div>扇动奸回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364710_comment'></div>去岁尝师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364710_comment'></div>疑一军之尽化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364710_comment'></div>今春轻敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364710_comment'></div>见三帅之不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364710_comment'></div>蚁聚实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364710_comment'></div>豺牙益厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364710_comment'></div>结山戎以西寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364710_comment'></div>连岛夷而东入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364710_comment'></div>臣乃广开形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364710_comment'></div>大振声威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364710_comment'></div>移告郡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364710_comment'></div>金汤固守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364710_comment'></div>传檄诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364710_comment'></div>掎角相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364710_comment'></div>清边道大总管建安郡王攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364710_comment'></div>仗钺蓟门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364710_comment'></div>作镇燕国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364710_comment'></div>当要害之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364710_comment'></div>挫虎狼之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364710_comment'></div>高垒深沟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364710_comment'></div>卧旧营而不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364710_comment'></div>山蛇云鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364710_comment'></div>阵死地而无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364710_comment'></div>总管沙叱忠义王伯礼安道买等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364710_comment'></div>兵临易水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364710_comment'></div>使接桑河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364710_comment'></div>犀渠冲将士之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364710_comment'></div>雕骑落将军之箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364710_comment'></div>四面当敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364710_comment'></div>九拒乘城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364710_comment'></div>御史大夫娄师德总管高再牟薛思行等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364710_comment'></div>捍敌中山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364710_comment'></div>折冲外侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364710_comment'></div>训厉鹰扬之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364710_comment'></div>辑睦震惊之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364710_comment'></div>其馀部散校分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364710_comment'></div>离纲别绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364710_comment'></div>兵车星布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364710_comment'></div>巡太行而缀碣石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364710_comment'></div>介马云罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364710_comment'></div>挟衡漳而连海浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364710_comment'></div>山川积雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364710_comment'></div>尽消边骑之尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364710_comment'></div>草木长风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364710_comment'></div>咸有王师之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364710_comment'></div>清边士马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364710_comment'></div>稍南驱而拥蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364710_comment'></div>神兵甲卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364710_comment'></div>渐北逐以威临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364710_comment'></div>但合围而持重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364710_comment'></div>未轻挑而即战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364710_comment'></div>重以藩臣默啜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364710_comment'></div>统率毡裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364710_comment'></div>控弦逾于万骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364710_comment'></div>带甲弥于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364710_comment'></div>长驱松漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364710_comment'></div>掩集柳城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364710_comment'></div>巢穴是空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364710_comment'></div>胎卵皆覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364710_comment'></div>于时贼众兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364710_comment'></div>屯逼幽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364710_comment'></div>闻其塞外之败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364710_comment'></div>惧有舟中之敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364710_comment'></div>势力外窘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364710_comment'></div>心腹内乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364710_comment'></div>建安郡王攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364710_comment'></div>蓄锐泉停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364710_comment'></div>乘机电发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364710_comment'></div>援桴作气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364710_comment'></div>则山岳动摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364710_comment'></div>书箭一飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364710_comment'></div>则酋渠相灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364710_comment'></div>兵才接刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364710_comment'></div>元凶授首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364710_comment'></div>舂喉蔽野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364710_comment'></div>京观起于中州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364710_comment'></div>积甲成山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364710_comment'></div>组练收于外府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364710_comment'></div>虽本根斯拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364710_comment'></div>巳荡涤于一隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364710_comment'></div>而馀蔓所滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364710_comment'></div>尚联延于数郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364710_comment'></div>贼帅何阿小等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364710_comment'></div>顽凶是极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364710_comment'></div>屠侩为资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364710_comment'></div>授其署置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364710_comment'></div>肆行驱掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364710_comment'></div>幽陵之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364710_comment'></div>不知首恶之巳擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364710_comment'></div>两河之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364710_comment'></div>仍谓游魂之可恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364710_comment'></div>士女遭其逼胁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364710_comment'></div>军城被其屠陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364710_comment'></div>以杀戮为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364710_comment'></div>户积虔刘之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364710_comment'></div>以劫夺为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364710_comment'></div>家盈剥割之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364710_comment'></div>鹿城县令李怀璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364710_comment'></div>衣冠贵冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364710_comment'></div>令长崇班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364710_comment'></div>背我朝恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364710_comment'></div>归城敌寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364710_comment'></div>潜修甲杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364710_comment'></div>输以利器之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364710_comment'></div>见委兵权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364710_comment'></div>当其上将之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364710_comment'></div>蠢兹狂乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364710_comment'></div>暂同燎火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364710_comment'></div>言事剪除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364710_comment'></div>方申沃雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364710_comment'></div>臣乃盛兵邢赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364710_comment'></div>塞井陉之隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364710_comment'></div>命虎贲之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364710_comment'></div>遏其冲突之锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364710_comment'></div>长史唐奉一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1364710_comment'></div>驰使洛魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1364710_comment'></div>据阿曹之津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364710_comment'></div>纵羽林之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1364710_comment'></div>挫其侵轶之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1364710_comment'></div>臣又遣前军总管忠武将军行左卫翊府中郎将上柱国定阳郡开国公杨元基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑营中郎将李铎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1364710_comment'></div>子总管云麾将军行玉钤卫翊府中郎将康国公阿史那毗伽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1364710_comment'></div>子总管冠军大将军行左玉钤卫翊府中郎将宋拨延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1364710_comment'></div>子总管冠军大将军行左金吾卫翊府郎将回鹘果别敕行人云麾将军康戡诞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1364710_comment'></div>子总管定远将军左威卫长李当义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1364710_comment'></div>壮武将军何义本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1364710_comment'></div>子总管忠武将军何利深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1364710_comment'></div>子总管壮武将军俱罗罹淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1364710_comment'></div>宣威将军行左玉钤卫翊府郎将苏达俟斤度施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1364710_comment'></div>子总管定王府典军成善威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1364710_comment'></div>子总管押飞骑定远将军平原府左果毅长上穆仙童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1364710_comment'></div>子总管刘尚圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1364710_comment'></div>子总管渭州府左果毅鹿思让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑左玉钤卫队正长上贾楚圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1364710_comment'></div>左鹰扬卫长上花匡鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑李言忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑沮忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1364710_comment'></div>扬镇副张元孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑康景休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1364710_comment'></div>押飞骑左监门卫司戈窦九皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1364710_comment'></div>别奏右武威卫长上杨仁爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1364710_comment'></div>左武威卫长上杨裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1364710_comment'></div>原州崇冈镇副康戌子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1364710_comment'></div>右监门卫长上傅阿毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1364710_comment'></div>左监门卫长史殷承范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1364710_comment'></div>右卫长上王仁奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1364710_comment'></div>右卫执戟严宏炎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1364710_comment'></div>右金吾卫罗元让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1364710_comment'></div>潭州花石戍主苏元晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1364710_comment'></div>前右武威卫长郑嘉祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1364710_comment'></div>左卫司戈郑彦凑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1364710_comment'></div>妫州威宁戍主崔思暕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1364710_comment'></div>押步兵子总管左玉钤卫长上张中俨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1364710_comment'></div>别奏首领苏农婆罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1364710_comment'></div>三品子首领宋义本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1364710_comment'></div>别奏游击将军左玉钤卫宿卫歌咄施注比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1364710_comment'></div>别奏郑思疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1364710_comment'></div>左卫潞州府果毅员外置同正阿史皎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1364710_comment'></div>子总管王城府检校果毅任宏誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1364710_comment'></div>别奏检校虞侯任处寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1364710_comment'></div>别奏裴光嗣等徇其东北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1364710_comment'></div>又遣子总管游击将军玉钤左司阶伏羌县开国男李宏颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1364710_comment'></div>子总管邢州司户参军飞乌县开国男常元楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1364710_comment'></div>子总管原州广牧领将军元寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1364710_comment'></div>子总管右武卫员外置同正武元礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1364710_comment'></div>子总管前潞州参军武其。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1364710_comment'></div>别敕行人张景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1364710_comment'></div>扶州刺史旧镇副崔敬一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1364710_comment'></div>右武卫中郎将阿史德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1364710_comment'></div>奉职右鹰威卫将军业温啜剌俟斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1364710_comment'></div>右豹韬卫柔远府长史上果毅吐火罗决斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1364710_comment'></div>右金吾卫果毅执失守直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1364710_comment'></div>右鹰扬郎将员外置同正阿所𨙻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1364710_comment'></div>左玉钤卫长上借绯金元济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1364710_comment'></div>东天竺国王子僧伽杖摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1364710_comment'></div>右鹰扬卫郎将仆固郡骨支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1364710_comment'></div>左金吾卫郎将阿康地具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1364710_comment'></div>右武威卫郎将东河察使左豹韬卫高城府长上果毅阿史德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1364710_comment'></div>伏麾支右玉钤卫郎将路驴驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1364710_comment'></div>左金吾卫长上阿史德伏麾支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1364710_comment'></div>右玉钤卫郎将路欲谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1364710_comment'></div>游击将军葛罗枝延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1364710_comment'></div>游击将军契苾木昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1364710_comment'></div>折冲都尉车鼻施俟斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1364710_comment'></div>虔州犹口镇副白善德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1364710_comment'></div>晋州仁寿府果毅侯义威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1364710_comment'></div>子总管左武威卫侯神城府果毅杜元隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1364710_comment'></div>押后队长上李德峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1364710_comment'></div>天官常选王皓常彦纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1364710_comment'></div>押千骑三交戍董元景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1364710_comment'></div>河州安乔戍主王才龛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1364710_comment'></div>别奏康元寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1364710_comment'></div>押千骑队杨待封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1364710_comment'></div>前冀州堂阳县丞温待礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1364710_comment'></div>别敕行人白君𧦬等略其西南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1364710_comment'></div>或折冲其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1364710_comment'></div>或乘蹑其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1364710_comment'></div>整貔貅之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1364710_comment'></div>奋猛毅之伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1364710_comment'></div>长戟林回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1364710_comment'></div>高旗云桡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1364710_comment'></div>贼党晷穷漏急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1364710_comment'></div>命窄途殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1364710_comment'></div>执无全之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1364710_comment'></div>投必死之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1364710_comment'></div>以今月一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1364710_comment'></div>何阿小等帅不悛之旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1364710_comment'></div>拥胁从之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1364710_comment'></div>结聚数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1364710_comment'></div>抗拒官军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1364710_comment'></div>自寅及午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1364710_comment'></div>前后九阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1364710_comment'></div>元基等并锋镝争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1364710_comment'></div>戈鋋递跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1364710_comment'></div>抗足而跐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1364710_comment'></div>鲜卑之血涂地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1364710_comment'></div>攘臂而扔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1364710_comment'></div>乌丸之首积野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1364710_comment'></div>摧同冰陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1364710_comment'></div>裂若山焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1364710_comment'></div>穷其子遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1364710_comment'></div>无复噍类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1364710_comment'></div>斩获逆贼冀州三品大总管何阿小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼河北道招慰大使冀州刺史马行慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼冀州道副大总管杨奉节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼冀州长史王宏允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼总管刘伏念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼十二卫大将军见任鹿城县令李怀璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼信都县令杨志寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1364710_comment'></div>总管胡六郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼总管王知先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼帅马明誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1364710_comment'></div>逆贼三品总管姬目等魁首巨蠹三百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1364710_comment'></div>所有戎马凭陵残毁之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1364710_comment'></div>臣皆宣布制旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1364710_comment'></div>抚集其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1364710_comment'></div>咸怀圣恩。<div id='poem_sentence_300_1364710_comment'></div>冀方砥平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1364710_comment'></div>二载逋诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1364710_comment'></div>一朝泯灭。<div id='poem_sentence_306_1364710_comment'></div>歌达塞垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1364710_comment'></div>截风浪以息沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1364710_comment'></div>廓氛埃而清白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1364710_comment'></div>郤縠何力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1364710_comment'></div>敢推群帅之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1364710_comment'></div>叔向有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1364710_comment'></div>实在明君之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1364710_comment'></div>臣凭藉睿略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1364710_comment'></div>忝当戎政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1364710_comment'></div>神机密运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1364710_comment'></div>不待横草之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1364710_comment'></div>天赞冥符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1364710_comment'></div>恭承破竹之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1364710_comment'></div>伏惟庙胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1364710_comment'></div>速奉朝欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1364710_comment'></div>抃舞之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1364710_comment'></div>倍万恒品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1364710_comment'></div>不胜庆快之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1364710_comment'></div>谨遣傔人天官常选李佑别奏左卫长上校尉张德俊奉露布以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1364710_comment'></div>其军资器械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1364710_comment'></div>别簿条上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1364710_comment'></div>谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_328_1364710_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=697&endYear=697')">697年10月</a>　本年秋末或冬初，攸宜回朝，府散说应同时回朝任职。作品：《贞节君碣》<div id='poem_1364760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364760' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364760'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364760'>神功元年十月乙丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364760_comment'></div>阳鸿卒于雩都县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364760_comment'></div>友人沛国朱敬则清河孟乾祚范阳卢禹等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364760_comment'></div>哀鸿抱德没地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364760_comment'></div>继体未识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364760_comment'></div>考行定谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364760_comment'></div>葬于旧域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364760_comment'></div>鸿字季翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364760_comment'></div>平恩人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364760_comment'></div>其先著族右北平郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364760_comment'></div>大父真阳宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364760_comment'></div>适兹乐土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364760_comment'></div>爰定我居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364760_comment'></div>维桑与梓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364760_comment'></div>既重世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364760_comment'></div>鸿倜傥奇杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364760_comment'></div>瑰玮博达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364760_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1364760", 1364760, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>贯涉</span>六籍百家之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364760_comment'></div>其要在霸王大略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364760_comment'></div>奇正大旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364760_comment'></div>君亲大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364760_comment'></div>忠孝大节而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364760_comment'></div>章句之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364760_comment'></div>不之视也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364760_comment'></div>尝陋汉史地理志周礼职方志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364760_comment'></div>时异虚记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364760_comment'></div>心不厌焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364760_comment'></div>乃攀恒岱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364760_comment'></div>浮洞庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364760_comment'></div>窥河源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364760_comment'></div>践岷衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364760_comment'></div>稽四海之风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364760_comment'></div>算九州之险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364760_comment'></div>与赵国贯高图献其议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364760_comment'></div>遇火焚荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364760_comment'></div>天下壮其志而痛其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364760_comment'></div>养徒闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364760_comment'></div>不应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1364760", 1364760, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>宾辟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364760_comment'></div>仪凤中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364760_comment'></div>河北大使薛公举鸿行厉贪鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364760_comment'></div>天子喜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364760_comment'></div>用寘于吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364760_comment'></div>乃尉汲曲阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364760_comment'></div>主簿龙门雩都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364760_comment'></div>夫其屏居十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364760_comment'></div>一方化德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364760_comment'></div>历佐四邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364760_comment'></div>诸侯观政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364760_comment'></div>惜乎有大才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364760_comment'></div>无贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364760_comment'></div>命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364760_comment'></div>初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364760_comment'></div>鸿游大学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364760_comment'></div>有书生山东李思言物故南馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364760_comment'></div>鸿伤其终远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364760_comment'></div>家属有丧无主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364760_comment'></div>乃驾柩车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364760_comment'></div>送归东土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364760_comment'></div>及在曲阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364760_comment'></div>敬业作难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364760_comment'></div>润州籍鸿得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364760_comment'></div>历旬坚守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364760_comment'></div>城既陷而犹斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364760_comment'></div>力虽屈而蹈节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364760_comment'></div>寇义而脱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364760_comment'></div>因伪加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364760_comment'></div>即署曲阿令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364760_comment'></div>鸿贞而不谅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364760_comment'></div>诡应求伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364760_comment'></div>既入邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364760_comment'></div>则焚服阖门而设拒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364760_comment'></div>故得殿邦奋旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364760_comment'></div>一境赖存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364760_comment'></div>淮海厎绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364760_comment'></div>勋荅效功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364760_comment'></div>卒不言赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364760_comment'></div>赏亦不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364760_comment'></div>君子以为急友成哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364760_comment'></div>高义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364760_comment'></div>临危抗节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364760_comment'></div>秉礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364760_comment'></div>矫寇违祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364760_comment'></div>明知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364760_comment'></div>保邑匿勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364760_comment'></div>近仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364760_comment'></div>义以利物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364760_comment'></div>智以周身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364760_comment'></div>礼以和众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364760_comment'></div>仁以安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364760_comment'></div>道有五常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364760_comment'></div>鸿擅其四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364760_comment'></div>武有七德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364760_comment'></div>鸿秉其二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364760_comment'></div>大虑克就之谓贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364760_comment'></div>好廉自克之谓节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364760_comment'></div>粤若夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364760_comment'></div>可谥为贞节也巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364760_comment'></div>于是纪名垂迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364760_comment'></div>表墓勒石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364760_comment'></div>其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364760_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_1364760'>倬良士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364760_comment'></div>纵自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364760_comment'></div>辨方物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364760_comment'></div>覈山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364760_comment'></div>厥志大哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364760_comment'></div>峻刚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364760_comment'></div>殷义声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364760_comment'></div>返旅榇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364760_comment'></div>宴穷城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364760_comment'></div>厥德迈哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364760_comment'></div>哀斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364760_comment'></div>命莫赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364760_comment'></div>德不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364760_comment'></div>温如玉。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364687' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364687?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论幽州边事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（718年3月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364687_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364687'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364687'>臣顿首死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364687_comment'></div>皇帝陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364687_comment'></div>先帝以臣践履忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364687_comment'></div>使臣启发圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364687_comment'></div>故得侍读春宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364687_comment'></div>夙承天眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364687_comment'></div>景云中岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364687_comment'></div>兼掌枢衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364687_comment'></div>内当沸腾之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364687_comment'></div>外御倾夺之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364687_comment'></div>陛下监抚既安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364687_comment'></div>自天所祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364687_comment'></div>臣协赞之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364687_comment'></div>明神启之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364687_comment'></div>开元之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364687_comment'></div>首典钧轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364687_comment'></div>智小任大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364687_comment'></div>福过灾生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364687_comment'></div>出守三州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364687_comment'></div>违离六载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364687_comment'></div>曲直非已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364687_comment'></div>升降由人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364687_comment'></div>惟君知臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364687_comment'></div>事不待说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364687_comment'></div>今改秩边镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364687_comment'></div>委重戎麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364687_comment'></div>窃以两蕃近和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364687_comment'></div>能无同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364687_comment'></div>九姓远附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364687_comment'></div>未闻抚纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364687_comment'></div>欲恃贼杀无侵扰之虑。<div id='poem_sentence_42_1364687_comment'></div>脱有风尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364687_comment'></div>何事不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364687_comment'></div>臣熟闻幽州兵马寡弱。<div id='poem_sentence_47_1364687_comment'></div>城中仓粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364687_comment'></div>全无贮积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364687_comment'></div>设若来迫。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1364825_comment'></div>故美畅于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364825_comment'></div>名扬于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364825_comment'></div>弱冠以国子进士高第。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年12月</a>　冬入朝回幽州后，冬末遣贺正使时，有文。作品：《请置屯田表》<div id='poem_1364672' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364672' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364672'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364672'>臣说言。臣闻求人安者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364672_comment'></div>莫过于足食。求国富者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364672_comment'></div>莫先于疾耕。臣再任河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364672_comment'></div>备知川泽。窃见漳水可以灌巨野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364672_comment'></div>淇水可以溉汤阴。若开屯田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364672_comment'></div>不减万顷。化萑苇为粳稻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364672_comment'></div>变斥卤为膏腴。用力非多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364672_comment'></div>为利甚溥。谚云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364672_comment'></div>岁在申酉。乞浆得酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364672_comment'></div>来岁甫迩。春事方兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364672_comment'></div>愿陛下不失天时。急趋地利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364672_comment'></div>上可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1364672", 1364672, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>丰国</span>。下可以廪边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364672_comment'></div>河漕通流。易于转运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364672_comment'></div>此百代之利也。当今国储未赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364672_comment'></div>边军未息。静人业农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364672_comment'></div>愿留圣意。亦尝赐前阶之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364672_comment'></div>承后骑之顾。竟唯唯而无一言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364672_comment'></div>岂敢隐情于圣主也。正以职在仗卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364672_comment'></div>忧于部伍。马上非公议之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364672_comment'></div>囿游非朝廷之事。今昧死上愚见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364672_comment'></div>乞与大臣筹谋。速下河北支度及沟渠使。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年12月</a>　有文与营州都督为张敬忠。作品：《与营州都督弟书》<div id='poem_1364707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1364707'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364707'>骨肉世疏。居止地阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364707_comment'></div>宗族名迹。不能备知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364707_comment'></div>读厌次府君状。巳具历官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364707_comment'></div>未书性习。夫五常之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364707_comment'></div>出于五行。禀气所钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364707_comment'></div>必有偏厚。则仁义礼智信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364707_comment'></div>为品不同。六艺九流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364707_comment'></div>习科各异。若以稷离之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364707_comment'></div>未以为允。今之撰录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364707_comment'></div>盖欲推美实行。崇识素心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364707_comment'></div>野有戎歌。山无夏草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364707_comment'></div>步步日远。能无乡国之心乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364707_comment'></div>荒州新立。向者未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364707_comment'></div>下车殊俗。意绪如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364707_comment'></div>说患恒服汤。虚多健少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364707_comment'></div>因别奉去。说呈。<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1364824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书令逍遥公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（719年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364824")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364824'>唐故中书令逍遥公韦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364824_comment'></div>讳嗣立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364824_comment'></div>字延构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364824_comment'></div>京兆杜陵人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364824_comment'></div>受浑元之正性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364824_comment'></div>挺生人之秀杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364824_comment'></div>门为孝悌之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364824_comment'></div>世处台衡之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364824_comment'></div>盖士林之高标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364824_comment'></div>宗臣之首出者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364824_comment'></div>生于秦之清水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364824_comment'></div>长于郑之成皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364824_comment'></div>聪明先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364824_comment'></div>博古兼览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364824_comment'></div>究蓬山之百氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364824_comment'></div>综<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>阙里</span>之六艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364824_comment'></div>文而不华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364824_comment'></div>实而不滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364824_comment'></div>原夫志在于易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364824_comment'></div>行在于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364824_comment'></div>守橐籥之冲虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364824_comment'></div>播朱弦之恺悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364824_comment'></div>事有则而言有度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364824_comment'></div>神无方而用无体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364824_comment'></div>其与人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364824_comment'></div>温良善诱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364824_comment'></div>仁恕多容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364824_comment'></div>俾夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>顽蔽</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>开析</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364824_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>愎鸷</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>扰从</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364824_comment'></div>君子进道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364824_comment'></div>小人革虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364824_comment'></div>闻者愿来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364824_comment'></div>见者忘去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364824_comment'></div>若膏泽之浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364824_comment'></div>阳和之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364824_comment'></div>万物不知其化矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364824_comment'></div>及夫覆篑登朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364824_comment'></div>滥觞宰邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364824_comment'></div>圣朝知其周慎忠肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364824_comment'></div>易循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364824_comment'></div>是以绸缪两禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364824_comment'></div>重謺千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364824_comment'></div>迄践宰衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364824_comment'></div>终厥有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364824_comment'></div>凡化二邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364824_comment'></div>理七郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364824_comment'></div>三入中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364824_comment'></div>再统兵部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364824_comment'></div>选兵吏各两冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364824_comment'></div>典枢密共五载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364824_comment'></div>光弼四主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364824_comment'></div>历政三十有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364824_comment'></div>其閒累有谤及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364824_comment'></div>官因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>左退</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364824_comment'></div>日月蚀而更明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364824_comment'></div>随和幽而不昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364824_comment'></div>尔其为邦设教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364824_comment'></div>遵德闲邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364824_comment'></div>身勤心苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364824_comment'></div>诚感物化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364824_comment'></div>礼让兴于私室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364824_comment'></div>刑罚废于公家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364824_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>衡镜</span>高悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364824_comment'></div>文武矫首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364824_comment'></div>才无我失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364824_comment'></div>善若已有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364824_comment'></div>风流名教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364824_comment'></div>作法垂后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364824_comment'></div>吁谟皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364824_comment'></div>功格天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364824_comment'></div>茫茫蠢蠢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364824_comment'></div>既生既遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364824_comment'></div>四夷来王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364824_comment'></div>五灵皆至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364824_comment'></div>然而外荣中素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364824_comment'></div>迹迩心遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364824_comment'></div>杳然朱户之若丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364824_comment'></div>邈矣赤松之可接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364824_comment'></div>西宴骊山之谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364824_comment'></div>东息龙池之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364824_comment'></div>择逍遥而建号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364824_comment'></div>裂土宇而开社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364824_comment'></div>即明主封立帝之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364824_comment'></div>表高臣之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364824_comment'></div>公考侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364824_comment'></div>为国元辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364824_comment'></div>公兄承庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364824_comment'></div>当代齐名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364824_comment'></div>咸以令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364824_comment'></div>继和金鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364824_comment'></div>扶阳二相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364824_comment'></div>陈氏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>三君</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364824_comment'></div>复追美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364824_comment'></div>侍中前夫人崔氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364824_comment'></div>生黄门而即世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364824_comment'></div>后夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364824_comment'></div>生公而偏爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364824_comment'></div>公克谐以孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364824_comment'></div>因心则友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364824_comment'></div>启均养之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364824_comment'></div>成无閒之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364824_comment'></div>天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364824_comment'></div>比之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1364824", 1364824, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>祥览</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364824_comment'></div>惟公德行言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364824_comment'></div>文学政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364824_comment'></div>四者实总而兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364824_comment'></div>事亲养志而能争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364824_comment'></div>居丧过哀而顾礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364824_comment'></div>此又善中之善者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364824_comment'></div>善人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364824_comment'></div>天之经也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364824_comment'></div>国之宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364824_comment'></div>道将兴废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364824_comment'></div>木铎之用有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364824_comment'></div>命或推移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364824_comment'></div>苍生之望恒在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364824_comment'></div>春秋六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364824_comment'></div>遘疾陈郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364824_comment'></div>还医洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364824_comment'></div>开元七年九月二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364824_comment'></div>薨于归德里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364824_comment'></div>有诏赠兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364824_comment'></div>谥曰孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364824_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364824_comment'></div>明年某月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364824_comment'></div>葬于某地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364824_comment'></div>有子孚恒济夬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364824_comment'></div>儡然在疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364824_comment'></div>靡所寘哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364824_comment'></div>以某忝缙云之旧寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364824_comment'></div>沐清风之馀论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364824_comment'></div>入难名之阃域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364824_comment'></div>窥妙德之形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364824_comment'></div>见托铭志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364824_comment'></div>庶传精爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364824_comment'></div>至于历官次序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364824_comment'></div>平居事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364824_comment'></div>当见郡府遗爱之碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364824_comment'></div>国史名臣之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364824_comment'></div>故不存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364824_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364824_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_141_1364824'>峨峨仁公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364824_comment'></div>抱孝含忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364824_comment'></div>文献则足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364824_comment'></div>高明有融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364824_comment'></div>翻飞王佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364824_comment'></div>穆我清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364824_comment'></div>道济明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364824_comment'></div>心乐幽地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364824_comment'></div>薛衣华衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364824_comment'></div>坦然一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364824_comment'></div>逍遥启封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364824_comment'></div>带砺传祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364824_comment'></div>生涯共尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364824_comment'></div>振古其常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364824_comment'></div>人秉三德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364824_comment'></div>天归百祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364824_comment'></div>臧孙有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364824_comment'></div>公业不亡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_158_1364824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=719&endYear=719')">719年</a>　张说奉调入朝，幽州府散，说送随军离幽州时作诗。作品：《幽州别（一作送）随军入秦》<div id='poem_826264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_826264' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_826264'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_826264'>杨子来戎幕，老夫欣主诺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_826264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_826264'>归路有光华，边庭少咨度。<div id='poem_sentence_1_826264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_826264'>雁知穷朔苦，人羡长安乐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_826264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_826264'>独将马革心，同声谢台阁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_826264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_826264'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_826264_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e5abe36b8c3a4214ac5b7c3c76d36772_label'><a href='javascript: 太原

id='poem_content_1364839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364839'>维长安二年月朔日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364839_comment'></div>敕并州道行军大总管兼宣劳使左肃政御史大夫同凤阁鸾台三品兼知并州事魏元忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364839_comment'></div>遣裴思益以酒脯时果之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364839_comment'></div>致祭于石岭战亡兵士之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364839_comment'></div>戎羯慢天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364839_comment'></div>南牧吠主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364839_comment'></div>石岭横地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364839_comment'></div>北都扃户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364839_comment'></div>与我王卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364839_comment'></div>保界并土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364839_comment'></div>如何不吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364839_comment'></div>罹此寇虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364839_comment'></div>列镇既严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364839_comment'></div>连岩既削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364839_comment'></div>攻则路险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364839_comment'></div>守非城恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364839_comment'></div>彼谋匪臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364839_comment'></div>寔愆偕作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364839_comment'></div>援绝兵减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364839_comment'></div>军孤势弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364839_comment'></div>地拒两陉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364839_comment'></div>山望双崞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364839_comment'></div>胡尘大起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364839_comment'></div>白刃交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364839_comment'></div>石尽矢穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364839_comment'></div>旗焚冑落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364839_comment'></div>嗟尔战夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364839_comment'></div>烈烈忠勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364839_comment'></div>奋不顾命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364839_comment'></div>志无旋踵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364839_comment'></div>身没名扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364839_comment'></div>生轻义重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364839_comment'></div>天子命我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364839_comment'></div>理兵晋阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364839_comment'></div>思与士众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364839_comment'></div>厎宁遐荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364839_comment'></div>痛兹壮士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364839_comment'></div>剪为国殇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364839_comment'></div>盍诉天帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364839_comment'></div>降厉鬼方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364839_comment'></div>助气金鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364839_comment'></div>复怨沙场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364839_comment'></div>虏血尔酹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364839_comment'></div>虏醢尔尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364839_comment'></div>封尸死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364839_comment'></div>招魂故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364839_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364840_comment'></div>贼虐不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364840_comment'></div>气悍朔风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364840_comment'></div>马肥秋草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364840_comment'></div>侵轶郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364840_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1364840", 1364840, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>惊逼</span>稚老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364840_comment'></div>奔走山林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364840_comment'></div>是障是保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364840_comment'></div>兵不善守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364840_comment'></div>将不远谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364840_comment'></div>如何减灶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364840_comment'></div>无复烧牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364840_comment'></div>俾尔士女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364840_comment'></div>熸于寇仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364840_comment'></div>魂飞狄刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364840_comment'></div>血迸毡裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364840_comment'></div>殇悲雨哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364840_comment'></div>气怨天愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364840_comment'></div>总兵帝乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364840_comment'></div>言念北阜。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1364840_comment'></div>泣吊郊童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364840_comment'></div>哀问田叟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364840_comment'></div>为尔复恶。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364836'>长安二年月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364836_comment'></div>皇帝使并州道大行军副大总管尹元凯等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364836_comment'></div>敬荐酒脯时果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364836_comment'></div>敢告霍山之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364836_comment'></div>皇帝天覆万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364836_comment'></div>各遂其性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364836_comment'></div>祠于群神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364836_comment'></div>罔不咸秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364836_comment'></div>独彼凶虏默啜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364836_comment'></div>悖天虐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364836_comment'></div>窥边猾夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364836_comment'></div>略无宁岁。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364836_comment'></div>悯彼夷落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364836_comment'></div>毒于昏暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364836_comment'></div>常欲诛其魁首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364836_comment'></div>安是藩氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364836_comment'></div>寇虐盈稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364836_comment'></div>神人同弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364836_comment'></div>今自送死并朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364836_comment'></div>近惊山陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364836_comment'></div>命将出师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364836_comment'></div>龚行天罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364836_comment'></div>惟神炳灵参野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364836_comment'></div>作镇冀方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364836_comment'></div>歆是正直。<div id='poem_title_1364663_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364663'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364663'>文林郎陈寡尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364663_comment'></div>年六十四<span class='inlineComment2'>（贯沧州）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364663_comment'></div>右出身四十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364663_comment'></div>怀道抱德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364663_comment'></div>博涉经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364663_comment'></div>白首幽栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364663_comment'></div>不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364663_comment'></div>堪激励化俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364663_comment'></div>处谏诤之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364663_comment'></div>幽州节度使参谋刘待授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364663_comment'></div>年六十四<span class='inlineComment2'>（贯京兆府）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364663_comment'></div>右怀德退静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364663_comment'></div>立操端确。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364663_comment'></div>精通术数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364663_comment'></div>堪备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364663_comment'></div>四品于𢘅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364663_comment'></div>年三十二<span class='inlineComment2'>（贯京兆府）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364663_comment'></div>右志定神和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364663_comment'></div>学精文远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364663_comment'></div>达皇王正道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364663_comment'></div>通古今大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364663_comment'></div>堪拾遗左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364663_comment'></div>以前幽州都督兼节度管内诸军经略大使摄御史大夫燕国公张说奏称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364663_comment'></div>臣身任边城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364663_comment'></div>心在庭阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364663_comment'></div>报国之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364663_comment'></div>莫若进贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364663_comment'></div>敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364663_comment'></div>陈寡尤等三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364663_comment'></div>宜并追取试练考覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364663_comment'></div>臣说言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364663_comment'></div>知贤不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364663_comment'></div>谓之窃位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364663_comment'></div>闻贤而拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364663_comment'></div>是乃蔽君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364663_comment'></div>窃位冒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364663_comment'></div>蔽君奸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364663_comment'></div>有奸与冒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364663_comment'></div>何以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364663_comment'></div>臣前岁入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364663_comment'></div>特蒙顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364663_comment'></div>圣情侧席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364663_comment'></div>惧有遗贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364663_comment'></div>臣以寡尤三人上闻天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364663_comment'></div>中书宣旨取考覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364663_comment'></div>吏部写敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364663_comment'></div>宣下文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364663_comment'></div>三载于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364663_comment'></div>一人不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364663_comment'></div>夫轻进者是干禄之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364663_comment'></div>静退者是养高之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364663_comment'></div>天下廉让之风未长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364663_comment'></div>趋竞之俗未惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364663_comment'></div>若令所司引试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364663_comment'></div>招其隐逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364663_comment'></div>士宁伏死岩穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364663_comment'></div>焉肯拜侍郎之庭哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364663_comment'></div>徒有荐贤之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364663_comment'></div>竟无进贤之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364663_comment'></div>非朝廷礼贤之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364663_comment'></div>岂陛下求贤之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364663_comment'></div>近因奏谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364663_comment'></div>具承天旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364663_comment'></div>请敕州县各以礼徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364663_comment'></div>至京之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364663_comment'></div>中书引见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364663_comment'></div>然后付与宰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364663_comment'></div>请言探赜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364663_comment'></div>必有可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364663_comment'></div>寘彼周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364663_comment'></div>如当谬荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364663_comment'></div>罪臣所举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364663_comment'></div>谨录前举状本如前。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1364663_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年</a>　本年正月前后转并州至并州，敕造座右铭。作品：《（之）并州敕造座右铭》<div id='poem_sentence_2_1369743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年</a>　张说应陆孝斌之子伯玉等哀请而撰碑文。作品：《唐故赠齐州司马陆公神道碑》<div id='poem_1364789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故赠齐州司马陆公神道碑</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1364789'>公讳孝斌。字顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364789_comment'></div>姓陆。河南洛阳人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364789_comment'></div>其先帝妫启姓。陈胡立族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364789_comment'></div>敬仲之孙有齐国。宣王之弟封陆乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364789_comment'></div>盖命氏之所由兴也。秦并诸国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364789_comment'></div>陆氏分适燕吴。在燕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364789_comment'></div>魏文成帝时。东平成王俟生平原王丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364789_comment'></div>重世游美。为国之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364789_comment'></div>公即王七世孙也。曾祖彦升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364789_comment'></div>北齐以文艺高选。任秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364789_comment'></div>以至德表所居。号终孝里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364789_comment'></div>祖元亮。隋鹰扬郎将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364789_comment'></div>父淳感。盘桓利贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364789_comment'></div>弓招莫进。同志诔行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364789_comment'></div>谥为惠康。孝悌仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364789_comment'></div>世不殒矣。公诞灵冲和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364789_comment'></div>禀识高朗。而中礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364789_comment'></div>易而达节。笃学励行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364789_comment'></div>著实飞声。文史者宗其渊府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364789_comment'></div>德行者仰其墙仞。举国子明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364789_comment'></div>选绛州参军始州司法。其在官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364789_comment'></div>示人亲其亲。长其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364789_comment'></div>不苛察而小无废。不皎异而大有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364789_comment'></div>知识日明。常憺如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364789_comment'></div>丧亲过哀。因中风废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364789_comment'></div>卧疾累年不起。楚邸肇封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364789_comment'></div>大罗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1364789", 1364789, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>云逸</span>。虽沈疴未弥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364789_comment'></div>而佥望允归。授楚王府兵曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364789_comment'></div>实有躬降师宾之礼。目击仪刑之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364789_comment'></div>府罢。换赵州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364789_comment'></div>以病去职。圣历元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364789_comment'></div>匈奴入赵。公危邦不处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364789_comment'></div>尽室以行。望河南而将济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364789_comment'></div>至黎阳而疾甚。年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364789_comment'></div>十月丁未。终于姚村之逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364789_comment'></div>归殡于滏阳之郭北。先天二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364789_comment'></div>皇帝践祚。以故吏赠齐州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364789_comment'></div>惜哉。用公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364789_comment'></div>行公之志。上可以序三光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364789_comment'></div>下可以平九土。存则位不充其德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364789_comment'></div>没则荣不逮其身。命矣夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364789_comment'></div>夫人范阳郡太君卢氏。故岐山丞元瑾之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364789_comment'></div>恭俭之德备。贞信之教兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364789_comment'></div>妻道母仪。自家刑国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364789_comment'></div>享年七十有六。开元六年十一月丁未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364789_comment'></div>终于洛阳之宣教里。八年五月丙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364789_comment'></div>合葬于漳北之神冈。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364789_comment'></div>初咸亨中。王师征辽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364789_comment'></div>公参是军事。友人太原王守义遇疫于海东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364789_comment'></div>路艰寇阻。兵危势急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364789_comment'></div>公独颠沛致丧。归其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1364789", 1364789, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>井邑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364789_comment'></div>其在安州也。朝廷以公精达法理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364789_comment'></div>乃命覆囚剑南。梁岐冤系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364789_comment'></div>动盈千百。丹笔所详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364789_comment'></div>十全八九。其舍生徇义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364789_comment'></div>返已施仁。皆此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364789_comment'></div>礼莫重乎饰终。于是见其不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364789_comment'></div>善莫大乎馀庆。于是知其有后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364789_comment'></div>四子伯玉仲容叔献季良。泣血衔恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364789_comment'></div>从政本仁。资忠移孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364789_comment'></div>不言而理。正身作教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364789_comment'></div>垂彼云翼。落此盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364789_comment'></div>没后荣进。终延赠宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364789_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1364789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年9月13日</a>　在并州时撰文。作品：《进白乌赋并（墨诏）批答》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》不系此赋作年。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年</a>　冬，上并州论边事表。作品：《并州论边事表》<div id='poem_1364639' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364639' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364639?labeling=true' target='_blank'>并州论边事表</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1364639'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364639'>臣说言。臣说顿首死罪死罪言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364639_comment'></div>臣闻小忿不忍。延起大患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364639_comment'></div>小罪不宽。迫成大祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364639_comment'></div>契丹奚背恩。诚负天地不容之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364639_comment'></div>然原其状。本是夷戎君臣不和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364639_comment'></div>自相诛戮耳。所望圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364639_comment'></div>且使其族类在朝者。将敕书再三告让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364639_comment'></div>因其所欲立酋长而便定之。或可不战而定也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364639_comment'></div>必告之不驯。则大发兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364639_comment'></div>东召靺羯。西举九姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364639_comment'></div>来春未青。数道齐入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364639_comment'></div>突干之首。可拾而取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364639_comment'></div>未为晚也。天恩若不忍以中国劳事蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364639_comment'></div>则严兵备塞。弃两蕃如粪土耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364639_comment'></div>又许钦浃拥二万馀众。据五丈之城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364639_comment'></div>有粮即守不可拔。无粮即鼓而行归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364639_comment'></div>何所虑也。今遣史献非时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364639_comment'></div>远抄近掠。其实甚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364639_comment'></div>万一未捷。贼气转壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364639_comment'></div>下臣愚昧。不敢隐情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364639_comment'></div>伏愿圣恩再加裁度。臣说诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364639_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1364639_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年1月</a>　在太原有文。作品：《举陈光乘等表》<div id='poem_1364664' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364664' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364664?labeling=true' target='_blank'>举陈光乘等表</a><span class='authorDate'>（721年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364664")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364664_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364664'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364664'>开元九年正月日。洛州临武县主簿陈光乘<span class='inlineComment2'>（摄监察御史在河北）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364664_comment'></div>夔州归州镇将勤思齐<span class='inlineComment2'>（见在桂州）</span>。前申州参军戴师倩<span class='inlineComment2'>（遭忧在都）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364664_comment'></div>敕。戴师倩勤思齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364664_comment'></div>或身自有犯。或逆人缘坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364664_comment'></div>未可擢用。亦不须追以前状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364664_comment'></div>准七月二十二日制。内外文武职事五品以上官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364664_comment'></div>有奇材异略堪任将帅者。封状进内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364664_comment'></div>陛下垂心万机。亲择将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364664_comment'></div>欲大顿天纲。收罗云逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364664_comment'></div>今者塞北有屈强之胡。汉南屯不羁之马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364664_comment'></div>使边郡忧患。朝廷旰食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364664_comment'></div>此天下士君子饥待虏馌。渴待虏血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364664_comment'></div>决命于匈奴之时也。臣所举前件三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364664_comment'></div>光乘积学而善谋。求之古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364664_comment'></div>吴起韩信敌也。师倩沈勇而能断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364664_comment'></div>求之古人。彭越吴汉类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364664_comment'></div>思齐忠壮而异材。求之古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364664_comment'></div>张飞许褚等也。皆怀道藏器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364664_comment'></div>仰望明时。羞自媒衒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364664_comment'></div>莫能上达。臣闻拔人于死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364664_comment'></div>必舍生而报恩。荣人于辱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364664_comment'></div>必尽节而雪耻。至如师倩思齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364664_comment'></div>亦尝生窜死地。其为屈辱甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364664_comment'></div>如蒙拯将坠之命。起巳废之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364664_comment'></div>一言所及。百年可尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364664_comment'></div>凡情尚知此。况感激之人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364664_comment'></div>陛下发使召之。旬月可到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364664_comment'></div>试以军事。必立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364664_comment'></div>若不如所言。请受面欺之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364664_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1364664_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=721')">721年</a>　应葛福顺之请，有文。作品：《赠郎将葛君墓志》<div id='poem_1364806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364806' class='poemTitle
