"Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>陶白</span>之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364806_comment'></div>朝无金张之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364806_comment'></div>不承过庭之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364806_comment'></div>不渐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1364806", 1364806, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>鼓箧</span>之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364806_comment'></div>而能奋飞乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364806_comment'></div>独拔深济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364806_comment'></div>富忠孝而由已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364806_comment'></div>善射驭而闻天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364806_comment'></div>早以武艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364806_comment'></div>妙选供奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364806_comment'></div>每扈游别馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364806_comment'></div>侍跸禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364806_comment'></div>何尝不左发五豝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364806_comment'></div>傍连双兔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364806_comment'></div>岁久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364806_comment'></div>拜元城府左果毅都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364806_comment'></div>寻加上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364806_comment'></div>入陪内仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364806_comment'></div>思马斯才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364806_comment'></div>出典外军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364806_comment'></div>握兵之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364806_comment'></div>所谓白圭特达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364806_comment'></div>青云自致者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364806_comment'></div>其用未展。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364806_comment'></div>其生有涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364806_comment'></div>神功二年某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364806_comment'></div>终于东都私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364806_comment'></div>殡于北邙山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364806_comment'></div>夫人太原郡太夫人郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364806_comment'></div>从夫有礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364806_comment'></div>以子而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364806_comment'></div>开元八年十一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364806_comment'></div>薨于京兆之修真里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364806_comment'></div>有子福顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364806_comment'></div>克家用孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364806_comment'></div>开国惟忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364806_comment'></div>泣风树之不追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364806_comment'></div>痛荣禄之不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364806_comment'></div>哀戚之情上感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364806_comment'></div>饰终之泽下流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364806_comment'></div>窀穸有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364806_comment'></div>祖奠将设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364806_comment'></div>有诏赠右骁卫郎将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364806_comment'></div>开元九年二月七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364806_comment'></div>合葬于长安县龙首乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364806_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364806_comment'></div>郁郁宰树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364806_comment'></div>苍苍墓田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364806_comment'></div>恐佳城之见日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364806_comment'></div>秘铭石于重泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364806_comment'></div>词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364806_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1364806'>都尉武达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364806_comment'></div>夫人礼封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364806_comment'></div>令德高行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364806_comment'></div>誉偶名双。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364806_comment'></div>自古迄今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364806_comment'></div>仁贤同尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364806_comment'></div>惟传忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364806_comment'></div>馀庆不泯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1364806_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a1e2340368334157bfbfa48630a62748_label'><a -----title
衡阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='390f18a9abea46aaad29018883060842_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("390f18a9abea46aaad29018883060842");'><span id='390f18a9abea46aaad29018883060842_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=703&endYear=703')">703年</a>，37岁</div><div id='390f18a9abea46aaad29018883060842' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=703&endYear=703')">703年9月</a>　本年九月，张易之等陷魏元忠谋反，令说证其事；说佯应之；廷对则证元忠实不反坐忤旨配流钦州。作品：《代书寄吉十一》<div id='poem_24094' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24094' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24094?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代书寄吉十一</a><span class='authorDate'>（703年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24094")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24094_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24094'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24094'>一雁雪上飞，值我衡阳道。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24094'>口衔离别字，远寄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_24094", 24094, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>当归</span>草。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24094'>目想春来迟，心惊寒去早。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24094'>忆乡乘羽翮，慕侣盈怀抱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24094'>零落答故人，将随江树老。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24094'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_24094_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_24094'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(24094)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
始兴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a52dca438d7e419796aca401970b4fbc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a52dca438d7e419796aca401970b4fbc");'><span id='a52dca438d7e419796aca401970b4fbc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=703&endYear=703')">703年</a>，37岁</div><div id='a52dca438d7e419796aca401970b4fbc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=703&endYear=703')">703年</a>　冬贬钦州，南行，冬经韶州，遇张九龄，一见其文章，厚为敬礼（徐浩撰《张九龄碑》）作品：《冬日见牧牛人担青草归》<div id='poem_24097' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24097' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24097?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冬日见牧牛人担青草归</a><span class='authorDate'>（703年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24097")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24097_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24097'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24097'>塞上绵应折，江南草可结。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24097_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24074'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24074'>陈焦心息尽，死意不期生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24074'>何幸光华旦，流人归上京。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24074'>愁将网共解，服与代俱明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24074'>复是三阶正，还逢四海平。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24074'>谁能定礼乐，为国著功成。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24074_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24074'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_24074_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

id='poem_title_24060_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24060'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24060'>城外宵钟敛，闺中曙火残。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=714&endYear=714')">714年</a>　说撰此碑，应撰于开元元、二年间，姑系于此。作品：《常州刺史平贞慎神道碑》<div id='poem_1364786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>常州刺史平君神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（714年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364786")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364786'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364786'>公讳贞慎。字密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364786_comment'></div>一字閒从。燕国蓟人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364786_comment'></div>盖晋之公族有韩国者。列于世家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364786_comment'></div>韩之馀子食平邑者。因为氏姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364786_comment'></div>有汉丞相。改造绣衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364786_comment'></div>在魏蓟侯。宅兹元社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364786_comment'></div>故瓜瓞绵于三辅。枝叶盛乎两燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364786_comment'></div>魏齐之閒。世济其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364786_comment'></div>公即北齐司空公鉴之曾孙。秘书郎子敬之季孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364786_comment'></div>故偃师令直容之叔子。钟积庆之洪允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364786_comment'></div>包太和之粹灵。敦庞沈静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364786_comment'></div>直方易。仁义根心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364786_comment'></div>政理率性。度以礼义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364786_comment'></div>文以诗书。户部尚书清河崔知悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364786_comment'></div>朝望人伦。公之文友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364786_comment'></div>深赏延誉。远近宗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364786_comment'></div>始以司成馆进士补卢州慎县尉。刺史卢宝允举器藏下僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364786_comment'></div>转冀州大都督府曲沃县尉。换晋州洪洞县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364786_comment'></div>北平阳道昕。气尚标举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364786_comment'></div>河东裴知礼。鉴裁精拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364786_comment'></div>阳推以孝友资身。裴亦荐以经邦兴化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364786_comment'></div>徙雍州新丰县尉。卢少儒引为检点判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364786_comment'></div>差卒选校。小大推允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364786_comment'></div>休议登闻。擢监察御史里行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364786_comment'></div>奉使黔中监选。有牂柯谢凤节仁奏罢汉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364786_comment'></div>专任首领。公上其挟奸树党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364786_comment'></div>俶扰蕃落。天子悟焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364786_comment'></div>再使置吏。远夷骚而旋定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364786_comment'></div>旧贯改而复完。又駉牧在野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364786_comment'></div>攘窃是繁。耗以岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364786_comment'></div>莫之禁御。公轺车上陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364786_comment'></div>群慝毕露。表监官斛斯果之辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364786_comment'></div>夺职者九人。没赃者万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364786_comment'></div>牧圉知禁。思无邪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364786_comment'></div>开耀閒吐蕃侵境。师旅不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364786_comment'></div>乃购运酬勋。募耕入选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364786_comment'></div>利之所在。诈亦居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364786_comment'></div>公与大理正王守一。于河兰鄯廓四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364786_comment'></div>推获僦籴王希古卢种王诞。其徒二千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364786_comment'></div>正处其罪。爰得我直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364786_comment'></div>授监察御史。内难去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364786_comment'></div>居丧过毁。死孝贻忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364786_comment'></div>光宅初。肇建两台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364786_comment'></div>分典百郡。服阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364786_comment'></div>授右台监察御史。巡察河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364786_comment'></div>澄清郡邑。升贤弊罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364786_comment'></div>能执其中。类功最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364786_comment'></div>加两阶。拜右肃政殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364786_comment'></div>郎官法天。古难其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364786_comment'></div>具美斯在。再拜司勋员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364786_comment'></div>永昌中。遭凶党网罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364786_comment'></div>为周兴所奏。贬温州固安令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364786_comment'></div>州特举清白。改鸿州栎阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364786_comment'></div>邑多猾人。屡宰败驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364786_comment'></div>公威有素。诚结无欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364786_comment'></div>率是而行。人用不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364786_comment'></div>狱犴自静。狼戾反悫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364786_comment'></div>诏书嘉誉。加朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364786_comment'></div>又罗密徒贝锦。为河内所鞠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364786_comment'></div>降括州员外司仓。寻而事白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364786_comment'></div>进吉州司马。神龙中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364786_comment'></div>官反旧政。穷鳞沛而纵壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364786_comment'></div>堕羽翼而顺风。拜司门郎中兼卫王司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364786_comment'></div>无何。正除卫王司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364786_comment'></div>拜太子左庶子。以节悯之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364786_comment'></div>出为涪州刺史。未往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364786_comment'></div>又转卢州司马。致仕久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364786_comment'></div>景龙中复起左谕德兼荣文馆学士。诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364786_comment'></div>公缙绅书彦。操履清淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364786_comment'></div>令誉播于始终。嘉绩宣于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364786_comment'></div>储闱谕论。雅望尤高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364786_comment'></div>宜申朝典。俾加徽服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364786_comment'></div>可银青光禄大夫。又摄詹事东都留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364786_comment'></div>拜常州刺史。居岁馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364786_comment'></div>优诏致仕。享年八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364786_comment'></div>先天元年仲冬。薨于河南之正平里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364786_comment'></div>遗令近地便葬。敛以终服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364786_comment'></div>开元二年冬。卜葬于伊阙之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364786_comment'></div>夫人河东县君柳氏祔焉。礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364786_comment'></div>公出入四朝。历官二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364786_comment'></div>其进也。皆择能录勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364786_comment'></div>惟德是与。其退也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364786_comment'></div>必含垢受屈。在涅不淄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364786_comment'></div>子文之量。从可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364786_comment'></div>凡撰淳孝友悌传各一篇。以匡储后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364786_comment'></div>撰先君亲友传十卷。以笃故旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364786_comment'></div>撰家谱家志各十卷。以明系本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364786_comment'></div>撰河南巡察记十卷。以辨风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364786_comment'></div>非通理博物。立诚锡类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364786_comment'></div>其孰能见志以著书。因事以设诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364786_comment'></div>若斯之盛也。有文集十卷行于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364786_comment'></div>初公侍祠清庙。有髦士之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364786_comment'></div>而先考偃师赠蒲州长史。自祖考三叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364786_comment'></div>茔无碑记。公咨诸通儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364786_comment'></div>而追建铭碣。幽赵之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364786_comment'></div>以为美谈。夫为子则颂德以尊祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364786_comment'></div>饰终以荣亲。孝之大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364786_comment'></div>为臣则不枉毫发以顾私。不避豺狼以挠法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364786_comment'></div>忠之至也。洁志则利不涉口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364786_comment'></div>欲不萌心。清之源也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364786_comment'></div>履道则不俛眉以悦势。不屈色以苟容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364786_comment'></div>正之方也。诗曰仲山甫举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364786_comment'></div>公有其德。传曰左邱明耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364786_comment'></div>公有其直。总是四善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364786_comment'></div>远齐二贤。于是芬苾令问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364786_comment'></div>优游眉寿。惠风激于胜流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364786_comment'></div>丕绩敷于哲后。然以忤彼权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364786_comment'></div>保兹介特。不登三阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364786_comment'></div>以正四国。贞白之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364786_comment'></div>慨焉太息。其孤总授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364786_comment'></div>充穷泣血。靡所寘怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364786_comment'></div>俾予作颂。布哀丰石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364786_comment'></div>恭惟先人之寮友。常奉长者之话言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364786_comment'></div>公雅珍确实。不尚华靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364786_comment'></div>敬慎风规。直纪行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364786_comment'></div>业广词褊。万无髣髴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364786_comment'></div>少子授。八分之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364786_comment'></div>独善当时。公平日惠爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364786_comment'></div>故存之刊刻。词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364786_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_119_1364786'>峨峨淑德。克生休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364786_comment'></div>履孝蹈忠。含清体正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364786_comment'></div>如玉之洁。如金之镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364786_comment'></div>高明洵美。学以润之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364786_comment'></div>官方正事。静以镇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364786_comment'></div>严严宪府。公三峻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364786_comment'></div>赫赫储宫。公三训之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364786_comment'></div>道有行废。时有泰否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364786_comment'></div>三入三出。无愠无喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364786_comment'></div>鼓缶而歌。悬车致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364786_comment'></div>全归葬俭。允也君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364786_comment'></div>西山幽幽。东川悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364786_comment'></div>云过坟阙。风薄松楸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364786_comment'></div>人亡道存。荣往哀留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364786_comment'></div>贻世作则。行归于周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364786_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_134_1364786_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
岳阳（安阳）
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_3_1364677_comment'></div>承恩惶怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364677_comment'></div>狼狈上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364677_comment'></div>以月一日至岳州上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364677_comment'></div>臣以昔侍金华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364677_comment'></div>过蒙荣宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364677_comment'></div>负乘招寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364677_comment'></div>日待谴黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364677_comment'></div>圣慈迟回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364677_comment'></div>仍委符守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364677_comment'></div>刻肌刻骨。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364677_comment'></div>夙夜惭惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364677_comment'></div>胡宁启处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364677_comment'></div>伏以贬官到任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364677_comment'></div>理在速闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364677_comment'></div>不敢循常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364677_comment'></div>稽缓附使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364677_comment'></div>无任荷恩兢惧之至。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年1月9日</a>　在岳州，常与赵冬曦、尹懋等登南楼（后称岳阳楼），赋诗唱和此诗是张说初至岳州之年所作。作品：《和尹懋秋夜游㴩湖》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年7月</a>　七月初，在岳州送梁知微时有诗。作品：《岳州别梁六入朝》《送粱六自洞庭山作》<div id='poem_24052' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24052' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24052")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24052_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_24052'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1359, "poem_allusion_24052")'>绛灌谗陷</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_24052_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24052'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24052'>远莅长沙渚，欣逢贾谊才。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24052'>江山疲应接，风日复晴开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24052'>江树云间断，湘山水上来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24052'>近洲朝鹭集，古戍夜猿哀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24052'>岸杼含苍救，河蒲秀紫台。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24052'>月馀偏地赏，心尽故人杯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24052'>自我违京洛，嗟君此溯洄。<div id='poem_sentence_6_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_24052'>容华因别老，交旧与年颓。<div id='poem_sentence_7_24052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_24052'>梦见长安陌，朝宗实盛哉。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年9月9日</a>　姚氏初至岳州，张说设宴相款时有诗。作品：《岳州宴姚绍之》<div id='poem_24053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年</a>　此诗应为张说至岳州后不久与赵冬羲唱和之作集原附赵冬曦《陪燕公行郡竹篱》诗。作品：《岳州行郡竹篱》<div id='poem_24133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24133' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_10_24133'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_24133_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年</a>　在岳州与度门禅众所撰书信。作品：《与度门禅众书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年</a>　张说初贬岳州，应度门禅众之请为玉泉寺大通禅师撰碑文。作品：《唐玉泉寺大通禅师碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系此碑神龙二年（706），非。）</span><div id='poem_1364797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐玉泉寺大通禅师碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364797")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1364797_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364797'>撰夫总四大者。成乎身矣。立万始者。主乎心矣。身是虚哉。即身见空。始同妙用。心非实也。观心若幻。乃等真如。名数入焉妙本乖。言说出焉真宗隐。故如来有意传要道。力持至德。万劫而遥付法印。一念而顿受佛身。谁其宏之。实大通禅师其人也。禅师尊称大通。讳神秀。本姓李。陈留尉氏人也。心洞九漏。悬解先觉。身长八尺。秀眉大耳。应王伯之象。合圣贤之度。少为诸生。游问江表。老庄元旨。书易大义。三乘经论。四分律仪。说通训诂。音参吴晋。烂乎如袭孔翠。玲然如振金玉。既而独鉴潜发。多闻旁施。逮知天命之年。自拔人閒之世。企闻蕲州有忍禅师。禅门之法允也。自菩提达磨天竺东来。以法传惠可。惠可传僧璨。僧璨传道信。道信传宏忍。继明重迹。相承五光。乃不远遐阻。翻飞谒诣。虚受与沃心悬会。高悟与真乘同彻。尽捐妄识。湛见本心。住寂灭境。行无是处。有师而成。即燃灯佛所。无依而说。是空王法门。服勤六年。不舍昼夜。大师叹曰。东山之法。尽在秀矣。命之洗足。引之并坐。于是涕辞而去。退藏于密。仪凤中。始隶玉泉。名在僧录。寺东七里。地坦山雄。目之曰。此正楞伽孤峰。度门兰若。荫松藉草。吾将老焉。云从龙。风从虎。大道出。贤人睹。岐阳之地。就者成都。华阴之山。学来如市。未云多也。后进得以拂三有。超四禅。升堂七十。味道三千。不是过也。尔其开法大略。则慧念以息想。极力以摄心。其入也品均凡圣。其到也行无前后。趣定之前。万缘尽闭。发慧之后。一切皆如。持奉楞伽。近为心要。过此以往。未之或知。久视年中。禅师春秋高矣。诏请而来。趺坐觐君。肩舆上殿。屈万乘而稽首。洒九重而宴居。传圣道者不北面。有盛德者无臣礼。遂推为两京法主。三帝国师。仰佛日之再中。庆优昙之一现。混处都邑。婉其秘旨。每帝王分座。后临席。鹓鹭四匝。龙象三绕。时炽炭待矿。故对默而心降。时诊饥投味。故告约而义领。一雨溥沾于众缘。万籁各吹于本分。非夫安住无畏。应变无方者。孰能焉尔乎。圣敬日崇。朝恩代积。当阳和会之所。置寺曰度门。尉氏先人之宅。置寺曰报恩。轼闾名乡。表德非拟。局厌諠辇。长怀虚壑。累乞还山。既听中驻久矣。衰惫无他患苦。魄散神全。形遗力谢。神龙二年二月二十八日夜中。顾命趺坐。泊如化灭。禅师武德八年乙酉受具于天宫。至是年丙午复终于此寺。盖僧腊八十矣。生于隋末。百有馀岁。未尝自言。故人莫审其数也。三界火心。四部冰背。榱崩梁坏。雷动雨泣。凡诸宝身。生是金口。故其丧也。如执亲焉。诏使吊哀。侯王归赗。三月二日。册谥大通。展饰终之义。礼也。时厥五日。假安阙塞。缓及葬之期。怀也。宸驾临诀至午桥。王公悲送至伊水。羽仪陈设至山龛。仲秋既望。还诏乃下。帝诺先许。冥遂宿心。太常卿鼓吹导引。城门郎护监丧葬。是日。天子出龙门泫金衬。登高停跸。目尽回舆。自伊及江。扶道哀候。幡花百辇。香云千里。维十月哉生魄明。即旧居后冈安神起塔。国钱严饰。赐逾百万。巨钟是先帝所铸。群经是后皇所锡。金榜御题。华幡内造。塔寺尊重。远称标绝。初禅师形解东洛。相见南荆。白雾积晦于禅山。素莲寄生于坐树。则双林变色。泗水逆流。至人违代。同符异感。百日卒哭也。在龙华寺设大会。八千人度二七人。二祥练缟也。咸就西明道场。数如前会。万回菩萨乞施后宫。宝衣盈箱。珍价敌国。亲举宠费。侑供巡香。其广福博因。存没如此。日月逾迈。荣落相推。于戏。法子永恋宗极。痛慈舟之遽失。恨涌塔之迟开。石城之叹也不孤。庐山之碑焉可作。窃比夫子贡之论夫子也。生于天地。不知天地之高厚。饮于江海。不知江海之广深。强名无迹。以慰其心。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364797'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364797'>额珠内隐，匪指莫效。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364797'>心镜外尘，匪磨莫照。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364797'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1364797", 1364797, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>海藏</span>安静，风识牵乐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364797'>不入度门，孰探元要。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364797'>倬哉禅伯，独立天下。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364797'>功收密诣，解却名假。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364797'>诣无所得，解亦都舍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364797'>月影空如，现于悟者。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364797'>无量善众，为父为师。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364797'>露清热恼，光射昏疑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364797'>冀将住世，万寿无期。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364797'>柰何过隙，一朝去之。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364797'>嗟我门人，忧心断续。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1364797'>进忆瞻仰，退思付嘱。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1364797'>尽不离定，空非灭觉。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364797'>念兹在兹，敢告无学。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364797_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364797'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1364797_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=715')">715年</a>　初至岳州时有诗。作品：《对酒行（巴陵作）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系开元五年（717））</span><div id='poem_24026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对酒行巴陵作</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span 荆州（岳阳）

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=717&endYear=717')">717年4月17日</a>　至荆州，祭当地城隍神时有文。作品：《祭城隍文》<div id='poem_1364831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364765_comment'></div>岂违亲许人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364765_comment'></div>没尽其哀。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364765_comment'></div>时止时行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364765_comment'></div>有以观大孝之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364765_comment'></div>君臣之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364765_comment'></div>其远矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364765_comment'></div>寻除左千牛长史检校武始军长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364765_comment'></div>摄右台侍御史兼灵武道行军长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364765_comment'></div>摄右屯卫郎将副临洮军使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364765_comment'></div>转右骁卫右郎将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364765_comment'></div>为临洮大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364765_comment'></div>拜兰州刺史兼榆林临洮等军大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364765_comment'></div>除夏州都督兼盐州防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364765_comment'></div>徵授幽州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364765_comment'></div>衣之以紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364765_comment'></div>摄御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364765_comment'></div>为河北军州节度大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364765_comment'></div>君政成周月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364765_comment'></div>惠则在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364765_comment'></div>患是缓风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364765_comment'></div>表以去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364765_comment'></div>未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364765_comment'></div>思回行以出奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364765_comment'></div>虏堕计中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364765_comment'></div>守便宜而未进。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=717&endYear=717')">717年</a>　宋璟从广督奉调回京，张说为之撰广州都督遗爱碑文。作品：《广州都督岭南按察五府经略使宋公遗爱碑颂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系此诗长安三年（703））</span><div id='poem_1364762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广州都督岭南按察五府经略使宋公遗爱碑颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（717年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364762")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364762'>维唐御天下九十有八载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364762_comment'></div>苍生贲乎海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364762_comment'></div>元泽漫乎荒外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364762_comment'></div>天子念穷乡之僻陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364762_comment'></div>徼道之修阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364762_comment'></div>吏或不率不驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364762_comment'></div>人或不康不若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364762_comment'></div>乃命旧相广平公宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364762_comment'></div>镇兹裔壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364762_comment'></div>式是南州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364762_comment'></div>笃五管之政教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364762_comment'></div>总三军之旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364762_comment'></div>幅员万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364762_comment'></div>驯致九译。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364762_comment'></div>诏书下日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364762_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1364762", 1364762, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>靡然顺风</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364762_comment'></div>曷由臻斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364762_comment'></div>威名之先路也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364762_comment'></div>公曩时执白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364762_comment'></div>登琐闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364762_comment'></div>推诚謇谔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364762_comment'></div>不私形骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364762_comment'></div>忤英主之龙鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364762_comment'></div>踏奸臣之虎尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364762_comment'></div>挫二张之锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364762_comment'></div>则声怛寰域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364762_comment'></div>折三思之角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364762_comment'></div>则气盖风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364762_comment'></div>由是极有四星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364762_comment'></div>维帝之辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364762_comment'></div>地有五岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364762_comment'></div>维天之柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364762_comment'></div>其入宰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364762_comment'></div>君之股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364762_comment'></div>其出守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364762_comment'></div>人之父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364762_comment'></div>至于此邦之长人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364762_comment'></div>饮食有节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364762_comment'></div>衣服有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364762_comment'></div>清心而庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364762_comment'></div>正色而群下一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364762_comment'></div>瑟兮僩兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364762_comment'></div>赫兮喧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364762_comment'></div>固以不怒而威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364762_comment'></div>不言而信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364762_comment'></div>虽有文身凿齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364762_comment'></div>被发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1364762", 1364762, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>儋耳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364762_comment'></div>衣卉面木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364762_comment'></div>巢山馆水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364762_comment'></div>种落异俗而化齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364762_comment'></div>言语不通而心喻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364762_comment'></div>其率人版筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364762_comment'></div>教人陶瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364762_comment'></div>室皆斁塈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364762_comment'></div>昼游则华风可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364762_comment'></div>家撤茅茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364762_comment'></div>夜作而灾火不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364762_comment'></div>栋宇之利也自今始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364762_comment'></div>祖国之舶车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364762_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1364762", 1364762, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>海琛</span>云萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364762_comment'></div>物无二价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364762_comment'></div>路有遗金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364762_comment'></div>殊裔胥易其回途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364762_comment'></div>远人咸内我边郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364762_comment'></div>交易之坦也有如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364762_comment'></div>故能言之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364762_comment'></div>举为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364762_comment'></div>盖微子去殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364762_comment'></div>以后王者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364762_comment'></div>襄公伐楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364762_comment'></div>将得诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364762_comment'></div>尚书东汉之雅望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364762_comment'></div>黄门北齐之令德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364762_comment'></div>宋氏世名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364762_comment'></div>公其济美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364762_comment'></div>诗所谓无念尔祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364762_comment'></div>聿修厥德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364762_comment'></div>广平有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364762_comment'></div>若夫往者屈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364762_comment'></div>来者伸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364762_comment'></div>往来相召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364762_comment'></div>而哀乐继之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364762_comment'></div>鸿飞遵渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364762_comment'></div>于汝信处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364762_comment'></div>龙章衮衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364762_comment'></div>以我公归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364762_comment'></div>郁陶乎人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364762_comment'></div>嗟叹之不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364762_comment'></div>广府司马谭瑰番禺耆老某乙等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364762_comment'></div>相与刻石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364762_comment'></div>传徽斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364762_comment'></div>子春秋之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364762_comment'></div>岂将苟其辞哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364762_comment'></div>雅敬宋公王臣之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364762_comment'></div>次嘉谭子赞德之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364762_comment'></div>遥感耆旧去思之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364762_comment'></div>越裳变风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364762_comment'></div>知周公之才之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364762_comment'></div>吉甫作颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364762_comment'></div>见申伯于藩于宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364762_comment'></div>观政将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364762_comment'></div>恶可废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364762_comment'></div>颂曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364762_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1364762'>降王宰兮远国灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364762_comment'></div>歌北户兮舞南溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364762_comment'></div>酌七德兮考六经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364762_comment'></div>政画一兮言不再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364762_comment'></div>草木育兮鱼鳖宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364762_comment'></div>变蓬屋兮改篱墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364762_comment'></div>鱼鳞瓦兮鸟翼堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364762_comment'></div>洞日华兮皎夜光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364762_comment'></div>火莫炖兮风莫飏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364762_comment'></div>事有近兮惠无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364762_comment'></div>昆崙宝兮西海财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364762_comment'></div>几万里兮岁一来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364762_comment'></div>舟如鸟兮货为台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364762_comment'></div>市无欺兮路无盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364762_comment'></div>旅忘家兮扃夜开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364762_comment'></div>越井冈兮石门道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364762_comment'></div>金鼓愁兮旌旆好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364762_comment'></div>来何暮兮去何早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364762_comment'></div>犦牛牲兮菌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1364762", 1364762, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>鸡卜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364762_comment'></div>神降福兮公寿考。</div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1364762_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=717&endYear=717')">717年</a>　在荆州长史任巡县时，至一柱观，有诗。作品：《一柱观》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系此诗长安三年（703））</span><div id='poem_23908' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23908' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23908?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一柱观</a><span class='authorDate'>（717年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_23908")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_23908_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23908'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23908'>旧说江陵观，初疑神化来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23908'>空山结云阁，绮靡随风回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23908'>奈何任一柱，斯焉容众材。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23908'>奇功非长世，今馀草露台。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23908'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23908_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=717&endYear=717')">717年</a>　春四月赴荆州以后，迁幽州都督命下之前,有文。作品：《唐故豫州刺史魏君碑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系此诗长安三年（703））</span><div id='poem_1364769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故豫州刺史魏君碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（717年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364769")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364769'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364769'>公讳叔瑜。字思瑾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364769_comment'></div>曰魏氏。钜鹿曲阳人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364769_comment'></div>考太师郑文贞公。致君皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364769_comment'></div>配神清庙。故祖德冑系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364769_comment'></div>叙于太宗之先碑矣。公生育庆绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364769_comment'></div>天然炳胎教之姿。少长德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364769_comment'></div>日用成躬率之化。性盘于孝友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364769_comment'></div>习狃于礼乐。俛仰中则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364769_comment'></div>从容蹈道。加以专精好古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364769_comment'></div>旁通多艺。圣人之所志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364769_comment'></div>闻一而反三。君子之所能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364769_comment'></div>举十而知九。与同生璘琬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364769_comment'></div>知名当代。始以门资补左千牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364769_comment'></div>转洛州司兵司议郎职方郎中太子洗马。出为怀州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364769_comment'></div>历庆慈仪豫四州刺史。春华韡于两宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364769_comment'></div>时雨零于四郡。观风之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364769_comment'></div>所在声闻。变雅之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364769_comment'></div>到今遗咏。其年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364769_comment'></div>春秋五十有一。终于豫州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364769_comment'></div>葬于旧域。夫人太原王氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364769_comment'></div>礼也。议者以公不避强御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364769_comment'></div>有昭子之政事。不为皎厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364769_comment'></div>有康子之隐德。虚已尚贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364769_comment'></div>有文侯之乐善。重诺分急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364769_comment'></div>有信陵之高义。人鲜有一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364769_comment'></div>况兼四乎。公赋入封君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364769_comment'></div>妹归帝子。车马无戚里之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364769_comment'></div>衣服有儒者之节。俭而得礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364769_comment'></div>富而无骄。此盖奉先之素履也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364769_comment'></div>公善于草隶。妙绝时人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364769_comment'></div>以笔意传次子华及甥河东薛稷。世称前有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1364769", 1364769, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>虞褚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364769_comment'></div>后有薛魏。此又贻训之馀美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364769_comment'></div>嗟夫。公学埒向歆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364769_comment'></div>操齐固燮。若天假三寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364769_comment'></div>朝登六事。则郑之桓武可寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364769_comment'></div>汉之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1364769", 1364769, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>韦平</span>一揆。而年近知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364769_comment'></div>位止方州。落<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1364769", 1364769, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>鹏翼</span>于半霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364769_comment'></div>负天之力莫展。顿龙媒于局路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364769_comment'></div>追风之势斯毕。九原不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364769_comment'></div>谁将与归。二子献华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364769_comment'></div>追完先德。俾余作颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364769_comment'></div>以慰罔极。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364769_comment'></div>昂昂豫州。毓粹含道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364769_comment'></div>钦若古训。思文烈考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364769_comment'></div>于穆烈考。维国之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364769_comment'></div>公承丕搆。思皇缵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364769_comment'></div>发轸台阁。风流荣问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364769_comment'></div>建麾千里。泽霶四郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364769_comment'></div>位未充德。命不遂才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364769_comment'></div>彼苍孤善。谓之何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364769_comment'></div>子孙必复。邱封永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364769_comment'></div>穆如清风。振芳厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364769_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1364769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=717&endYear=717')">717年</a>　魏华为表谢忱，专门遣使“赍缣马”至说家为谢，说因撰此书回复，以达“通财不谢”之意。作品：《与魏安州书》<div id='poem_1364706' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364706' class='poemTitle class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364706_comment'></div>比重奉来旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364706_comment'></div>力为牵缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364706_comment'></div>亦不敢假称虚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364706_comment'></div>附丽其迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364706_comment'></div>虽意野。<div -----title
襄阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='436c17a275be431c95237d4a2d2f2481_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("436c17a275be431c95237d4a2d2f2481");'><span id='436c17a275be431c95237d4a2d2f2481_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=718&endYear=718')">718年</a>，52岁</div><div id='436c17a275be431c95237d4a2d2f2481' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>约本年夏间，迁右羽林将军、幽州都督、河北节度使，摄御史大夫此诗为说回京复命，取道襄阳，直下洛阳时有诗。作品：《襄阳路逢寒食》<div id='poem_24173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄阳路逢寒食</a><span class='authorDate'>（718年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24173")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_24173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24173'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24173'>去年寒食洞庭波，今年寒食襄阳路。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24173'>不辞著处寻山水，秪畏还家落春暮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24173'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_24173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>疑此诗为说离荆州取道襄阳赴东都时作。作品：《襄州景空寺融上人兰若》<div id='poem_24084' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24084' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>襄州景空寺题融上人兰若</a><span class='authorDate'>（718年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24084")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24084'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24084'>高名出汉阴，禅阁跨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_24084", 24084, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>香岑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24084'>众山既围绕，长川复回临。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24084'>云峰晓灵变，风木夜虚吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24084'>碧湫龙池满，苍松虎径深。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24084'>旧知青岩意，偏入杳冥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作冥窅）</span>心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24084'>何由侣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_24084", 24084, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>飞锡</span>，从此脱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_24084", 24084, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>朝簪</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24084'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_24084_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

长治（上党）

id='poem_sentence_11_24041_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_24041'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_24041_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='31fdee1427c8460ba69c244d24c60ba9_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("31fdee1427c8460ba69c244d24c60ba9");'><span id='31fdee1427c8460ba69c244d24c60ba9_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年</a>，57岁</div><div id='31fdee1427c8460ba69c244d24c60ba9' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年3月</a>　本年三月侍从玄宗出巡回京之后，撰文。作品：《上党旧宫述圣颂》<div id='poem_1364630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上党旧宫述圣颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（723年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364630")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1364630_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1364630'>惟开元十有一祀正月。皇帝展义于河东。挟右太行。留宴上党。整兵耀武。入于太原。设都建颂。以崇王业。南辕汾脽。祈谷后土。天清日朗。神歆如荅。三月庚午。饮至长安。六军解严。四方和会。迩观法象。遐咏德泽。大虞巡之典修。美汉祠之礼举。人心翕而一变。神物效而无方。于是邠王臣守礼宁王臣宪申王臣撝岐王臣范薛王臣业献书于内。开府仪同三司臣璟尚书臣晙臣象先臣颋御史大夫臣漼抗疏于外。佥曰陛下受天历数。稽圣典谟。道贯三灵。仁育万类。扫阴沴而睹日。开辟之功也。尊文考而御天。帝王之孝也。天以陛下为子。人奉陛下为君。万殊之福。斯应毕臻。三代之风。颂声咸作。今潞人怀代邸。咏泗亭。采圣崖。延元石。将表潜龙之馆。勒启圣之图。勤亦至矣。陛下推而不报。其何以下塞众望。上对神庥哉。臣闻天之所启。人之所戴。必凭睿圣元懿之德。元命贞符之纪。功业见乎变。德施加乎时。德厚者施溥。功元者应速。或阶晦以彰。或由难而昌。盖生其德之谓天。授其时之谓命。天有成命。其可没乎。陛下昔居是州也。紫云在天。神光照室。白鹿来扰。黄龙上升。陇出仙洞而神鱼跃。山开禅穴而灵钟韵。谣言合谶。巨迹引途。嘉李傍连。神蓍自起。当此时也。金石豫变。狱颂先归。政殷六府。人重五教。陶无窳器。渔有让泉。神而化之。人不知力。昔龙负图而大舜登。狼衔钩而后殷昌。元圭锡于夏禹。赤伏归于汉光。应运协符。希代称宝。未有穷祥极瑞。俶傥瑰异。如今之至者矣。若元贶集而不彰。则神心不悦。鸿业成而不赞。则祝告无闻。是掩天庥而盖圣德也。臣子之罪。将何解焉。愿听潞人。以扬丕烈。帝曰。往者中宗违代。国步维艰。天祚我唐。大命集于睿宗大圣真皇帝。朕畏天将命。不敢怠遑。其乾符坤珍。皆先圣之馀福。朕何力之有焉。然重违昆弟公卿之请。抑心敬从。无为虚美。重朕不德也。群臣游圣。荡莫能名。约乎旧史。敢颂成绩。辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1364630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364630'>帝德广运，乃圣乃神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364630'>天祚圣兮，唐虽旧邦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364630'>其命维新，再受命兮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364630'>帝初正人，降居上党。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364630'>天下往兮，黄龙昼见。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364630'>攀天而上，九五象兮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364630'>帝适于野，紫云之下。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364630'>求必在兮，帝寝于堂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364630'>变龙有光，观者骇兮。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364630'>天迹星谣，木连蓍立。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364630'>总神异兮，灵钟化穴。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364630'>缟鹿赤鱼，何诡异兮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364630'>上天无声，托类附形。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1364630'>觉悟人兮，圣皇斋栗。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1364630'>在得戒失，昭事神兮。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364630'>皤皤潞老，乐我王道。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364630'>爱旧宫兮，赫赫颂功。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1364630'>与天比崇，摅无穷兮。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1364630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1364630'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1364630_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=723&endYear=723')">723年</a>　此碑铭应非说所撰，附本年待考。作品：《后土神祠碑铭》<div id='poem_1364795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_4_1364795'>因天事天，因地事地。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364795_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364795'>彼汾之曲，高脽杰异。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364795_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364795'>景象遗光，坛场旧位。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364795_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364795'>寂寥千祀，精灵永閟。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364795_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364795'>诬神不祥，复古维祺。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364796'>巉巉太华，柱天直上。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364796'>青崖白谷，仰见灵掌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364796'>是曰灵岳，众山之长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364796'>白帝西下，黄河北来。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364796'>阴阳孕育，精气徘徊。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364796'>偶圣呈瑞，逢昏降灾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1364796'>玉池神挹，石室仙开。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1364796'>海绝瀛洲，天遥元圃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1364796'>伟哉此镇，峥嵘中土。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1364796'>鬼神乍游，风云忽聚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1364796'>高标赫日，半壁飞雨。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1364796'>自古王者，巡方必至。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1364796'>龙驾帝服，封天禅地。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1364796'>南面会神，西后在位。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1364796'>待予治国安人，然后徐思其事。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1364796_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1364796'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1364796_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
荥阳
-----detail

-----title
泰安（乾封）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ceddf9ef073e4b50b7718527ae1ea9c2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ceddf9ef073e4b50b7718527ae1ea9c2");'><span id='ceddf9ef073e4b50b7718527ae1ea9c2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>，59岁</div><div id='ceddf9ef073e4b50b7718527ae1ea9c2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年10月</a>　本年十月，东封泰山，令张说撰《封祀坛颂》、源乾矅撰《社首坛颂》、苏颋撰《朝觐坛颂》以纪徳。作品：《大唐祀封禅颂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》系十一月。）</span><div id='poem_1364631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364631' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364631?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大唐封祀坛颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364631")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364631_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364631'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364631'>皇帝六叶开元神武皇帝再受命致太平。乃封岱宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364631_comment'></div>禅社首。凿石纪号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364631_comment'></div>天文焕发。儒臣志美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364631_comment'></div>立碣祠坛。曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364631_comment'></div>厥初生人。俶有君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364631_comment'></div>其道茫昧。其风朴略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1364631_comment'></div>因时而欻起。与运而纷落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1364631_comment'></div>泯泯没没。无闻焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1364631_comment'></div>后代圣人。取法象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1364631_comment'></div>立名位。衣裳以等之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1364631_comment'></div>甲兵以怛之。于是礼乐出而书记存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1364631_comment'></div>反其源。致敬乎天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1364631_comment'></div>报其本。致美乎鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1364631_comment'></div>则封禅者。帝王受天命告成功之为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1364631_comment'></div>阅曩圣之奥训。考列辟之通术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1364631_comment'></div>畴若天而不成。曷背道而靡失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1364631_comment'></div>由此推之。封禅之义有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1364631_comment'></div>帝王之略有七。七者何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1364631_comment'></div>传不云乎。道德仁义礼智信乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1364631_comment'></div>顺之称圣哲。逆之号狂悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1364631_comment'></div>三者何。一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1364631_comment'></div>位当五行图箓之序。二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1364631_comment'></div>时会<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>四海升平</span>之运。三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1364631_comment'></div>德具钦明文思之美。是谓与天合符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1364631_comment'></div>名不死矣。有一不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1364631_comment'></div>而云封禅。人且未许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1364631_comment'></div>其如天何。言旧史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1364631_comment'></div>君莫道于陶唐虞舜。臣莫德于皋陶稷离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1364631_comment'></div>三臣备德。皆有天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1364631_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>仲尼</span>叙帝王之书。系鲁秦之誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1364631_comment'></div>明鲁祀周公用王礼。秦承伯益接周统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1364631_comment'></div>孔圣微旨。不其效与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1364631_comment'></div>然秦定天下之功高。享天禄之日浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1364631_comment'></div>天而未忘庭坚之德也。故大命复集于皇家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1364631_comment'></div>天之赞唐。不惟旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1364631_comment'></div>其兴之也。元灵启迪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1364631_comment'></div>黄祇顾怀。应归运以义举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1364631_comment'></div>抚来苏以利见。濩也无放夏之惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1364631_comment'></div>武也无伐殷之战。高祖创业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1364631_comment'></div>四宗重光。有德格天漏泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1364631_comment'></div>蒸云濡露。菌蠢滋育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1364631_comment'></div>氤氲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>涵煦</span>。若天地之覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1364631_comment'></div>日月之照临。溥有形而希景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1364631_comment'></div>罄无外而宅心。百有八年于兹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1364631_comment'></div>皇帝攘内难而启新命。戴睿宗而缵旧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1364631_comment'></div>宇宙更辟。朝廷始位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1364631_comment'></div>盖羲轩氏之造皇图也。九族敦叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1364631_comment'></div>百姓昭明。万邦咸和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1364631_comment'></div>黎人于变。立土圭以步历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1364631_comment'></div>革铜浑以正天。盖唐虞氏之张帝道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1364631_comment'></div>天地四时。六宫著礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1364631_comment'></div>井田三壤。五圻成赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1364631_comment'></div>广九庙以尊祖。定六律以和神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1364631_comment'></div>盖三代之设王制也。武纬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1364631_comment'></div>文经之。圣谟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1364631_comment'></div>神化之。然犹战战兢兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1364631_comment'></div>日慎一日。纳规诲以进德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1364631_comment'></div>遂忠良以代工。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>讲习</span>乎无为之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1364631_comment'></div>讨论乎集贤之殿。宠勇爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1364631_comment'></div>贵经明。翼乎鹓鸾之列在庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1364631_comment'></div>毅乎貔貅之师居鄙。人和旁感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1364631_comment'></div>神宝沓至。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>乾符坤珍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1364631_comment'></div>千品万类。超图溢牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1364631_comment'></div>未始闻记。我后以人瑞为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1364631_comment'></div>不以物瑞为意。王公卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1364631_comment'></div>俨然进曰。休哉陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1364631_comment'></div>孝至于天。政合乎道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1364631_comment'></div>前年祈后土。人获大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1364631_comment'></div>閒岁祀圆丘。日不奄朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1364631_comment'></div>感祥以祈圣。因事以观天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1364631_comment'></div>天人交合。其则不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1364631_comment'></div>意者乔岳扫路。望翠华之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1364631_comment'></div>上帝储恩。俟苍璧之礼久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1364631_comment'></div>焉可专让而废旧勋。群臣固言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1364631_comment'></div>勤帝知罪。至于再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1364631_comment'></div>至于三。帝乃挹之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1364631_comment'></div>钦崇天道。俯率嘉话。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1364631_comment'></div>恐德不类。敢惮于勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1364631_comment'></div>其撰巡狩之仪。求封禅之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1364631_comment'></div>既而礼官不戒而备。军政不谋而辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1364631_comment'></div>天姥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/160/Comments/0")'>练日</span>。雨师洒道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1364631_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>六甲</span>按队。八阵警跸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1364631_comment'></div>孟冬仲旬。乘舆乃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1364631_comment'></div>千旗云引。万戟林行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1364631_comment'></div>霍濩燐烂。飞焰扬精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1364631_comment'></div>原野为之震动。草木为之风生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1364631_comment'></div>历郡县。省谣俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1364631_comment'></div>问百年。举百祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1364631_comment'></div>兴坠典。葺阙政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1364631_comment'></div>攸徂之人。室家相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1364631_comment'></div>万方纵观。千里如堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1364631_comment'></div>城邑连欢。邱陵聚舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1364631_comment'></div>其中垂白之老。乐过以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1364631_comment'></div>不图蒿里之魂。复见乾封之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1364631_comment'></div>尧云往。舜日还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1364631_comment'></div>神华灵郁。烂漫乎穹壤之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1364631_comment'></div>是月来至于岱宗。祗祓斋宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1364631_comment'></div>涤濯静室。凝神元览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1364631_comment'></div>将款太乙。议夫泰山者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1364631_comment'></div>圣帝受天官之宫。天孙总人灵之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1364631_comment'></div>自昔立国。莫知万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1364631_comment'></div>克升中而建号。惟七十而有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1364631_comment'></div>我高宗六之。而今七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1364631_comment'></div>非夫尊位盛时。明德旷代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1364631_comment'></div>辽阔难并之甚哉。先时将臻夫大封也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1364631_comment'></div>累封疆于高冈。筑泰坛于阳趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1364631_comment'></div>夫其天坛三袭。辰陛十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1364631_comment'></div>咸秩众灵。列坐有次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1364631_comment'></div>崇牙树羽。管磬镛鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1364631_comment'></div>宫悬于重壝之内。干戚钗殳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1364631_comment'></div>钩戟戣戵。周位于四门之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1364631_comment'></div>伐国重器。传代绝瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1364631_comment'></div>旅之于中庭。玉辇金毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1364631_comment'></div>翠冒黄屋。夹之于端路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1364631_comment'></div>庶官百辟。羌夷蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1364631_comment'></div>褒成之后。让王之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1364631_comment'></div>序立于礼神之场。旄头弩牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1364631_comment'></div>铁马金镞。介冑如雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1364631_comment'></div>旗帜如火。远匝于清禁之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1364631_comment'></div>于是乎以天正上元。法驾徐进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1364631_comment'></div>屯千乘于平路。留群臣于谷口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1364631_comment'></div>皇帝御六龙。陟万仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1364631_comment'></div>独与一二元老执事之人。出天门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1364631_comment'></div>临日观。次沆瀣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1364631_comment'></div>宿巉岩。赤霄可接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1364631_comment'></div>白云在下。庚寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1364631_comment'></div>祀高祖于上封。以配上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1364631_comment'></div>命众官于下位。以享众神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1364631_comment'></div>皇帝冕裘登坛。奠献俯偻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1364631_comment'></div>叶金奏。佾羽舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1364631_comment'></div>撞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_130_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/260/Comments/0")'>黄钟</span>。歌大吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1364631_comment'></div>开阊阖。与天语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1364631_comment'></div>清将信公。奉斗布度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1364631_comment'></div>懋建皇极。勤恤苍生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1364631_comment'></div>昭假乎未兆。禳灾乎未萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1364631_comment'></div>上下传节。而礼成乐遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1364631_comment'></div>福寿同归。而帝赐神策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1364631_comment'></div>乃检玉牒于中顶。扬柴燎于高天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1364631_comment'></div>庶忠诚之上达。若凭焰而驾烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1364631_comment'></div>日辔方旋。神心馀眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1364631_comment'></div>五色云起。拂马以随人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1364631_comment'></div>万岁山呼。从天而至地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1364631_comment'></div>越翼日。尊睿宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1364631_comment'></div>侑地祇。而礼社首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1364631_comment'></div>遂张大乐。觐东后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1364631_comment'></div>国风惟旧。无黜幽削爵之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1364631_comment'></div>王泽惟新。有眚灾大赉之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1364631_comment'></div>不浃日。至化洽于人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1364631_comment'></div>不崇朝。景福遍于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1364631_comment'></div>然后藏金匮于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_149_1364631", 1364631, "Clauses/298/Comments/0")'>祏室</span>。回玉鸾于上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1364631_comment'></div>煌煌乎。真圣朝之能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1364631_comment'></div>而高代之盛节者也。于斯之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1364631_comment'></div>华戎殊俗。异音同叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1364631_comment'></div>兵合多雨。山峻多云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1364631_comment'></div>岂有大举百万之师。剋期千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1364631_comment'></div>及行事之日。则天无点翳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1364631_comment'></div>地无纤尘。严冬变为韶熹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1364631_comment'></div>寒谷郁为和气。非至德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1364631_comment'></div>其孰能动天如此其顺者乎。昔人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1364631_comment'></div>自西自东。自南自北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1364631_comment'></div>无思不服。今信知圣人作而万物睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1364631_comment'></div>其心服之之谓矣。或曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1364631_comment'></div>祭泰折主先后。非礼与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1364631_comment'></div>曰。是礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1364631_comment'></div>非宜也。王者父事天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1364631_comment'></div>母事地。侑神崇孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1364631_comment'></div>无嫌可也。且夫柴瘗外事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1364631_comment'></div>帝王主之。烝尝内事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1364631_comment'></div>后助之。是开元正人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1364631_comment'></div>革弊礼。起百王之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1364631_comment'></div>故令千载睋末光。聆绝韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1364631_comment'></div>咀甘实。漱芳润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1364631_comment'></div>烁元妙之至精。流不巳之淑声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1364631_comment'></div>臣说作颂。告于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1364631_comment'></div>四皇坟而六帝典。虽吉甫亦莫能名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1364631_comment'></div>徒采彼舆人之诗曰。大矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1364631_comment'></div>维天为大。惟皇则之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1364631_comment'></div>率我万国。受天之祺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1364631_comment'></div>子孙百代。人神共保绥之云尔而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1364631_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_179_1364631_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月12日</a>　十一月十二日，御帐殿受朝贺，大赦天下，授张说为尚书右丞相兼中书令此让表应上于壬辰当日或次日。作品：《让右丞相表》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月16日</a>　十一月十六日，玄宗幸孔子宅，亲设奠祭，并赋《经邹鲁祭孔子而叹之》诗，张说与张九龄同和有文。作品：《奉和经邹鲁祭孔子而叹之》<div id='poem_23953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_23953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/23953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制经邹鲁祭孔子应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年11月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_23953")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_23953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_23953'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_23953'>孔圣家邹鲁，儒风蔼典坟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_23953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_23953'>龙骖回旧宅，凤德咏馀芬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_23953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_23953'>入室神<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作人）</span>如在，升堂乐似闻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_23953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_23953'>悬知一王法，今日待明君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_23953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_23953'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_23953_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年11月16日</a>　孔庙中附祠杜预，此赞或因祭孔有感而作，至于何时，似难确考《周考》认为，开元十三年（725），泰山封禅，幸孔子宅，此赞应作于其时可备一说，附此待考。作品：《孔子堂杜预赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》未系年。）</span><div id='poem_1364742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364742?labeling=true' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364742'>猗欤杜侯，发挥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1364742", 1364742, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>孔圣</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1364742'>春秋既立，王道以正。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1364742'>列国行事，君子莫之。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1364742'>他人有心，予忖度之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1364742'>推凡见例，定罪原词。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1364742'>开我后学，从祀先师。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1364742_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1364742'></div><div 商丘（宋城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9ed67586f2c2498cac073f76ffcb7c3a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9ed67586f2c2498cac073f76ffcb7c3a");'><span id='9ed67586f2c2498cac073f76ffcb7c3a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>，59岁</div><div id='9ed67586f2c2498cac073f76ffcb7c3a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年12月1日</a>　张说以集贤院名义上表，贺太阳当亏未亏。作品：《集贤院贺太阳不亏表》<div id='poem_1364668' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1364668' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1364668?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤院贺太阳不亏表</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年12月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_1364668")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1364668_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1364668'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1364668'>太史奏太阳不亏。圣德上感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1364668_comment'></div>变灾为瑞。阳光增晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1364668_comment'></div>阴慝不作。休徵之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1364668_comment'></div>莫盛于斯。臣等无任欣抃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1364668_comment'></div>谨进状陈贺以闻。谨进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1364668_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1364668_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

宜阳（寿安）

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24115'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24115'>方秀美盘游，频年降天罕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24115'>野宿霜入帐，孤衾寒不暖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
眉县（郿县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='587ffb3241a04ed1b9b0bc71d10c7abc_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("587ffb3241a04ed1b9b0bc71d10c7abc");'><span id='587ffb3241a04ed1b9b0bc71d10c7abc_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年</a>，64岁</div><div id='587ffb3241a04ed1b9b0bc71d10c7abc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年10月</a>　本年冬，张说侍玄宗幸凤泉汤，有诗。作品：奉和幸凤泉汤应制。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈祖言《张说年谱》、周睿《张说研究》系开元十一年（723））</span><div id='poem_24037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_24037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/24037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和圣制幸凤汤泉应制</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15153, "唐", "张说", "poem_title_24037")'>张说</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_24037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_24037'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_24037'>周狩闻岐礼，秦都辨雍名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_24037'>献禽天子孝，存老圣皇情。<div id='poem_sentence_1_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_24037'>温润宜冬幸，游畋乐岁成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_24037'>汤云出水殿，暖气入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_24037", 24037, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>山营</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_24037'>坎意无私洁，乾心称物平。<div id='poem_sentence_4_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_24037'>帝歌流乐府，溪谷也增荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_24037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_24037'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_24037_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
